properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the famous district Schöneberg between U stations Wittenbergplatz and Nollendorfplatz. In the roaring 1920s, Schöneberg was the neighbourhood of artists and musicians of Berlin. The neighbourhood around Nollendorfplatz in particular was known for elaborate parties and a casual lifestyle. To this day, modern clubs like Goya build on the atmosphere of that time. Winterfeldplatz, which hosts the city's largest food market on Wednesdays and Saturdays, lies directly to the south. Around the square and on nearby side streets, there are plenty of cafes and bars. Another Place of interest is Schöneberg town hall. After the division of Germany, it was the political centre of West Berlin. This is where Kennedy uttered the famous words, 'ich bin ein Berliner'. To the south of the town hall, the long Rudolf-Wilde park is a good option for a leisurely stroll. Schöneberg has a good connection to the neighbouring districts. The U-Bahn lines U1, U2, U3, U4 and U7 go through
properties.notes: Marlene Dietrich lived in this original Berlin house from 1894 and the owner of this apartment is a famous Danish musician. Please note! This is not an apartment but a guest room where You have Your own private en suite bathroom and sunroof terrace. The kitchen and the dining room You have to share with Your host. 5th Floor NO elevator!
properties.transit: 100 meter to bus to Bahnhof Zoo and Alexanderplatz and nearest subway stations Wittenbergplatz and Nollendorfplatz.
properties.access: Access to kitchen and dining room, washing machine and dryer, hairdryer, iron and ironing board and extra towels. Bedlinen and towels are provided.
properties.interaction: We will be happy to help You with information about tourist attractions, good restaurants, bars, clubs and even guided tours on bikes and of course local maps and touristinfos.
properties.house_rules: Smoking only on sunroof terrace. As we are under very strict Copyright laws in Germany we are held responsible for your Internet usage. By booking this guest room You confirm that whilst using the Internet connection You will not use any filesharing sites, programs or software (such as Megaupload, Rapidshare, Torrenz, 4share and others), and will not down- or uppload any music, movies or any other commercial or artistic content that is protected by the German Copyright Laws. You will be hold responsible for any violation of German Copyright Laws.

English below! 

Wir sind ein junges Pärchen (32 und 34 Jahre) und freuen uns, unsere Unterkunft auch mit anderen teilen zu können. properties.name: Spacious room in vibrant F-hain
properties.summary: High ceilings, wooden floors, white walls, and lots of light through the big windows are just some of the things that make this room special. The room has brand new furniture including a desk, chair, bookshelf, a big wardrobe, nightstand and a 160cm wide Queen size bed.  The apartment is located in Friedrichshain, close to Frankfurter Tor, in one of the best café/restaurant/club districts in Berlin.
properties.space: The room is quite big and has space for all your bags and stuff that you bring. The wardrobe can easily fit the clothes for 2 people and you have a desk and chair if you want to get some work done. The apartment is situated in the very heart of Friedrichshain, with just a minute's walk to restaurants, pubs, clubs and cosy cafés.

Whenever I'm at home I'm glad to give tips on where to find the best restaurants, museums, clubs and other nice places to hang out. In the neighborhood you have the world's most famous nig
properties.neighborhood_overview: In the neighborhood you have the world's most famous night club "Berghain", one of the most restaurant-filled streets "Simon Dach" and the awe-inspiring Frankfurter Tor complete with a parade street.
properties.notes: I love taking care of my guests, and I really enjoy the feedback I receive from them. I constantly try to better accommodate the needs of my guests and work towards giving them the best possible experience while staying here. Here are a few examples of things I have improved as a direct result of feedback from my guests:  - Bought a Bose sound dock (loudspeaker) for the kitchen. - Installed an air purifier in the guest room to enhance air quality (especially suitable for people with pollen/dust allergy). - Got a new coat hanger/drying rack. - Got a full body mirror in the guest room. - Bought extra sets of towels so you can go to the beach or one of the many bathhouses or pool clubs.
properties.transit: Arriving from Tegel Airport: Take bus TXL to Alexanderplatz and then change to U5 direction Hönow and get off at Frankfurter Tor.  Arriving from Schönefeld Airport: Take train S9 to Frankfurter Allee and then change to U5 direction Alexanderplatz and get off at Frankfurter Tor.  Arriving by car: Parking spaces can be found on the street outside, but most of them are rather expensive. I recommend driving to Ostbahnhof and use the long-term parking there. From there you can take bus 240 or N40 to Simon Dach Straße.
properties.access: You will be able to access your room, the shared kitchen and shared bathroom.
properties.interaction: Whenever I'm at home I'm glad to give tips on where to find the best restaurants, museums, clubs and other nice places to hang out.
properties.house_rules: I normally sleep after midnight since I get up for work at around 6:30, so it would be good if there is not too much noise after midnight :) No smoking or pets in the apartment, please. If you have any questions at all, send me a message and I'm sure we can work something out!
properties.host_about: Passionate about food&wine, science, and the feeling of new experiences. Spend my days working with project leadership and my nights with everything from designing home furnishing to baking french chocolate fondants.

properties.name: Chillout-WG 2015 Vol 2
properties.summary: Gemütliches Zimmer in schöner großer 4-Zimmerwohnung
properties.space: Unsere Vier Zimmer Wohnung liegt im Erdgeschoß und hat eine kleine Terrasse zum Innenhof mit etwas Grünfläche. In der Mitte befindet sich eine geräumige Wohnküche mit einem zum Esstisch umfunktionierten Billardtisch.  Dein Zimmer befindet sich zur Strassenseite hin und hat einen fest installierten elektr. Rolladen. Das Haus ist recht modern und gut gegen Lärm isoliert. Wir haben zwei Bäder, eines mit Dusche und das andere mit einer Badewanne. Beide stehen zur Nutzung zur Verfügung. Außerdem stehen eine Spül- und Waschmaschine sowie ein Wäschetrockner zur Verfügung. Bettlaken und Bettwäsche sind vorhanden. Handtücher können wir ebenfalls auf Wunsch zur Verfügung stellen.

properties.notes: Wir sind keine Party-WG! Unsere Gäste werden gebeten außerhalb zu feiern. Gegen "Rausch ausschlafen" spricht natürlich nichts ;-)
properties.transit: Bei uns vorm Haus fährt die M21. Zu Fuß ist in der Umgebung Anschluß zur M10 (Bersariner Platz) und U5 (Samariterplatz oder Frankfurter Tor). properties.house_rules: Hier haben wir sehr klare Vorstellungen: - wir bitten Euch nur draußen auf der Terasse zu rauchen - Wir nehmen maximal zwei Personen auf - Selbsterklärend sind die Privaträume der Bewohner tabu - Die Küche ist nach Nutzung wieder aufzuräumen/sauber zu machen - keine Drogen ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ - we kindly ask you to smoke only outside on our terrace - we accept two person at max - the kitchen should be kept clean - no drugs - seriously

properties.name: Design loft with rooftop & pool
properties.summary: Modern, scandinavian furnished design studio with huge window wall with view over Linienstraße. Located right in the boutique district (best area of Mitte) with plenty to do just outside the door. Access to amazing shared rooftop garden with swimming pool.
properties.space: The lift will take you to the apartment in the new concrete building with panorama windows and here you will enter a small but amazing apartment located in the best area in Mitte. The area is safe and quite but offers a lot of cosy cafés, restaurants and bars just a few steps outside the door. The exclusively furnished apartment of 35 sqm offers more then just high comfort, you will find interesting art, cool details and also some designer classics. Lot's of visible concrete and the black floor adds a lot of character to the loft. The wardrobe in the hallway gives you a lot of space for your clothes and there you'll also find hangers, iron, washing powder, simply everything you need to take good care of you clothes during your stay.
properties.description: Modern, scandinavian furnished design studio with huge window wall with view over Linienstraße. Located right in the boutique district (best area of Mitte) with plenty to do just outside the door. Access to amazing shared rooftop garden with swimming pool. properties.neighborhood_overview: Berlin's "Scheunenviertel" is a neighbourhood in Berlin east city centre with a long and diverse history. Today, the area is one of the most vibrant and popular in Berlin with plenty of unique boutique shopping, cool restaurants and bars. Connecting with the jewish quarters and the gallery district to the west, Prenzlauer Berg to the north and Hackesher Markt to the south, the location is perfect to get around by foot.
properties.transit: For some further urban exploring the location is perfect between the 2 subway stations Rosenthaler Platz and Rosa-Luxembourg-Platz. There are also several S and and tram lines, all reachable within just a few minutes walk which guarantees to take you wherever you wan't in the city in the most convenient and quick way.
properties.house_rules: PLEASE NOTE! Do not leave the key in the lock on the inside of the door. If you leave it in the lock it's not possible to open the door from the outside. Please do not wear shoes inside. Thanks
properties.host_about: Swedish, living in Berlin and Paris. Love to travel, workaholic, appreciate nature, art and sport.

properties.name: Fontane Studio | Kreuzberg Südstern
properties.summary: Small and pretty studio (20m2) in a traditional Berlin building with wooden floors, stucco, and original details. This particular flat used to serve as the living space for the concierge.
properties.space: Small and pretty studio (20m2) in a traditional Berlin building with wooden floors, stucco, and original details. This particular flat used to serve as the living space for the concierge. The flat includes a comfortable daybed that folds out to be full-sized, a small kitchen, a cozy dining table and a bathroom with shower. A huge window looks out onto the back garden and a school yard.
properties.description: Small and pretty studio (20m2) in a traditional Berlin building with wooden floors, stucco, and original details. This particular flat used to serve as the living space for the concierge. Small and pretty studio (20m2) in a traditional Berlin building with wooden floors, stucco, and original details. This particular flat used to serve as the living space for the concierge. The flat includes a comfortable daybed that folds out to be full-sized, a small kitchen, a cozy dining table and a bathroom with shower. A huge window looks out onto the back garden and a school yard. The studio is a total of about 20 square meters, with a separate bathroom and hallway of its own, and is totally self-sufficient. Access in the Studio is therefore not restricted. Our family also resides in the building and can be reached by phone if you have questions. The house is only 200m from Südstern and Körtestraße in one of the most beautiful, and surprisingly quiet streets in bustling, hip Kreuzberg. This studi
properties.neighborhood_overview: The house is only 200m from Südstern and Körtestraße in one of the most beautiful, and surprisingly quiet streets in bustling, hip Kreuzberg. This studio is a great for those who wish to live green, as you can find natural products nearby. Every Saturday there is a nice little farmer's market where you can eat or pick up fresh food and products, and there is also an organic grocery 1 block away. The very popular Bergmannstraße also starts here, filled with quaint shops. There are also several very good options for breakfast nearby. The Fontanepromenade itself, Landwehrkanal, Hasenheide and the popular Tempelhof Park are all within a few minutes. All these, incidentally, are also wonderful for running paths. If you'd like, we will be happy to give you some tips.
properties.transit: Subway (U7 Südstern, 200m)  Bus (M41 Geibelstraße, 500m). Consistent and frequent metro busses with direct connection to the central station in 16 minutes. Taxi from central station is aprox. 20€ and 10-15 min. Usually, street parking for cars can be found right outside the house.
properties.access: The studio is a total of about 20 square meters, with a separate bathroom and hallway of its own, and is totally self-sufficient. Access in the Studio is therefore not restricted.
properties.interaction: Our family also resides in the building and can be reached by phone if you have questions.
properties.house_rules: The studio is in a building with families with children. Therefore, please no parties or loud music. A good night's sleep is important for those who live here. Please treat the apartment with care, let me know if something is broken or needs to be replaced and, upon your departure, leave things as you found them. Smoking is not permitted in both the home and for the entrance and front of the house. If you lose the key, I regret that we will have to charge the full deposit ( EUR 100) , as the key is very expensive and special, and opens both the front door and apartment door. And of course no illegal streaming of TV , movies, music etc ...

properties.name: STUDIO FAMILY FLAT PRENZLAUER BERG
properties.summary: STUDIO FLAT IN PRENZLAUERBERG - EINE OASE FÜR FAMILIEN-little apartment for family-klein aber fein (45 m2): Nagel neu,frisch saniert und neu eingerichtet:Familienfreundlich gemütlich und sauber! Nur 5 Minuten von S Bahn entfernt ( S Prenzlauer Alle)!
properties.space: Die Wohnung befindet sich im  Herzen  Prenzlauer Bergs, dem schönsten Viertel der Stadt.  Diese neu, komplett sanierte & renovierte Studio Wohnung befindet sich in einem Eckhaus  im Erdgeschoss. Die Fenster sind mit Elektrorolläden ausgestattet.  Das Studio-Apartement ( ca. 45 m2) verfügt über ein gemütliches Wohn-/Schlafzimmer mit einem bequemen 1,40 breitem Boxspringbett, einem Doppelstockbett - liebevoll auf Maaß gebaut von unserem Profi Tischler - richtige Highlight nicht nur für unsere kleinen Gäste, sowohl  auch für alle Erwachsenen. Eine  gemütliche Wohnecke mit Ledercouch sowie ein  kleiner  TV Bereich sorgen fürs Wohlbefinden  und für die  Entspannung. Die moderne und neue komplett eingerichtete Küche ist mit einem   Kaffeevollautomaten ausgestattet, welcher  euch  jeden Morgen mit  frischem und   aromatischem  Espresso oder Kaffee per Knopfdruck verwöhnen wird. Ein  Backoffen , Toaster, Induktion Elektroherd, Geschirrspülmaschine, Unterbaukühlschrank, Wasserkocher, Mikrowelle

properties.neighborhood_overview: Unsere Wohnung befindet sich im Szeneviertel  von Prenzlauer Berg.  Von hier aus sind sie  mit der Tram oder U-Bahn in 15-20 min am Alex, an der Hackenschen Höfen. Von dort seid ihr in ca.  15-20 Minuten an der Dom oder  Museums Insel.   Ein Katzensprung von der  Museums Insel entfernt ,  befindet sich das  Brandenburger Tor - ein Wahrzeichen von Berlin!  Nehmen Sie sich Zeit und erkunden Sie auch den Prenzlauer Berg.  Jeden Samstag gibt es  den bekannten Bio -Markt am Kollwitzplatz.  Jeden Sonntag  -  Flohmarkt  am Mauerpark. Erkunden Sie die wunderschönen  Cafés, alternativen Läden  und  Bars in den  Straßen des Prenzlauer Bergs . Für die Nachtschwärmer befinden sich   zahlreichen Clubs, Bars und Cafés  in unmittelbarer Umgebung . Im Sommer solltet ihr unbedingt  den schönen  Volkspark Friedrichshain mit seinen  Seen, Fontänen und Märchenbrunnen besuchen.  VERKEHRSMITTEL: S Bahn, Tram und Taxi  Stand  - 5 Gehminuten entfernt; PARKPLÄTZE:  Öffentliche Parkplätze gibt es direkt in der
properties.notes: Gutes Benehmen und ruhiges Verhalten gegenüber unseren Nachbarn (nach 22.00 Uhr) sind  uns sehr  wichtig!  Die gesamte Wohnung haben wir für   euch  liebe- u.  geschmackvoll eingerichtet . Bitte geht auch vorsichtig und liebevoll  mit allem was ihr benutzt um.  Dafür sind wir  und unsere weiteren Gäste euch    sehr dankbar!

Kostenlose Parkplätze - zirka 1 km entfernt  (Ostseestrasse: neben dem Supermarkt REWE ). Rauchen nur draußen erlaubt  (auch im Hinterhof: dafür benutzen Sie bitte einen Aschenbecher.  - Check in - 15.00-20.00 Uhr  - Check out - 10.00 Uhr - Check in von 20.00 bis 23.00 - gegen Aufpreis  - 50.00 Euro  (Zahlung in bar bei der Ankunft). - CITY TAX (Übernachtungssteuer : 5 % des Netto Übernachtung  Preis + MwSt) .Diese Steuer ist nicht im Preis inbegriffen, sie muss   direkt in der Wohnung bei Ankunft  in bar bezahlt werden.  Die Höhe der Steuer wird individuell per Mail zugesandt.  - Partys oder Veranstaltungen  in der Wohnung sind nicht gestattet! - Keine Tiere erwünscht! - Reinigung (einmalig) - 85 Euro - Zahlung bei der Ankunft in Bar. Standard - Fest Preis = 75 euro  pro Nacht für 2 Personen; jeder weitere Person- 30 Euro  zusätzlich pro Übernachtung.
properties.host_about:
Ich lebe  und arbeite seit 2001 in Berlin und habe in und mit dieser Stadt vieles erleben dürfen. Berlin ist in den Jahren meine Heimat geworden. 
Ich arbeite seit 14 Jahren in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg! Die Arbeit  macht  mir richtig Spaß!  Ich manage und  betreue mehrere  Ferienwohnungen   in Berlin!  Ich mag reisen  und neue Menschen kennenlernen. Deswegen  für  mich soo wichtig  das je Gast  fühlt sich bei uns  wie Zuhause!!!

Mit freundlichen Grüßen

N. Pohl

properties.notes: Unmittelbar fußläufig zu erreichen ist der ehemaliger Fughafen Tempelhof (Tempelhofer Freiheit), Victoria Park, Curry 36, Potsdamer Platz, Sony Center, Check Point Charly, Jüdisches Museum Berlin,(Lindenstraße), Technische Museum in der Luckenwalder Straße. properties.name: Lux Berlin 1: boutique & design
properties.summary: "Lux Berlin 1" is a stylish boutique apartment on the ever-popular Oderberger Strasse in the trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg, bordering on Mitte. The apartment is fully equipped for long stays; please contact me for special monthly rates.
properties.space: LUX BERLIN 1 is on the 4th floor of a restored turn-of-the-century building and has a balcony with a superb view over the entire Oderberger Strasse. You can watch the people stroll up and down the Kastanienallee while having coffee in the morning or the sun set over the Mauerpark while sipping a glass of wine in the evening. The apartment has been completely remodelled and renovated while maintaining original features like arched windows and beautiful hardwood floors and is decorated with an eclectic mix of contemporary design furniture and vintage pieces from the 60's & 70's. "Lux Berlin 1" combines old-Berlin charm with modern-day comfort and offers an exclusive living environment in one of the prettiest, most vibrant neighbourhoods of Berlin. properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the trendy, vibrant district of Prenzlauer Berg, bordering on artistic, cosmopolitan Mitte. The Oderberger Strasse is a very lively yet very relaxed street that offers the distinctively bohemian vibe Prenzlauer Berg has been made famous for. Artsy cafés, quaint boutiques and laid back restaurants make it a favourite destination of locals and visitors alike.  Neighbourhood highlights include the Kastanienallee with its dozens of bars, restaurants and coffee shops -among which the renowned Prater, Berlin’s oldest beer garden- and the Mauerpark with its very popular Sunday flea market. The entertainment complex of the Kulturbrauerei is just around the corner, as well as the Kollwitzplatz with its fine wining and dining (and, of course, shopping). The not-to-be-missed Berlin Wall Memorial is in the vicinity of the apartments whereas Berlin landmarks such as the TV Tower or the Museum Island are a leisurely stroll.  This is an ideal base for exploring Berlin: rig
properties.transit: Underground: U2 Eberswalder Str.  Tram: M1, M12 EberswalderStr., M10 Jahn-Ludwig-Sportpark  (all 2-5 min. on foot from the apartment)  Sample distances: -Alexanderplatz: subway 5 min. / on foot 20 min. -Hackescher Markt: tram  5 min / on foot 15 min. -Museum Island: tram 7 min. / on foot 20 min.  -Friedrichstrasse: tram 15 min. -Potsdamerplatz / Brandenburger Tor: subway 15 min.
properties.house_rules: *Smoking allowed only on the balcony! *No illegal downloading! *City tax: 5% of the rental price  (not included in the rental price, due upon arrival)  *Late check-in fee (check-in after 19:00 & on public holidays): 20 EUR *Guests with small children: please ask before booking! *For monthly bookings only: additional cleaning fee: 35 EUR
properties.host_about: A Berliner by choice, I was drawn to the charms of the city over a decade ago. I'd love to share my Berlin experience with you!

properties.name: Beautiful bright flat - central
properties.summary: This beautiful rustic flat lays right in the middle of Charlottenburg and is surrounded by coffee-shops, parks and sightseeing Highlights (for example "Schloss Charlottenburg). It is also perfectly connected to rest of the city.
properties.space: The apartment is in the top (5.) floor of a historically protected apartment house from 1893. Everything is really cosy and mostly made of wood. Great cealing windows guarantee a lot of light.   There is a big bed in the galery (190 x 150 cm) and a sleeping couch can be extended to 200 x 170 cm. The big balcony is directed to the south. Broadband - Internet (with Wireless Lan) is free of charge and you will also find a big TV Set. The pentry-kitchen contains all necessary items (and you can always ask me for anything that is missing). Please note: There is no elevator. The entire place is extremely cosy and makes you want to stay there :-) The apartment is located in the heart of Charlottenburg a historic and very animated district with many cafes, bars, restaurants, parks and tourist attractions like the "Schloss Charlottenburg with it`s great Lustgarden" which make the former West Berlin so famous and attractive. It is also close to the "Messe Berlin" (excibition grounds).  The area

properties.transit: Please use the homepage of the Berliner Verkehrsbetriebe / BVG to find your way from the airports (the best connection depends on the time of the day). At the flat you will find the following stations: Subway (U2): Sophie Charlotte Platz  S-Bahn (Ringbahn): Messe Nord ICC Bus (309 / N2): Sophie Charlotte Platz
properties.access: - Free Wifi in the apartment - A place to put away your bikes safely - Free parking on the streets  - Grocery stores are just around the corner - A big balcony to the south - Good bakery in front of the door
properties.interaction: Contact me anytime for assistance. I live nearby.
properties.house_rules: No Parties
properties.host_about: In Berlin geboren und mit dieser Stadt in inniger Liebe verbunden, vermiete ich nun seit mittlerweile 3 Jahren eine wunderschöne Dachwohnung im historischen Zentrum von Berlin. Da ich im gleichen Haus wohne, helfe ich allen Besuchern gerne in allen Belangen (von Sightseeingtipps bis zum Salzstreuer).

properties.name: Wohnung in Berlin zentrum,Schloss Strasse!
properties.summary: Sehr saubere und komfortable Wohnung in Berlin zentrum.Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen Gemütlichkeit, Küche und Licht. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für paare und geschäftsreisende. Die Bushaltestelle ist direkt vor der Haustür.
properties.space: Das Apartment besteht aus einem Wohnzimmer, Küche und Bad. Die stabile Couch im Wohnzimmer ist ausziehbar, so dass 4 Personen komfortabel übernachten können. Die Küche ist vollständig mit den wichtigsten Küchenutensilien ausgestattet (Kühlschrank mit Tiefkühlfach, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Toaster, Geschirr, Besteck, Töpfe etc.). Das Duschbad mit Dusche und großem Waschbecken ist sehr sauber. Eine Waschmaschine ist auch vorhanden.  Die Internetverbindung ist sehr schnell. Die Wohnung verfügt außerdem über einen kleinen Balkon mit Blick ins Grüne. Parkplätze sind direkt vor der Haustür in der kleinen Straße genug zur Verfügung. properties.neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt in eine ruhige und nette haus. Die Schloßstraße ist die Haupteinkaufsstraße im Bezirk Steglitz. Zwischen Walter-Schreiber-Platz und Rathaus Steglitz liegt ein eigenständiges, lebhaftes Zentrum mit Restaurants, Läden, Theater und Kinos. Neben den Einkaufzentren Das Schloss, Forum Steglitz und Schloss-Straßen-Center ergänzen KARSTADT-Warenhaus, Naturkaufhaus Galleria.

properties.transit: Bis zum nächsten U9-Bahnhof sind es 10 min zu laufen (U-Walther-Schreiber-Platz) und S-Banhof sind es 6 min zu laufen(S-Bahnhof Feuerbachstraße) Von hier aus kommt man innerhalb von 15 min zu allen Sehenswürdigkeiten in der Innenstadt. Bis zum Flughafen Schönefeld sind es 35min mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln oder 20 min. mit dem Auto. Zum Flughhafen Tegel benötigt man ca. 30 mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln und 20 min mit dem Auto. Das historische Schloss Strasse mit seinen vielen shopping Geschäften, Eisdielen, Supermärkten, Restaurants und Cafés zu Fuß in 10min zu erreichen.
properties.access: Ich wohne in der nähe und kann jederzeit Schlüssel übergeben.
properties.house_rules: Rauchen ,partys und haustiere streng verboten

properties.name: Single room, perfect located!
properties.summary: Hello traveller:) Welcome to our shared flat in Neukölln. Your room will be not too big (12sm) but ,like our living room, headed to the inner yard, which creates a cosy atmosphere. You will appreciate it, cause on the other hand you step out of the door directly into the chaos. Berlin really never sleeps:) Its also possible to get an additional room in our flat. Feel free to ask me about that!

properties.name: Gemütliches Gästezimmer in Berlin-Tempelhof
properties.summary: Das Gästezimmer ist ein Zimmer in unserer 100qm großen Wohnung. Sie liegt sehr zentral in der Nähe der U+S-Bahn-Station Tempelhof. Die Küche kann von unsere Gäste auch genutzt werden um sich selbst zu versorgen. Wir freuen uns auf Paare, Singles, Geschäftsreisende und alle, die Tiere gerne haben. Außerdem sprechen wir drei Sprachen: Deutsch, Englisch und Russisch.
properties.space: Das Gästezimmer ist ein Zimmer in unserer 100qm großen Wohnung. Sie liegt sehr zentral in der Nähe der U+S-Bahn-Station Tempelhof. Bis zur Stadtmitte sind es nur 10-15 Minuten. Die Wohnung liegt in der 6. Etage (mit Fahrstuhl). Von dort hat man einen schönen Ausblick über die Hauptstadt. Die Küche kann von unseren Gäste auch genutzt werden um sich selbst zu versorgen. Unser Wohnzimmer ist 30 qm groß. Von der gemütlichen Couch kann man über Beamer einen schönen Fernsehabend mit Kino-Atmosphäre genießen. Er hat aber seinen eigenen Schlafplatz... :-) Wir freuen uns auf Paare, Singles, Geschäftsreisende und alle, die Tiere gerne haben. Wir sprechen drei Sprachen: Deutsch, Englisch und Russisch. Für Fragen stehen wir gerne zur Verfügung.

properties.name: Cozy Altbau Room With Balcony In Neukölln
properties.summary: My flat is near the famous roof-club Klunkerkranich and the Tempelhofer Feld. There are a lot of nice places around like Villa Neukölln, Lavanderia Vecchia, Kindl Stuben.  So if you wanna have a good time in Berlin and you like to discover the multi-cultural area of Neukölln with its new clubs and bars, you will love my place. Use my balcony for breakfast or the hammock to relax. For rainy days you have an TV and a lot of games and books. If you want you can use my old PlayStation 2.

Ich wohne im tollen Flughafenkiez in Neukölln und ich liebe es mit dem Fahrrad über das Tempelhofer Feld zu fahren.

properties.name: artsy&cosy in authentic neighborhd
properties.summary: my sweet and cosy apartment is located in a classical berlin apartment block in the area of wedding, which is slowly becoming more hip, but still has an authentic feeling to it. public transportation is super close. mitte and the famous tv tower are only a few stations away.
properties.space: i tried to give a very personal touch to my place, so i feel home and comfortable when i'm in berlin. i hope it will feel the same for you. there's different styles and things from all over the world combined. it's quite a colorful mix, but still simple and honest.
properties.description: my sweet and cosy apartment is located in a classical berlin apartment block in the area of wedding, which is slowly becoming more hip, but still has an authentic feeling to it. public transportation is super close. mitte and the famous tv tower are only a few stations away. i tried to give a very personal touch to my place, so i feel home and comfortable when i'm in berlin. i hope it will feel the same for you. there's different styles and things from all over the world combined. it's quite a colorful mix, but still simple and honest. i will be there when you arrive to hand over the keys and give you a short introduction to my place and the area, feel free contacting me whenever you need help with something. i'm usually always available on my cellphone. properties.neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located at the 4th floor of a classical Berlin apartment block in the area of Wedding, which is slowly becoming more hip, but still has an authentic feeling to it.
properties.transit: the next access to public transportation is only two minutes away. the U8 which is underground line 8 will take you to prenzlauer berg, the wall memorial and the mauerpark with famous flea market on sundays (5min), mitte with tv-tower and shopping (10min) and kreuzberg/neukoelln (15-30min)
properties.interaction: i will be there when you arrive to hand over the keys and give you a short introduction to my place and the area, feel free contacting me whenever you need help with something. i'm usually always available on my cellphone.
properties.house_rules: no parties, no pets, and no smoking.
properties.host_about:
hi there. because i love to travel a lot and i love to share - i'd really like to welcome you to my sweet apartment.
i'll always try to make it nice and comfortable for you. 

one of the most enjoyable things about my apartment might be the balkony, you can sit there and relax with a beautiful view over the city and because you're on the top floor, nothing disturbes the look into the wide sky above you, and on the park nearby.

friends, music and dancing, coffee, sunshine, traveling, reading books and eating good, healthy food are the things i enjoy most in my life at the moment.

if you come to my apartment and to berlin, i hope you'll love it as much as i do!
don't miss the mauerpark on sundays and my favourite café in hufelandstraße 13, best coffee in town.

hope to see you soon

:)

properties.space: Nonsmoking apartement !! Smoking is not allowed. Only outside on the terrace. No parties allowed, due to the noise problem for the neighbourhood !! We will conduct a personal check-in and check-out. The checkin and checkout is obligatory. No self-checkin-out.  Standard checkin-time is 6 p.m. and checkout 10 a.m. Other times available on request. We try to be as flexible as possible. IMPORTANT ! You have to clean up the apartement before leaving. Redeliver the apartement in a fair condition, so we are able to clean it later perfectly in a reasonable time. The "Blueberry Hill" apartement is a very well equipped apartement in the center of Berlin. It is sunny, very calm, very clean and there is nothing you will miss.  Everything is of good quality. properties.neighborhood_overview: We have a very individual and nice neighbourhood although we are in a big city. People are friendly and helpfull. No problems with foreigners or whatever.
properties.notes: We are living next door and we can quickly provide you with all you need. Informations and also equpippment for your apartement. We like to be in close contact with our guests, if they like it.
properties.transit: There are all public transportations availble very close by. Underground-, buss- and trainstations are only a few hundred meters away. Taxi of course too. It is also easy to go by bicycle in Berlin.
properties.access: Separate, own access. Before arrival we will exactly inform you by email or phone how you will have access. Pls send a message or a phonecall just 1 hour before arriving.
properties.interaction: everything is available ! Email, sms, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), fax and phone of course. We are living next door and mostly available for you easyly day and night.
properties.house_rules: Smoking in the apartement is forbidden. You may smoke on the balcony outside. No parties allowed. checkin after 18:00 o´clock checkout before 10:00 o`clock Other delivery and redeliverytimes on request possible, but not obligatory. A personal, individual checkin and checkout is obligatory. As we deliver the apartement in a very clean status, we like to ask our guests to delivery it also in an acceptable cleaned condition.  We have a high valued equippment and furnitures. Pls take care. Many thanks.
properties.host_about:
Wir freuen uns auf Ihren Besuch bei uns in Berlin !

Wohnen Sie komfortabel, modern und gemütlich in unserem "Blueberry Hill". Lernen Sie den Berliner Kiez im Original kennen. Hier wohnen Sie in einem der letzten echten Kiez - in Moabit. Ohne Touristen und viel Tamtam. Sie wohnen hier sehr ruhig, sehr hell und sonnig. Kaum zu glauben, aber Sie sind mitten in Berlin.

Sie werden sich in unserem Apartement wohlfühlen. Es ist fast alles vorhanden. Es bleiben kaum Wünsche offen. Wir bieten Ihnen auf Anfrage viele Zusatzdienste an, die Sie sonst nirgends finden werden. 

Wir sind für Sie fast immer erreichbar und können Ihnen schnell Unterstützung und Hilfe bieten. Wir wohnen im gleichen Haus bzw. arbeiten in der Nähe.

Herzlich willkommen !

Located in Berlin-Moabit which is a district of Berlin-Mitte, the city-west as well as the center of Berlin is easily accessible. The apartment can accommodate up to 11 people. It has 3 separate bedrooms. Sightseeing, nightlife, Tegel Airport and the main station are within easy reach.

The open kitchen is fully equipped and has a dishwasher. The bathroom has a bath, a shower and a washing machine. Furthermore, the apartment has 3 separate bedrooms. properties.name: Ganze Unterkunft – Bungalow
properties.summary: Wir bieten einen voll ausgestatteten Bungalow mit kleiner Terrasse an. Gelegen im Berliner Osten, in ruhiger und grüner Lage mit Parkplatz. Gute Öffentl. Verkehrs-Anbindung an das Berliner Zentrum und Berliner Umland - mit dem Bus in 15 Minuten zur Internationalen Gartenschau (IGA) ab 14.04.2017 ! Check-In: 14:00 Check-Out: 10:00
properties.space: Der Bungalow ist sehr gut für 2 Personen geeignet.  Im Schlafzimmer  befindet sich ein großes Doppelbett mit den Maßen 200 x 180 cm,  2 Nachtschränke, 1 Kleiderschrank , 1 Tisch mit 2 Stühlen, großer Flachbildfernseher mit Satellitenempfang an der Wand , Radio und Festnetztelefon für Ortsgespräche. Das Bad hat eine Dusche, Waschtisch, Toilette, Bidet, elektrischen Handtuchtrockner, Spiegelschrank, Wandschrank und  Waschmaschine. Die komplette Unterkunft hat zusätzlich zur Zentralheizung noch Fußbodenheizung. Die Küche  ist vollständig ausgestattet mit Geschirrspüler, Mikrowelle,  Filterkaffeemaschine,  4-Platten Elektroherd,  Abzugshaube, Kühlschrank und Tiefkühlschrank. Eingangsbereich / Flur mit Garderobenteil.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Die Gärten der Welt IGA 2017 (ca. 15 Autominuten oder mit dem Bus),  Gedenkstätte Hohenschönhausen (Stasi-Knast – 30 Autominuten), der Tierpark Berlin (20 Autominuten) befinden sich in der Nähe und sind auch mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen .  Vor Ort gibt es mehrere Einkaufsmöglichen (Edeka Center,  Drogerie DM,  REWE Markt, Penny).  Mit dem Auto ist man in 30 min auf dem Alexanderplatz und in 45 min im Bereich Potsdamer Platz oder Bahnhof Zoo. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln braucht man etwas länger aber man  hat weniger Stress mit den teuren/knappen Parkplätzen.  Es befinden sich einige Gaststätten und Imbissmöglichkeiten im Umkreis.
properties.notes: Das Objekt ist im Außenbereich videoüberwacht.  Es verfügt über elektrische Jalousien an allen Fenstern.   Frische Bettwäsche und Handtücher liegen bereit Bitte einen Tag vorher die geplante Ankunftszeit durchgeben. Check-in: ab 14:00  Check-out: bis 10:00 (abweichende Zeiten nur nach Absprache) Mindestaufenthalt: 3 Übernachtungen
properties.transit: S-Bahn, Bus und Tram sind in der Nähe. Tram Linie 62 - Entfernung 1 km  3. Bus - Linien 398 und 395 - Entfernung 0,2 km

properties.host_about: Ich bin Rentnerin, die mit ihrem Ehemann - ebenfalls Rentner - im vorhandenen Einfamilienhaus wohnt. Wir sind beide - obwohl Rentner - noch sehr aktiv.

properties.summary: A beautiful, newly renovated apartment with a  rooftop terrace, whirlpool tub and modern interior, located within walking distance from metro lines.  What else can make your stay in Berlin perfect? (apartment available for mid or long term bookings).
properties.space: The apartment is newly renovated and has many luxury features. The modern bathroom is equipped with a spacious design-whirlpool for two and a towel dryer. You deserve a reward after a long day in the city!  You will have your private terrace with a sofa lounge (accessible from the dining-area). This is a perfect place to chill-out for a drink in the evening, or enjoying breakfast in the morning sun.  Our apartment has a trendy kitchen, with brand new appliances.The living room is divided into 2 parts, one part is dining area and other part is socializing area. We have installed a TV for your convenience (with German and some English channels). Our living-room is equipped with a corner sofa which can easily be converted to a comfortable sofa-bed for 2!  The bright bedroom has  a spacious triangle window with nice views. properties.neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located on the border of  Wilmersdorf and Schöneberg in a residential area in the western part of Berlin just a few steps from a beautiful Volkspark Schöneberg. There are many restaurants and bars around as well as shopping possibilities.
properties.notes: Please note! I am sorry to announce that from 1st of May 2016 until further notice, we can due to new regulations in Berlin only accept mid and long term bookings for this apartment (min 2 months stay).
properties.transit: The centre of west Berlin (Kurfurstendamm) is located just 4 stops away by metro. The rest of the city is also very easy to reach by public transportation from Bundesplatz, both by subway (U9) and rail (circle line: S-ring).  Looking forward to your booking!
properties.house_rules: As this is a residential building, we would like to kindly ask you to show respect towards our neighbours by not being too loud or playing loud music after 9 pm. Also, the whirlpool jet stream function must not be used after 9 pm. You will be asked to sign the German agreement about the usage of internet because of the local very strict anti-piracy laws.  Smoking is not allowed in the flat, feel free to use the terrace though.  If these rules are broken, it may be taken into consideration in the deposit.
properties.host_location: Prague, Hlavní město Praha, Czech Republic
properties.host_about:
Hi, I am Magnus from Sweden. I look forward to offer my high quality accommodation in Prague, Budapest,  Berlin & Cape Town to guests from all over the world. I wish I could be in more than one city at a time and to meet all my guests,  but since it is not possible, I have established a great cooperation with local representatives.  Anneli (Prague) & Anna (Budapest) will make sure you get the most out of your stay and give recommendations to the city. A satisfied guest is my best reference. Looking forward to host you! . 

Please note that my CapeTown and Berlin apartments are only available for mid or long term booking requests due to local regulations. From summer 2017 I can also offer accommodation (short or mid term) in Riga (the beautiful capital of Latvia).

properties.name: Modernes Ferienhaus in Berlin
properties.summary: Modernes Ferienhaus mit schönem Garten in ruhiger Umgebung und zentraler Lage in Berlin
properties.space: Das Ferienhaus wurde 2012 saniert und modernisiert und befindet sich in einer ruhigen Einfamilienhausgegend. Über die gute Anbindung mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreicht man in 20 Minuten das Zentrum Berlins. Auf 33 Quadratmeter bietet das Appartement ein Doppelbett, eine offene Küche mit Essbereich sowie ein Bad mit ebenerdiger Dusche und Toilette. Vom Wohnbereich kommen Sie auf die Südterrasse mit Gartenmöbeln und Sonnenschirm. Für kühlere Sommertage ist eine Fußbodenheizung vorhanden. Das Ferienhaus wird von April bis Oktober vermietet.
properties.description: Modernes Ferienhaus mit schönem Garten in ruhiger Umgebung und zentraler Lage in Berlin Das Ferienhaus wurde 2012 saniert und modernisiert und befindet sich in einer ruhigen Einfamilienhausgegend. Über die gute Anbindung mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreicht man in 20 Minuten das Zentrum Berlins. Auf 33 Quadratmeter bietet das Appartement ein Doppelbett, eine offene Küche mit Essbereich sowie ein Bad mit ebenerdiger Dusche und Toilette. Vom Wohnbereich kommen Sie auf die Südterrasse mit Gartenmöbeln und Sonnenschirm. Für kühlere Sommertage ist eine Fußbodenheizung vorhanden. Das Ferienhaus wird von April bis Oktober vermietet. Zur Ferienwohnung gehört ein Carport auf dem Grundstück, hier stellen Sie bequem Ihr Auto ab.  Im Garten können Sie Liegestühle, Grill und Feuerschale nutzen. Berlin-Karlshorst ist ein schöner Ausgangspunkt zur Stadterkundung.  Die Sehenswürdigkeiten von Berlin sind sehr gut mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen.  Sie finden Einkaufsmöglichkei
properties.neighborhood_overview: Berlin-Karlshorst ist ein schöner Ausgangspunkt zur Stadterkundung.  Die Sehenswürdigkeiten von Berlin sind sehr gut mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen.  Sie finden Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Gaststätten in Karlshorst vor.  Das Ferienhaus befindet sich in direkter Nähe zum Tierpark Berlin-Friedrichsfelde.  Den Szenebezirk Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg erreichen Sie mit der U-Bahn in 10 Minuten.  Zu Konzerten in der Wuhlheide und O2-World fahren Sie mit der  S-Bahn oder Straßenbahn. Zum Fernsehturm oder zur Museumsinsel sind Sie mit der U-Bahn unterwegs und in 20 Minuten am Ziel.  Im angrenzenden Bezirk Köpenick können Sie in den Müggelbergen wandern,  im Müggelsee baden oder den sagenumwobenen Teufelssee besuchen.
properties.notes: In Berlin ist eine Übernachtungssteuer von 5% des Übernachtungspreises direkt bei Anreise beim Vermieter zu bezahlen. Im Übernachtungspreis inbegriffen sind Bettwäsche, Handtücher sowie Verbrauchsmittel für Küche und Bad. Die Endreinigung erfolgt durch den Vermieter. Das Ferienhaus wird von April bis Oktober vermietet. Anreise: ab 14.00 Uhr Abreise: bis 11.00 Uhr Individuelle Abreise- und Anreisezeiten können angefragt werden.
properties.transit: Die Anreise mit dem PKW ist unkompliziert.  Von der Autobahn A100 Abfahrt Späthstraße sind es ca. 6 km bis zum Ferienhaus. Bahnreisende können vom Hauptbahnhof mit jeder S-Bahn bis Alexanderplatz fahren und steigen dann um in die U-Bahn U5 bis Tierpark. Anreise vom ZOB Messedamm: Mit der S-Bahn S41 von Messe Nord/ICC bis Frankfurter Allee, dann umsteigen in die U-Bahn U5 bis Tierpark. Beste Verkehrsanbindung mit Bus, Tram, U- und S-Bahn.
properties.access: Zur Ferienwohnung gehört ein Carport auf dem Grundstück, hier stellen Sie bequem Ihr Auto ab.  Im Garten können Sie Liegestühle, Grill und Feuerschale nutzen.
properties.host_about: Ich bin 58 Jahre alt und komme aus Berlin. Ich bin als Steuerberater tätig und falls ich nicht auf Reisen bin, arbeite ich leidenschaftlich im Garten oder am Haus.

properties.summary: There are several bars and cafes just in the our Richardstr, like Sameheads bar, Botega 6, Café Botanico, and many more. 2 minutes from the subway station, line U7, and Karl Marx str, a big commercial center in Berlin. You will enjoy our accomodation for many reason, like the full equipped kitchen, for the beautiful garden in the back, and for us! Our accomodation is open for couples, lone travelers and working travelers. We are also animal friendly!
properties.space: We have a very nice, well located appartament in Rixdorf, an historic village in the center of Neukölln, Berlin. We live in 4 people: me and my girlfriend, our just-some-weeks-old son, and Jack, an Australian living with us. You will have a very comfortable room and as shared space, you can use the living room, the kitchen and obviously the bathroom.

Hey, I'm Diogo, from Brazil and currently living in Berlin! Here I work as a cook, which I have lots of fun with, but music is my passion, specially traditional brazilian rithms! 

When not on duty I'm relaxing at hope in the garden or anywhere in the city. I love meeting friends and new people, and I understand hosting as making part of other people's travel, which can be very nice. I love languages too, and try to learn some. My life motto is that I hate mottos!

properties.name: ♥ Loveley,  cozy and calm room in Neukölln ♥
properties.summary: My Boyfriend and I living in the nice Schillerkiez and we have a room to share with you: a couple, a person travelling alone or on a business trip. We re pleased to show you our nice neighbourhood: we have to big parcs around (the former airport Tempelhof and Hasenheide), nice cafés & bars, little shops, restaurants, a nice market twice a week, everything you ll need is a stone's throw away. The metro is U8 (Boddinstraße).
properties.space: The apartment is situated on the 4th floor (no elevator). I like an apartment being cosy, comfortable and personal. You ll find some vintage and design furniture, some nice plants and some finds from the flea market. We have a balcony where you can enjoy your cigarette.

properties.name: A unique Oasis in Berlin
properties.summary: Located in the hip Kreuzkölln neighborhood, on the beautiful Landwehr canal. The famous Turkish food market and many bars & restaurants are just around.  Short distance from the main U-Bahn links (Hermannplatz and Kotttbusser Tor)  Easy and quick  from/to the airports This Unique Oasis in the heart of Berlin will provide you luxury facilities and comfort. Perfect for traveling couples or friends.
properties.space: This beautifully renovated 100qm duplex is divided into two levels, kitchen, living room and dining room are at the ground level and the bedrooms and bathroom are located on the upper-level. The apartment is located in the rear house which makes it very quiet. The kitchen is fully equipped (coffee machine, microwave, smoothie maker etc.) The spacious dining & living room are a real pleasure after a long day enjoying the city. If you are coming to Berlin with a car, you will be able to park close to the house for free. Also if you are interested in renting a bike, we will point you to the right place.

Kreuzkölln is famous for its vibrant streets and authentic Berlin charm.
properties.interaction: We are happy to share our knowledge and experience of Berlin and answer all of your questions over a glass of wine.

properties.name: Lift& free breakfast-Room in the heart of Kreuzbeg
properties.summary: Stay with us and our newborn baby in the heart of Berlin and experience the real Kreuzberg. It is one of Berlin's most interesting and fascinating districts. You'll experience urban buzz, vibrancy and diversity here at every turn. The streets and buildings have retained their very special atmosphere.  We won't charge extra fee if you travel with your baby.
properties.space: The flat is on the 4th floor (Don't worry, we have an elevator :-D)  Your rented room will provide you with a cosy bed, wardrobe with coathangers, desk + chairs, bed table. The apartment is facing a quiet green courtyard, away from the main street.
properties.description: Stay with us and our newborn baby in the heart of Berlin and experience the real Kreuzberg. It is one of Berlin's most interesting and fascinating districts. You'll experience urban buzz, vibrancy and diversity here at every turn. The streets and buildings have retained their very special atmosphere.  We won't charge extra fee if you travel with your baby. The flat is on the 4th floor (Don't worry, we have an elevator :-D)  Your rented room will provide you with a cosy bed, wardrobe with coathangers, desk + chairs, bed table. The apartment is facing a quiet green courtyard, away from the main street. You will have access to 1 private bedroom, a private toilet for your own use and a shared shower with us. Your are also welcome to use our kitchen including kitchen tools and the fridge. In the spacious living room you are welcome to use the TV. Also the diaper changing table if you travel with your baby :) Being passionate travelers we are open and interested in meeting new people, gettin
properties.neighborhood_overview: Kottie (Kottbusser Tor) is the heart of Kreuzberg, the most trendy district in Berlin with its famous , countless bars & cafe's & restaurants, as well as supermarkets & grocery stores all in walking distance.
properties.notes: - Check in: our cleaning lady is a student and she only can comes after school at 16:00. However you are very welcome to come earlier than check-in time to collect your keys, and hang around. - Self Check-in: You might need to self check-in if we are not home yet. - Free breakfast: We provide free simple breakfast every morning including toast, butter, jam, cereal, milk and tea.  - You should know: We are a young couple with a little baby. So you will hear our baby cries at times. Your private area such as your own room and toilet will be always clean and tidy like in the photos. However shared areas can be messy sometimes when we are in a rush, just like how a family with a baby usually looks like :)
properties.transit: U8 and U1 train station is 1' walking from the building. Buses are around the corner. A short distance to most tourist attractions.
properties.access: You will have access to 1 private bedroom, a private toilet for your own use and a shared shower with us. Your are also welcome to use our kitchen including kitchen tools and the fridge. In the spacious living room you are welcome to use the TV. Also the diaper changing table if you travel with your baby :)
properties.interaction: Being passionate travelers we are open and interested in meeting new people, getting to know the journey, culture, experiences. But also respects one's private time. In any case you can ask us for help if you need any assistance or advise. After making a booking, please write to let us know of your arrival and departure time, so we can arrange your keys and be here for you.
properties.house_rules: - It is possible to check in earlier than our check in time, but the cleaning lady is a student and she can only come at 16:00. Also possible to arrive later if you don't mind self check-in. - Smoking allowed only on the balcony - VERY IMPORTANT: German law is super strict regarding copyright. You will be asked to sign an agreement not to use the internet for illegal activities, for example file sharing platforms (both upload and download) of copyright content. You are responsible for your own internet activities and liable for any damaged fee (up to 1000Euro)  from your action.

Happy to meet new people in new places!!!

properties.name: Central+cosy+spacious - what else?
properties.summary: BERLIN - eine Stadt die pulsiert, inspiriert und fasziniert. Unsere helle, gemütliche und sehr gut ausgestattete Wohnung bietet eine optimale Ausgangsposition die Stadt zu erkunden.  Zentral. Gepflegt. Gemütlich. Hochwertig ausgestattet. Willkommen!
properties.space: - English Version see below - Wir bieten eine helle, gemütliche und hochwertig ausgestattete Wohnung, in der sich bisher jeder wohl gefühlt hat. Die Wohnung befindet sich in einem Altbau von 1904, welcher Ende 2015 neu saniert wurde. Die Wohnung befindet sich in dritten Stock und bietet durch die großen Fenster und den Balkon viel Tageslicht. Diese möchten wir unsere Gäste spüren lassen. Das Ganze wird von unserer Katze komplettiert (Achtung Allergiker!), die dich auch mal gerne im Zimmer besucht.  Herzlich willkommen! We offer you a bright and cosy room in a high quality equipped apartment. The apartment is located in an old building from 1904, which just has been renovated in the end of 2015. We tried our best to furnish our apartment in a cosy, nature loving and delightful way. Please n

properties.neighborhood_overview: In der unmittelbaren Nachbarschaft finden sich Supermärkte, Drogerien, Bäcker, Restaurants, Imbisse und sogar ein Krankenhaus. Right around the corner you'll find supermarkets, drug stores, bakeries, restaurants, fast food and even a hospital.
properties.notes: Check-In unter der Woche ab 18 Uhr, am Wochenende nach Absprache. Check-Out: 11:00 Uhr Check-In on weekdays 6pm (or later - as you prefer), on weekends we are flexible. Check-Out: 11am
properties.transit: Die Verkehrsanbindung ist ausgezeichnet. 6 Gehminuten zu der Station S + U Lichtenberg, eine Tramstation und Bushaltestelle gleich vor der Tür. Das Ostkreuz ist zwei Stationen mit der S-Bahn entfernt, der Alexanderplatz sechs. Der S Frankfurter Allee ist lediglich zwei U-Bahn-Stationen entfernt. Access to public transport can't be better. Right in front of the door there is a bus and 'tram' station. After 6 min of walking you'll reach 'S + U Lichtenberg' with subway, S-train and train connections. 10' to Alexanderplatz, 20' to the Centralstation,..
properties.access: Unseren Gäste steht das Privatzimmer, die Küche, der Balkon und das Badezimmer jederzeit zur Verfügung. Das Badezimmer verfügt natürlich auch über eine Badewanne zum Entspannen. Das Wohnzimmer kann gerne während des Tages mitbenutzt werden. Im Privatzimmer gibt es ein Doppelbett und bei drei Gästen wird ein zusätzliches aufblasbares Bett gestellt :).  Our guests have access to the private room, the well equipped kitchen with the attached balcony and the feel-good-bathroom with a bathtub. Feel free to use the living room during daytime. There is a double bed in the private room and if you are three people we provide you an extra airbed, bed linen etc.
properties.interaction: Bei Fragen reagieren wir umgehend. Do not hesitate to ask us any question :).
properties.house_rules: Das Rauchen innerhalb der Wohnung ist nicht gewünscht.  Keine Gäste von außerhalb erlaubt.  Schuhe müssen beim Eingang ausgezogen werden. Wir bitten zudem höflich die Tür (nur wenn Sie nicht in der Wohnung sind!) einen kleinen Spalt offen zu lassen, damit die Katze sich in der gesamten Wohnung bewegen kann. Bitte immer selbst aufräumen und saubermachen wenn ihr z. B. die Küche benutzt habt oder das Badezimmer in ein Meer verwandelt habt ;).  Smoking is not permitted. It is not allowed to bring strangers to the apartment. No shoes in the flat. When you are not at home we kindly ask you to leave the door of your room open (only a tiny tiny gap), that our cat can walk around in the entire flat. Please clean up after yourselves e.g. when using the kitchen.
properties.host_about:
Mein Name ist Michel, ich bin ein fröhlicher, norddeutscher Jung und würde mich als absolut gesellschaftsfähig einschätzen. Gerne schwinge ich Zuhause den Kochlöffel und probiere mit diesem am liebsten Rezepte, welche nur in meinem Kopf existieren. Meistens schmeckt das auch. Meistens...

Das Reisefieber hat mich schon lange gepackt und am liebsten lerne ich fremde Länder durch die Menschen kennen, die ein jedes Land so besonders machen: der Bevölkerung. Aus diesem Grunde sehe ich in Airbnb die optimale Möglichkeit mich in fremden aber auch bekannten Ländern zu bewegen.

Ich freue mich neue Menschen kennzulernen, Geschichten zu teilen oder einfach Tipps für die Gegend zu bekommen.

Ich treibe gerne Sport wie Basketball, Surfen, Snowboarding, Tennis uvm. und bin am liebsten mit dem Rad unterwegs.

properties.name: Our Guestroom at Potsdamer Platz
properties.summary: Come live with us , three students in their mid tweenties, right in the heart of Berlin, Potsdamer Platz. We will show you hospitality and welcome you to our 5 room apartment. Check for Details if you are interested! :)
properties.space: The Guestroom will be comfortable for 2 People or a loving cozied up couple. 10m² space (The bed is Queensize, 140x200cm) If needed we can arrange an extra matress in the guestroom.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Potsdamer Platz is in Berlin`s heart. You can pretty much find anything you want close by.  -Shopping areas like Germanys biggest shopping mall (Mall of Berlin), OV Cinema, Berlins biggest Casino, Theaters (Blue man Group for example.) by foot you can go to tourist attractions like the: -Brandenburger Tor -Checkpoint Charlie -Tiergarten -Mall of Berlin  -Unter den Linden -Sony Center  - ... all in a 10min walking radius.
properties.notes: You will get your own set of Keys and you can lock your room.
properties.transit: Potsdamer Platz is a big junction point for a vieriety of subway, train and bus lines. you can pretty much reach every point in Berlin with ease.  - 10min to the Kudamm - 10min to the Alexanderplatz -...
properties.access: Apart from our private rooms, nothing is off limits. You are free to use both our bathrooms and make yourself something to eat in our kitchen or chill on our couch/ balcony anytime you want. You`ll get access to our 100mbit/s high speed Internet connection. If you need to wash some clothes/ iron them, we got you covered. Towels will be provided.
properties.interaction: Usually, there's somebody at home to answer all of your questions and have a lengthy chat.  If the work allows it, we are oftentimes  available to show you around and go to a restaurant or just watch a movie on the comfy couch. If you have to work or just want some privacy we will of course respect that and leave you be.
properties.house_rules: We are very relaxed people, so if you have any suggestions or problems just tell us :) Pets are not allowed! Smoking is only allowed on the Balcony! File Sharing / Torrenting online is prohibited ( Annoying german Laws) Please leave the common areas clean after their use ( Kitchen, bathrooms,...)
properties.host_about:
A half Brazilian, half Italian born and raised in Berlin.  Because of my roots i always had a feeling for different cultures and languages. ( Grew up Trilingual and added English to that list pretty fast) I was lucky to be able to travel a lot , so i know how it feels to be in a completely different environment or country. 

My 2 roommates also study and their interest are a mixture of going out to party, motorcycling, traveling,...

As for myself i like to experience new stuff but i always come back to my love for Movies and TV series, or playing a lot of poker and my technological affinity. 

if you have any further question just hit me up and i`ll answer you hopefully everything you want to know :)

Also you find many restaurants, cafés and bars near my apartment to make your stay perfect. Nevertheless it is not loud in the apartment.

properties.name: Elegant Flat on trendy MITTE street
properties.summary: Spacious flat in the trendiest neighbourhood of Berlin. Lush beds & cozy living room. The neighbourhood offers cool restaurants, cafés & bars. Upscale + local Berlin brands & most of Berlin landmarks are just down the road.
properties.space: Experience living in the best spot of Berlin in a lush apartment complete with everything you would need for a comfortable stay. -The entire apartment consists of 2 bedrooms with super lush kingsize beds, a spacious and cosy living room with french style balcony, big toilet and bath and a fully equipped kitchen for some gourmet cooking. -WIFI -Big UHD Smart TV with Netflix for home entertainment. -Awesome neighbourhood guaranteed! :)

The Neighbourhood The apartment is centrally located and yet cozy and quiet at night. properties.neighborhood_overview: The Neighbourhood The apartment is centrally located and yet cozy and quiet at night. The street itself and the adjacent streets are home to very cool restaurants, high-end Berlin local labels for fashion, handcrafts, art and design objects. -A mere 5 minutes walk to Hackescher Markt/Hackesher Hofe, a buzzing spot full of restaurants, bars and shops. It also has weekend market for food, clothing and other interestings objects. -8 minutes walk towards Alexanderplatz to see the Rotes Rathaus, Berlin TV tower and other nearby landmarks of Berlin like Berliner Dom, River Spree, Museum Island, Nikolaiviertel and other historical spots. Weekend Art Market at Museum Island is worth visiting as well.  -5 Minutes walk towards Auguststrasse which is a street full of awesome boutique galleries.  -3 Minutes to Torstrasse which is home to fabulous quirky bars, restaurants and shops.  -Next to Mulackstrasse which is a known street for Berlin fashion labels. -Surrounded by rooftop bars and cool clubs

properties.space: Located nicely, close to some city centers. In around 20 Minutes you would get by bus and walk easily to Hauptbahnhof, Brandenburg Gate, Ku'Damm (Kurfürstendamm), Wilmersdorfer Straße. Around 30 minutes to get to Alexanderplatz. Around the corner there are two bicylce rentings. Both ask for 10€/bike/day. Lots of nice food stores in a distance of about 200-350m. Turkish, Arabic, Vietnamese, Chinese, Indian, Italian, Spanish cuisine. Starts very cheap at 2€ for one kebab. Rewe, a good super market, is also around 200m away. Also 200m to the Spree which is a nice river. In the apartment you'll find a high definition projector whos picture has a diagonal of 3m (118"). HTPC with more than 200 high def movies and TV-Shows. properties.neighborhood_overview: Central neighborhood. Inside of Berlin Ring. Lovely area, young people, multi cultural.
properties.notes: Read my reviews. If you find a place with better reviews, book it!!!
properties.transit: 10 minute walk to "Ringbahn" wich goes in a circle all around Berlin. The closest bus stop is around 200m away.  You don't have to change the bus to go to: Hauptbahnhof, Alexanderplatz, Brandenburg Gate & Reichstag. Change the Bus once to go to: Boulevard Berlin Shopping mile in the south of Berlin (Hollister and Primark are located there), Ostbahnhof (Berghain and east side gallery are located there). By bike it will take you 15-25 minutes to go to Reichstag, Brandenburg Gate etc.
properties.access: Wifi. Bathtub/shower. Hair dryer, hair straightener. Washing Maschine. Shower Gel, Shampoo, tooth paste, washing powder, a towel for everyone, bed sheets.
properties.interaction: I am available 24/7. So far there was not a single problem which couldn't be solved easily.
properties.house_rules: 1. After the booking is complete I'll send you a link to a youtube video. The first 1:30 are ABSOLUTELY MANDATORY. The rest is not but I highly recommend watching it. 2. In Germany it is totally illegal to download copyrighted content. If you use torrent based downloads you will very probably be fined (not by me). 3. Smoking only in the kitchen. ATTENTION! The smoke detector in the kitchen is turned off by default. Thats due to the fact that guests smoking are much more likely than a house fire. If you need maximum security AND you are a non-smoker please turn it on yourself or let me know. When you enter the kitchen it's located on the top right corner. 4. No crazy party people. If entertainment system is in use or you talk loudly with one another the windows have to be closed. Otherwise the neighbours will lose their s**t. Same if you are unnecessarily loud while being in the inner yard. 5. When you leave do NOT leave the key in the key hole. Leave it on the table for example. NOT in
properties.host_about: 2nd generation Berliner, student, kitchenpsychologist and -philosopher, sportsman. I don't like beer.

properties.name: URBAN DESIGN APARTMENT (3 ROOMS & 85 SQM) II
properties.summary: In the heart of Berlin you will find this modern furnished 3 - room apartment (85sqm). Located in Berlin-Moabit which is a district of Berlin-Mitte, the city-west as well as the center of Berlin is easily accessible. The apartment can accommodate up to 10 people. It has 2 separate bedrooms. Sightseeing, nightlife, Tegel Airport and the main railway station are within easy reach.
properties.space: This 3 - room apartment is approximately 85sqm in size and accommodates up to 10 people. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Free public parking is available directly in front of the front door. On request, a parking space can be booked (10 Euro / day). The bright, spacious apartment (about 85 m²) has a spacious living room with a large flat screen TV, two comfortable sleeping couches as well as a large kitchen and a cozy dining area. The open plan kitchen is fully equipped and has a dishwasher. The modern bathroom has a rainshower shower and a washing machine. Furthermore, the apartment has 2 separate bedrooms. properties.name: Skyview Apartment im Sony Center
properties.summary: Im Herzen von Berlin  Im 10. OG des Berliner Sony Center liegt mein komplett neu renoviertes und mit neuen Design Möbel ausgestattete Apartment. Dieses wunderschöne 100m² Apartment bietet Ihnen "the modern way of life" in vollen Zügen.  Willkommen!
properties.space: Im Herzen von Berlin  Im 10. OG des Berliner Sony Center liegt mein komplett neu renoviertes und mit neuen Design Möbel ausgestattete Apartment. Diese wunderschöne 100m² Apartment bietet Euch "the modern way of life" in vollen Zügen.  Das Apartment verfügt über Schlafmöglichkeiten für bis zu 6 Personen. Die beiden Schlafzimmer sind je mit einem komfortablen, neuen 1,80m x 2,00m großen Boxspringbett ausgestattet und im Wohnbereich befindet sich eine ausziehbare Schlafcouch mit einer Liegefläche von 1,60m x 2,00m. Zudem verfügt das Apartment über eine kleine Essecke mit 6 Sitzplätzen. Die beiden Badezimmer, eines mit einer begehbaren Dusche, das andere mit Badewanne, bieten ausreichend Platz. Company rules for the apartment Smoking is prohibited in the whole apartment. In case of any kind of damage in the apartment, please notify us immediatly. From 10 pm on please held the noise on low volume, so our neigbours won't be disturbed. Please leave the apartment in the same place that you found it. Apart from that feel at home, we wish you a good time in berlin.

properties.name: Designer Townhouse in central Berlin!
properties.summary: You will experience our own designer townhouse by staying in a quiet master bedroom with a king-size bed + one 1 40x70 children´s bed  with beautiful view to the terrace/garden with 1 children´s room that has a regular 90x200 adult matrass. You will have access to an open kitchen and living room. This very creative neighborhood in Prenzlauer Berg is crawling with wine bars, cafes & restaurants. It is walking distance to Alexanderplatz (15 min), Kollwitz (10 min) and right next to the city park.
properties.space: Designer Townhouse in the heart of Berlin You´ll stay in a quiet bedroom in the heart of Berlin which has a king-size bed with beautiful view/door to terrace and your very own luscious garden. Additionally, the master bedroom has 1 child’s bed (140x70 cm) and the children´s room has a bunk bed in the form of a house with a regular 90x200 cm adult matrass so the apartment is ideal for families with 1-2 young children). The apartment has three rooms (master bedroom, childrens room and living room), two bathrooms and has an open kitchen and living room combined, and is in a new modern building with all the latest amenities. Throughout the apartment you have designer furniture and its location in the middle of Prenzlauer Berg is full of actors, artists and writers.

Designer Townhouse in the heart of Berlin You´ll stay in a quiet bedroom in the heart of Berlin which has a king-size bed with beautiful view/door to terrace and your very own luscious garden. Additionally, the master bedroom has 1 child’s bed (140x70 cm) and the children´s room has a bunk bed in the form of a house with a regular 90x200 cm adult matrass so the apartment is ideal for families with 1-2 young children). The apartment has three rooms (master bedroom, childrens room and living room)
properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is very centrally located in the very child friendly and hip area of Prenzlauer Berg, located 1.5km from Alexanderplatz, and only 5 min walk to the big park (Volkspark Friedrichshain). There are many restaurants, bars, café´s and playgrounds in this buzzing area. There is also a big grocery store (Kaisers) open to midnight only 250 m away.
properties.notes: The garden has over 20 herbs and an automatic watering system. The terrace has a designer table and chairs for 8 people including a Weber grill for BBQs. The terrace also has a trampoline, and only 20 m away the house also has a private mutual garden with a giant trampoline and playhouse/swings.
properties.transit: There is public transportation in terms of a tram stop leaving  200 m from the apartment, and only 1.5 km to Alexanderplatz. Berlin is one of the best connected cities in the world in terms of public transportation with taxi, bus, underground and train accessible from most central points.
properties.access: You can use the kitchen if you'd like to cook something and you have your own bathroom and walk in closet including high speed Internet. The terrace and garden has a BBQ grill, designer table/chairs and herbal garden and trampoline which you are free to use. If you have children you are free to use all toys as well, both in apartment and garden. Your guest area is part of my private apartment that we live in but that we rent out while we are travelling.
properties.interaction: We will offer a list of all our recommendations and offer a curated experience for the neighborhood and Berlin as a whole. Especially for families we have really great recommendations for activities with the children.
properties.host_about: We're a Swedish/German family with a toddler named Ronja, 4.5 years. I am a Swedish entrepreneur living in Berlin over 10 years, and often away on business or private travel where we rent out our guest room in our own private place! Nothing beats experiencing a new culture from somebody´s home! We also use AirBnB whenever we go anywhere.

properties.name: Spacious, light filled room,excellent surroundings
properties.summary: Elegantly furnished private room, wooden flooring, on 3rd floor (with lift) in newly refurbished building. All basic amenities + dining table, chairs, couch-chair, etc... Room off main hallway and fully lockable. properties.name: stilvolles Townhouse mit Garten mitten in Berlin
properties.summary: Wir vermieten während unserer Urlaubszeit unser modernes stilvolles eingerichtetes familienfreundliches Townhouse mit einer großen Terrasse und Privatgarten mitten in Berlin (Prenzlauer Berg). Unsere privaten Bereiche sind für die Gäste nicht zugänglich.
properties.space: Das Samariterviertel mit seinen netten kleinen Kiezläden und coolen Kneipen befindet sich direkt vor der Haustür. Trotzdem ist es sehr ruhig. Die Zimmer sind fast alle zum Garten ausgerichtet mit Blick auf den Samariterkiez. Im Haus ist Platz für 6 - 8 Personen in zwei Schlafzimmern und einem Kinderzimmer mit Doppelbett und einem Hochbett und evtl. 2 weitere Schlafplätze auf einer Schlafcouch im Arbeitszimmer. Das Haus hat zwei Etagen und in jeder Etage befindet sich ein Bad.  Die Terrasse ist zum Teil überdacht und mit einer großzügigen Sitzlounge und Esstisch ausgestattet, so dass man auch in der kälteren Jahreszeit draußen chillen und grillen kann. Im eingezäunten Garten befinden sich neben einer Spielwiese, ein Sandkasten und ein Holzklettergerüst mit Rutsche, zwei Schaukeln und Baumhaus für die Kids. Eine komplett eingerichtete Küche mit Geschirrspüler und ein großer Esstisch mit Platz für alle Personen befinden sich im Erdgeschoss im großzügig gestalteten offenen Wohn- Küchenbere

properties.neighborhood_overview: Das Samariterviertel mit seinen netten kleinen Kiezläden und coolen Kneipen, Restaurants, Cafe´s und Bars befindet sich direkt vor der Haustür. Trotzdem ist es sehr ruhig. Die Zimmer sind alle zum Garten ausgerichtet mit Blick auf den Samariterkiez. Es gibt in der Nähe viele Kinderspielplätze und kinderfreundliche Cafés.
properties.transit: Der S-Bahnhof Storkower Straße (Ringbahn) und der U-Bahnhof Samariterstraße befinden sich fußläufig nur wenige Minuten vom Haus entfernt. Mit der U 5 gelangt man in kurzer Zeit direkt zum IGA Gelände. Jede Menge Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Cafés, Apotheken etc. sind in 3 bis 5 min zu Fuß zu erreichen.
properties.access: Unsere privat genutzten Räume z.B. Arbeitszimmer sind für unsere Gäste nicht zugänglich.
properties.interaction: Telefonisch sind wir jeder Zeit zu erreichen, wenn es Fragen oder Probleme gibt. Wir wohnen teilweise während der Sommermonate in unserem Bungalow in der Nähe von Berlin und können in 45 min in der Stadt sein, falls es irgendwelche Probleme gibt.
properties.house_rules: Wir vermietung gern an Gäste, die ein modernes stilvolles Objekt in kultiger Kiezlage mit eigenem Garten und Loungeterrasse zu schätzen wissen. Das Rauchen und Haustiere sind im Haus verboten. Geraucht werden kann auf der Terrasse oder im Garten. Laute Partys, Feiern und Geschäftsrunden sind leider nicht erlaubt. Nehmt bitte Rücksicht auf unsere netten Nachbarn. Wir wollen auch weiterhin in unserem Haus wohnen bleiben und uns mit allen Nachbarn verstehen. Download bzw. das Verbreiten von urheberrechtlich geschützten Inhalten über den Internetzugang ist ausdrücklich untersagt. Die Haftung für Zuwiderhandlungen trägt ausschließlich der Mieter.

properties.name: Nice room 15min to the city centre
properties.space: Lovely 15mq room to let in the south of Berlin. Just 15minutes to Mitte and very good connected to all the city. There is the u9 direct to the Zoo, the S1 direct to Brandeburger Tor and the Wansee and 2 busses direct to the main stations and Alexanderplatz. Located in a small alley just off Schlossstrasse, the apartment can accommodate 2 Persons - a RATHER NICE AND COMFORTABLE SofaBed . Being on a small alley, the flat benefits from a quiet surrounding , therefore suitable for ' light ' sleepers . The windows are double glazed ! There's plenty of Restaurants, Cafes and other retail just around the corner ! KITCHEN IS FULLY EQUIPPED WITH , STOVE, OVEN And FRIGE. Bed Sheets and Towels are provided free of charge . The apartment will be clean with clean sheets and towels prior to your arrival. Email me for any further enquiries :) Happy to help at any time ! PLEASE AS SOON AS YOU CONFIRM BOOKING , MESSAGE ME ON HERE TO LET ME KNOW YOUR CHECK IN & OUT TIMES SO I CAN MAKE SURE THE HANDLING

And most important : DO NOT DOWNLOAD ANYTHING FROM THE INTERENT. IN GERMANY IS ILLEGAL. IF you do you will likely receive a letter in the mail from a German law firm demanding that you sign a Cease and Desist Declaration and pay monetary damages.

An italian girl in Berlin :)

I love travel and discover new countries...like all of you for sure ;) 

I'm looking forward to new adventures with Airbnb! ;)

properties.name: Wohlfühlen in Berlin
properties.summary: Modern eingerichtete Drei - Zimmer- Wohnung (65 qm.) im 4. Stock. Zwei Schlafzimmer, eines mit einem Doppelbett und eines mit einem Einzelbett, Kleiderschrank. Wohnzimmer mit Schlafsofa, Essbereich, Balkon,Küche, voll ausgestattet, Bad mit Wannenbad.
properties.space: Gemütliche, gepflegte, moderne und helle Wohnung. Küche mit Kühlschrank, Herd und Ceranfeld, sowie eine Spülmaschine. Vollständig eingerichtet. Kleiderbügel und Bügeleisen, Fön vorhanden. Fernseher mit Kabelanschluss und kleiner Musikanlage vorhanden.  Balkon mit Blick ins Grüne.

There is also a possibility to rent quite cheaply a modern bike. You would have a VERY FAST internet connection, with which you could surf, watch videos and even stream films and watch Amazon prime instant video program.

properties.name: lovely, green Berlin at it's best
properties.summary: A ground floor room in a family house in Berlin-Zehlendorf with a lovely view. Enough space for two and a fully equipped kitchen and WLAN for joint use. The Wannsee is 5 minutes  away and Potsdam close by. A Bike can be used free of charge.
properties.space: We are a lively house with children and a friendly, relaxed, large dog. A bike can be used free of charge. This room is a great base from which to explore Berlin and Potsdam, or as a retreat from the exhibition and from busy downtown. By car one is easily in the "city" and the S-Bahn Station "Mexikolplatz" is reachable in walking distance or by bus. (S1 - without change to Mitte / Potsdamer Platz / City East) The Wannsee is reachable by bike within 15 minutes. You can choose between the Wannsee beach, rowing / motor / sailing boat and surfboard rental. Or use one of the many unfrequented sandy beach coves north of the Great window. Or go for a walk in the Grunewald, cycling, mountain biking, skating, golfing ... or, or, or, the sports activities are unlimited. Smoking is allowed on the terrace, but not in the house. We live in the house itself, if there are any problems we are always approachable. Connections: Car - Ku'damm / Citywest 20 min. - Mitte / City East 35 Min. - Fair 15 Min.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Zehlendorf is a very green district, yet so close to the city center. - absolute quite neighbourhood - jogging , swimming; walking, boat rentals, bicycle tours , etc - 5 km to the Wannsee , sailing, surfing , swimming, boat tours
properties.notes: Since we are a family with children during weekdays life starts at 7am ;-)
properties.transit: Bus and train stations are within walking distance . Parking in front of the house . Tegel Airport: 25 minutes by car without traffic or 50 minutes by public transit Schoenefeld Airport: 35 minutes by car without traffic or 75 minutes by public transit Hauptbahnhof Station: 40 minutes by public transit Potsdamer Platz: 35 minutes by public transit East Side Gallery: 60 minutes by public transit
properties.access: The guest room, a private bathroom and the kitchen for joint use. The terrace and garden as well.
properties.interaction: We are available and approachable;-)
properties.house_rules: The house is non-smoking; no drugs or party events. Responsible usage of internet data is required being cause of litigation the fact of illegal downloads. Arrival and departure upon request
properties.host_about:
Hallo; wir sind eine 5 köpfige Familie mit großem aber freundlichen und sehr relaxten Hund aus Berlin Zehlendorf. Wir  geniessen es, mit Menschen aus der ganzen Welt in Kontakt und Austausch zu sein, ob durch die Vermietung, das Arbeiten im In-und Ausland, beim Sport oder Sprachen...oder einfach beim Lachen. 
Genauso freue ich mich, wenn sich Leute in meiner Wohnung wohlfühlen und von dort aus in das wunderbare Berlin eintauchen können.
