properties.name: Cozy Apartment at Schönhauser Allee
properties.summary: My charming apartment, full furnished and lovely decorated is centrally located in Berlin. You have everything you need for near by. And for trips an easy access to major sublines. It really quiet and family friendly! But also for couples!
properties.space: I am subletting my beloved apartment in Schönhauser Allee. It is fully furnished and carefully decorated. Very nice appartment for a couple, or one adult more or a family with two kids.  The place is in the heart of lively Berlin Prenzlauer Berg on one of Berlin's famous family places. It is minutes away from some of the city's best clubs, restaurants and shopping areas. You will have shops like an normal supermarket and two organic - food shops in the same street. On sunday you can have fresh rolls at one of the organic -food shop. Both S-Bahn (all) and U-Bahn (U2) stations and the M1/M10 tram station are each a two minute walk from the front door, so if you're in Berlin for one week,  this is the perfect place to live and explore the city! The flat is in a pretty period building (18th century) in the side "wing" overlooking the courtyard, so it's very quiet. 1 bedroom are for children which makes the place very warm and special.  - Fully equipped kitchen: big fridge, oven, full set o

properties.name: Chillout-WG-2017 - Entspannungszimmer
properties.summary: Hey, wir sind zur Zeit eine Drei-Männer-WG, Dennis (31), Massimo (43) und ich (42).  Wenn ich nicht da bin, vermiete ich mein Musikzimmer. Sehr angenehme meditative Atmosphäre, wenn man das mag. we are three roommates (three men) and I rent my music practice room when I am travelling.  So if you're looking for a room with a meditative atmosphere, good connected to public transports you are welcome to contact us :-) Thomas, Dennis and Massimo
properties.space: Unsere Vier Zimmer Wohnung liegt im Erdgeschoß und hat eine kleine Terrasse zum Innenhof mit etwas Grünfläche. In der Mitte befindet sich eine geräumige Wohnküche mit einem zum Esstisch umfunktionierten Billardtisch. Dein Zimmer befindet sich zum Innenhof hin und hat einen Ausgang zur kleinen Terrasse. Das Zimmer geht ums Eck, was es recht gemütlich macht. Kommt auf den Fotos nicht so raus. Das Haus ist recht modern und gut gegen Lärm isoliert. Wir haben zwei Bäder, eines mit Dusche und das andere mit einer Badewanne. Beide stehen zur Nutzung zur Verfügung. Außerdem stehen eine Spül- und Waschmaschine sowie ein Wäschetrockner zur Verfügung. Bettlaken und Bettwäsche sind vorhanden. Handtücher können wir ebenfalls auf Wunsch zur Verfügung stellen.

properties.name: Luxury Mitte Penthouse 3Bed, 3Bath
properties.summary: Winner of the "Holiday Home Award 2015" in the category "Best Apartment in an European Capital". Newly built, centrally located apartment with plenty of space and 3 bathrooms!
properties.space: The penthouse offers a superb choice for guests seeking a central and spacious location.  The apartment offers great open plan living ideally suited for families, couples or business travelers wishing to have great social space. The kitchen is fully equipped for light or full dining having all the  amenities for a great stay including dishwasher, refrigerator, oven and cook top, ice maker and wine cooler.  3 large luxury bedrooms consisting of the master bedroom with queen size bed, LCD TV and a walk in en-suite with full bath tub and separate shower.  The second bedroom contains a double bed and en-suite with shower and the third bedroom contains a double bed with a separate bathroom that can also be used for other guests.. The leather lounge suites offer a great place to relax while enjoying the large screen TV or consider spending some time on the large balcony off the main living area.  A full laundry is offered with washer and clothes dryer, particularly suited for guests travelin
properties.description: Winner of the "Holiday Home Award 2015" in the category "Best Apartment in an European Capital". Newly built, centrally located apartment with plenty of space and 3 bathrooms! The apartment offers great open plan living ideally suited for families, couples or business travelers wishing to have great social space. The kitchen is fully equipped for light or full dining having all the  amenities for a great stay including dishwasher, refrigerator, oven and cook top, ice maker and wine cooler.  3 large luxury bedrooms consisting of the master bedroom with queen size bed, LCD TV and a walk in en-suite with full bath tub and separate shower.  The second bedroom contains a double bed and en-suite with shower and the third bedroom contains a double bed with a separate bathroom that can also be used for other guests.. The leather lounge suites offer a great place to relax while enjoying the large screen TV
properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment borders the hip Prenzlauer Berg area but with extremely close proximity to the centre of the city.  With plenty of green spaces, cafe's and restaurants in the local surroundings, the convenient subway Ubahn at the building entrance provides an excellent transport link for exploring the whole city.  Because your stay is extremely central, being part of this experience means there will always be some ambient city noise when doors/windows are open. Mitte’s hotspots for culture and nightlife, Berlin's gallery area, such as hip Hackescher Markt and Oranienburger Straße, Museum Island and the state Opera are only a short distance away.  You won't find a more central, luxury and convenient location to enjoy your stay in Berlin with two convenient supermarkets within 400 metres of the apartment.
properties.notes: All our calendars are kept up-to-date. The apartment has fans but does NOT have air-conditioning. Eye masks are provided in the apartment particularly over Summer with its roof position and large windows.
properties.transit: 1 underground secure car space available with apartment.  Please contact us for additional spaces. Please do not park your car on any other parking space than the ones we show you. If you fail to oblige, your car might be removed at your own cost.  Naturkundenmuseum Ubahn station(underground) station located at front door of building with elevator.  2 stops to Friedrichstrasse Train station. 25 minute walk to Brandenburg Gate.  25 minutes by taxi to Tegel Airport.
properties.access: The apartment includes free wifi access with dedicated modem, bedding and towels, a hair dryer, shower gel, dishwashing tabs and washing up liquid. The apartment has a convenient washing machine and dryer plus a separate drying stand particularly suited for longer staying guests.  If you require a baby bed please contact us prior to confirm.
properties.interaction: We meet all our guests at the apartment address.  It´s important that you contact us prior to arrival to ensure a smooth check-in as we do not live at the property.  During check-in we will provide you with a city map and are more than happy to answer any questions you have including local supermarkets, great eateries, sightseeing and public transport.   Please note any check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.  Check-ins after midnight are not possible.
properties.house_rules: Check-ins after midnight are not possible. Check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.   No smoking inside the apartment. Quiet from 10pm each night. Please send us your arrival details (by air, car or train) as soon as you have them in order to ensure a smooth check-in. Once you arrive in Berlin please contact us to re-confirm a meeting time at the apartment 60 minutes prior to arrival. Absolutely no more guests permitted to stay than what have been booked for. Early check-ins possible before 3pm but please contact us first. Late check-outs after 10am may be possible but please contact us first.
properties.host_about:
English/Deutsch/Francais

Hi, we are a family operated apartment management business located in the Berlin suburb of Prenzlauer Berg.  We manage apartments on behalf of owners when they are not in town.  All of our apartments are located in central Berlin with easy access to public transport, supermarkets and local eateries.  We are always at close hand if you have any issues.  Our apartments are well maintained, secure, kept in clean order and we include all bedding, towels, shower soap and importantly hair dryers!  Free Wifi and a washing machine are standard in every apartment for your convenience.  Please feel free to check-out our past guest reviews, we endeavour to make your stay as comfortable as possible. If you have any questions at all please do not hesitate to contact us.  We look forward to your visit!
_______________________________________________________________
Hallo, wir sind ein Familienunternehmen mit Sitz im Prenzlauer Berg und spezialisieren uns auf die Betreuung von Wohnungen. Alle unsere Wohnungen befinden sich im Zentrum von Berlin mit guter Anbindung an den öffentlichen Verkehr, Supermärkte und Restaurants. Sollte es Probleme geben, sind wir immer in der Nähe. Alle Wohnungen sind gut instandgehalten und legen großen Wert auf Sauberkeit. Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Duschgel und ein Fön sind in jeder einzelnen Wohnung standardmäßig enthalten. Zudem stehen auch in jeder Wohnung kostenloses WLAN und eine eigene Waschmaschine zur Verfügung. In unseren Gästebewertungen könnt Ihr sehen, dass wir Euren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich machen wollen. Bei Fragen könnt Ihr uns jederzeit kontaktieren. Wir freuen uns auf Euren Besuch!
_______________________________________________________________
Salut! Nous sommes une entreprise familiale, spécialisée en louer des appartements de vacances dans le centre de Berlin. Tous nos appartements se trouvent dans le centre ville à proximité des transports en commun, des supermarchés et des restaurants. S`il y a des problèmes, nous sommes tout près. Nous entretenons tous les appartements et nous faisons attention, qu`ils sont bien nettoyés. Des housses, des serviettes, du gel douche et bien sur un sèche-cheveux sont inclus dans chaque appartement. En plus, il y a un accès à internet gratuit et une lave-linge. Veuillez vous référer à nos excellents commentaires clients, car nous essayons de faire votre séjour le plus confortable. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez nous bien contacter. Nous nous réjouissions à votre séjour dans un de nos appartements!

properties.space: A two room apartment, 87mq, 1st floor (belle etage), loads of light, in a building  built in the late 1800'. Also there are plenty reading or illustrated books in English and Italian. It is situated in the hart of Kreuzberg, right next to Oranienstrasse and the canal. The metro station is 1 minute walk- U1 Görlitzer Bahnhof. Bellow there are plenty of cute restaurants and bars and on the same building there is a bike rental shop that could always be handy to visitors.

properties.name: Perfect Place @ Gendarmenmarkt
properties.summary: Das Apartment ist perfekt für 2 – 3 Erwachsene. Es gibt ein Schlafzimmer mit einem Bett und eine ausziehbare Couch auf der 1-2 Person drauf schlafen können. Außerdem gibt es einen schönen großen Balkon.
properties.space: Das Apartment ist perfekt für 2 – 3 Erwachsene. Es gibt ein Schlafzimmer mit einem Bett und eine ausziehbare Couch auf der auch wunderbar zwei Personen drauf schlafen können. Außerdem gibt es einen schönen großen Balkon. Besser liegen kann eine Wohnung in Berlin fast gar nicht. Man ist innerhalb von 5min (400m) mitten am Gendarmenmarkt und/oder an der Friedrichstraße die zum Shoppen einlädt. Auch die Mall of Berlin ist innerhalb von 15min Fußweg gut erreichbar. Der legendäre CHECKPOINT CHARLIE ist in nicht einmal 5 min zu Fuß erreicht. Ein kleiner Supermarkt und eine Bäckerei, sowie diverse Restaurants befinden sich ebenfalls in der Nachbarschaft. Zum U-Bahnhof „Stadtmitte“ läuft man ca. 5min.  Die Wohnung verfügt über einen High-Speed Internetanschluss.  * Please behave as if it would be your own flat. Don´t be loud in the night or pollute something. Parties are also forbidden. *

properties.space: There is a more than queen size bed (160cm / 5'4" wide), a wardrobe, a desk with chairs, and a couch for you to use.

Since I work a lot, I'm rarely home and that´s why I offer a room to rent of my beautiful 2-bedroom apartment, right in the center of my favorite city Berlin

properties.name: Stylish flat in popular Neukölln
properties.summary: Our 56 m2 flat consists of one bedroom with a double bed and a big living room with a comfortable fold-out couch that fits 2 people as well. We have a nice little balcony up the 3rd floor and a very modern kitchen with dishwasher and a table that fits up to 4 people. The flat is situated in a quiet area in popular Neukölln and its interiour is a mix between modern and vintage styles.
properties.space: Our apartment has recently been renovated and is very modern with a very trendy interior. The big bathroom has a bath tub with shower and a mirror with good light for putting on make up. The kitchen has a dishwasher and a cooking area with stove, oven and microwave. From the kitchen goes the balcony where you can relax in the sun all day. The bedroom has a very comfortable double bad and enough space to store all your luggage. The living room is nice and sunny and very quiet to sleep in. The interior here includes a big TV, a bench at the window and a dining table that fits a minimum of 4 people.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The appartment is situated in the very trendy eastern district Neukölln. Our street is very quiet but close to some popular areas like famous Weserstraße or Schiller Kiez with a variety of bars and restaurants. Also the old abandoned airport at the Tempelhofer Feld is just 15 minutes walk from our flat. Public transport is very close and brings you to all of Berlin's famous nightlife and culture areas in Mitte, Kreuzberg, Friedrichshain and Neukölln in maximum 20 minutes.
properties.transit: There is a S Bahn and U Bahn station with all the main train lines just 7 minutes walk from our door. There also is a bus station right in front of the house.
properties.access: You have access to the bathroom, kitchen and balcony.
properties.interaction: I'm only renting out the flat when we're on holiday so I won't be around while you're staying at our place. Of course I'd like to meet you in person for your check in and check out.
properties.house_rules: Of course I wish my guests to be careful and tidy with the use of my interior. I would appreciate a respectful behavior regarding my private belongings. Please no pets and no smoking inside. You can smoke outside on the balcony out the kitchen. When I'm not at home, I expect you to lock the door and switch off all electricity and lights when you leave the flat.
properties.host_about:
Hi I'm Julia. I'm 27 years old and work as a PR and social media manager at a livestyle PR Agency in Berlin Mitte. I love doing fitness, eating out, drinking a glas of wine on the balcony at night and having a relaxing day out at a park or surrounding Berlin/Brandenburg. But of course there are many bars, clubs and open airs to experience in Berlin so I'm always down for some Berlin Electro Sound.

Through my travels especially in the USA and Australia I've met many awesome people from all over the world and I'd love to spend some time with people that are travelling for the same experience. I'm open minded and communicative and happy to help with any questions on stuff to do and getting around in Berlin.

properties.name: Beautiful brandnew 3 room apartment
properties.summary: This warm colorful and stylish flat is located at the quiet river-shore in the most green, beautiful and hip part of Kreuzberg. Enjoy the comfort of a fully equipped open kitchen in a big living room, 2 brand-new spacious bathrooms and bedrooms.
properties.space: This lovely decorated apartment is full of charm and color! There are two bedrooms and a spacious living room with a completely calm and cosy atmosphere. The king size-sofa measures 4m and it can be used as a bed, if there are more than 6 people staying.  The very well equipped kitchen includes a Nespresso coffee machine and a dish washer. There is a high quality bathroom with a perfect bath tub and an extra bathroom with a shower.  The bathrooms includes enough fresh towels for your stay. Each of the 2 cosy bedrooms is equipped with a king-size-bed, a single bed, a huge closet and a flat-screen-tv. All rooms have a very warm lightening and most of the lights can be dimmed. In the backyard of the house is place for children to play, with a sandbox and a swing. Pets and children are very welcome!
properties.description: This warm colorful and stylish flat is located at the quiet river-shore in the most green, beautiful and hip part of Kreuzberg. Enjoy the comfort of a fully equipped open kitchen in a big living room, 2 brand-new spacious bathrooms and bedrooms. This lovely decorated apartment is full of charm and color! properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a really nice street by the Spree Canal. You will have the opportunity to enjoy a nice walk, hear some street music and buy fresh fruit and vegetables at the Turkish market a few meters ahead. The nearest subway station is Schönleinstrasse, less than 10 minutes walking from the apartment. Around the neighborhood you will find lots of good restaurants, bars and clubs, as this is one of the most vibrant neighborhood of Berlin. Familiys can find a beautiful big playground very close.
properties.notes: Here is a (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)-maps-link, where you can find my recommendations of restaurants, bars, supermarkets, outside activities, metro stations, and more : (URL HIDDEN)
properties.transit: There are 3 trains stations in 7 minutes walking distance. U8 Schönleinstrasse U8/U1 Kottbusser Tor U1 Prinzenstrasse With the U8 you are in Mitte in 12 minutes. The U1 goes to Chalottenburg (Kurfürstendamm in 15 min.) or Friedrichshain (7min.)
properties.access: The apartment will be used only by the guests.
properties.interaction: Because I live around the corner I can be there for the guests any time and help with all kinds of questions.  Specially for families with children I have solutions for all kinds of problems because I also have children.
properties.house_rules: I don't like to have partys in the place.  If you like to smoke you can do that outside but you have to make sure to be quite at night (after 8pm). If you like to talk loud you can to walk 10 meters and sit by the river. Its beautiful there and you can be as loud as you like. :-) Please don`t play loud music at night. Pets are allowed.
properties.host_about:
I am an architect and I live with my family (husband, 2 children and 2 cats) very close from the apartment.
The flat has been bought, renovated, furnished and decorated by me, in purpose of renting it. It has been finished october 2014.

properties.name: Bright Spot in the East of the city
properties.summary: Meine Gäste haben ein eigenes, großes  und helles Zimmer für sich (1-2  für Pers. + Notbett)  mit freiem W-LAN. Wir teilen uns die Küche, die ihr gerne nutzen könnt, und das Bad. Von meiner Wohnung  kannst du zu Fuß zum belebten Prenzlauer Berg spazieren. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten liegen in 200m Entfernung. In 5-10 Gehminuten erreicht man verschiedenste öffentliche Verkehrsmittel, die einen direkt oder mit 1x Umsteigen überall hin bringen.
properties.space: After visiting Berlin many times, I'm happy to call myself a yearlong resident. Now I am excited about my small but lovely apartment. It's located in Pankow; close to all the action, yet quiet enough to recharge after a long day of exploration. Grocery stores are a block away and more shopping is just around the corner on Schönhauser Allee and Stargrader Str. Aside from organic supermarkets, book stores and other essential shops you'll find plenty of restaurants, bars and nightlife. A visit to the old and traditional Bäckerei S. is a must. My guests are welcome to feel at home and enjoy the comfort of wifi, a washing machine and a dishwasher. While there is no TV (but cable) in the apartment, you're invited to connect your laptop to my projector. The central station and airport are both easily accessible through public transportation. The tram 12, 13 as well as M1 and M2 are close by and the subway line U2 and the Ringbahn express trains are only 7 minutes away. Parking is typically al

The tram 12, 13 as well as M1 and M2 are close by and the subway line U2 and the Ringbahn express trains are only 7 minutes away. Parking is typically al
properties.neighborhood_overview: Meine Nachbarschaft ist eine reine Wohngegend und dennoch in Fußnähe zu den belebteren Straßen des Prenzlauer-Berg-Viertels. Lebensmittel kann man einen Häuserblock weiter in zwei Supermärkten erwerben. Alle anderen Dinge des täglichen Lebens erhält man auf der nächsten Einkaufsstraße (Schönhauser Allee) in 800m Entfernung.
properties.notes: Walli, mein Mischlingshund lebt seit 12.16 bei mir . Damit die Gäste ungestört sind, darf sie das Gästezimmer nicht betreten. Auch wenn keine Gäste da sind. Im Flur oder in meinem Zimmer kann man sie natürlich gerne begrüßen. Walli und ich absolvieren eine Ausbildung zum Mensch-Hund-Team, damit sie mich bei meiner Arbeit als Sonderpädagogin bald unterstützen kann. Sollte sie mich mal nicht begleiten können, bleibt sie ruhig in ihrer Box in meinem Zimmer.
properties.transit: Vom Flughafen Tegel nimmt man am besten den Bus 128 bis Osloer Str. dort steigt man in die Tram M13 und fährt bis zur Haltestelle Wisbyer/Stahlheimer Str. (8 Stationen). Vom Flughafen Schönefeld steigt man in die S9, fährt bis Schönhauser Allee (15 Stationen) . Dort bitte den hinteren Ausgang nehmen und links in die Greifenhagener Str. einbiegen. Über die Wisbyer Str., leicht rechts die Baumbachstr und an der zweiten Kreuzung rechts in die Thulestr. (insgesamt 900m) Von meiner Wohnung aus in fußläufiger Entfernung kommt man mit der M1, M2, M12, U2 und der Ringbahn problemlos überall hin.
properties.access: Bad und Küche teilen wir, wenn ich zu Hause bin. Meine Gäste können alle Haushaltsgeräte gerne benutzen, die Kaffeemaschine im Gästezimmer steht zur freien Verfügung. Und gerne kannst die zahlreichen Tees (hinter der Schiebetür zur Küche) genießen. Im Bad ist ein Fön und gerne dürfen das Shampoo usw. mit benutzt werden.
properties.interaction: Für Fragen stehe ich gern zur Verfügung!
properties.house_rules: Sei herzlich eingeladen, die Wohnung wie ein Gast zu genießen. Handtücher und Bettwäsche stelle ich selbstverständlich zur Verfügung. Im Bad stehen die notwendigsten Utensilien für dich bereit . Da ich nicht rauche, bitte ich, zum Rauchen in den Hof zu gehen. Falls irgendetwas kaputt geht, bitte Bescheid sagen. Meine Nachbarn sind alle sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wäre schön, wenn das so bleiben kann und sie nicht durch Lärm oder andere Vorkommnisse verärgert werden. Be welcome to enjoy my place as a guest. Towels an bedsheets are provided. Please don't smoke. If something is broken, just tell me. We will find a way to fix it.  My neighbors are very friendly and I would be glad, if it stays like that and you will take care that they are not disturbed by noise or other uncomfortable things. Thank you.
properties.host_about:
Hallo, liebe Gäste,
ab Januar 2016 wird Walli, ein Mischlingswelpe bei mir einziehen. Sie wird mich mit zu meiner Arbeit als Sonderschullehrerin begleiten und wohlerzogen sein.
Mein Gästezimmer wird hundefrei gehalten und Walli wird nur auf wunsch Kontakt zu euch haben.


Meine überaus positiven Erfahrungen als Gast bei Airbnb bewegten mich 2012 dazu, meine Wohnung auch für Reisende zur Verfügung zu stellen. Es ist mir eine Freude, mein Zimmer -und wer möchte- auch meinen Alltag mit anderen zu teilen. Gerne bin ich behilflich, sich in der Stadt zu orientieren und wohl zu fühlen.

Das Zimmer hat einen eigenen Zugang, Bad und Küche teilen wir.
Ich freue mich auf euch
Sonja


Als Gast bin ich recht genügsam und komme gut mit den unterschiedlichsten Begebenheiten zurecht.

properties.name: BIG room in P.Berg,private bathroom
properties.summary: The room is in a 1893 historical building and the apartment has 2 bathrooms, a kitchen and living room. Centrally located in Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin's most beautiful area, in a quiet street w/ nice restaurants, cafés and lots of green!
properties.space: You will have an entire room plus the common areas at your disposal (two bathrooms and a kitchen). Wireless internet is of course included, we have a cable connection which is very fast (about 20Mbs in up/download). The password is written on the fridge. There is a TVs in the apartment (with complimentary Netflix) where you can watch numerous international channels and to which you can connect your computer to watch movies or videos with the HDMI and mini-display port connectors provided.
properties.description: The room is in a 1893 historical building and the apartment has 2 bathrooms, a kitchen and living room. Centrally located in Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin's most beautiful area, in a quiet street w/ nice restaurants, cafés and lots of green! You will have an entire room plus the common areas at your disposal (two bathrooms and a kitchen). Wireless internet is of course included, we have a cable connection which is very fast (about 20Mbs in up/download). The password is written on the fridge. There is a TVs in the apartment (with complimentary Netflix) where you can watch numerous international channels and to which you can connect your computer to watch movies or videos with the HDMI and mini-display port connectors provided. The bedroom is fully furnished, with loads of wardrobe space, and a big 140cm bed ideal for 1 or 2 people + a child (who can use the armchair that pulls out into a bed) The kitchen is also at your disposal. Pots, pans, etc. are easy to find. Just make yourself at home :
properties.neighborhood_overview: The area is one of the most trendy neighborhoods in Berlin, with lots of shops, bars and nice restaurants, all reachable by foot; we can provide you with list of the best places to eat and/or have a drink, please just ask (or check the guidebook in our profile). The area is very quite and green, with a few cars passing by; it's also very safe (thanks to the two police stations in the area). In front of the house there is a church famous for having been the place where the peaceful revolution started (don't worry, the bell rings only during the day ;) Mauerpark, also known as („wallpark” because of the Wall which passed through it) is just 20 minutes away, there you can relax or visit the famous flee market on Sunday. In the area you can find several shops and supermarkets: - mini-market next to our place, on the left - Supermarket, postoffice and several shops in the Schönhauser Arkaden mall (5 minutes from home, behind the church on the left) - Kaiser's (supermarket), Pappelallee 45 (
properties.notes: When booking please let us know your arrival and departure times, so that we can organize it accordingly. Check-in is after 15:00 and check-out is before 12:00 (noon), but we are flexible according to the availability (if there is no other guest coming you can stay until the afternoon and arrive in the morning). So let us know before you arrive so that we can find a solution which is best for you!
properties.transit: The apartment is 10-15 minutes from the center (Alexander Platz and the television tower, an ideal point to start exploring the city), reachable by subway (S-Bahn and U-Bahn Schönhauser Allee), tram, bus all 3 minutes away by foot.  Airports are conveniently reachable: Schönefeld is directly connected to the line S9 (S-Bahn) and Tegel by S41/42 + bus TXL. The main station (Hauptbahnhof) is connected to U2 to Alexander Platz + any S-Bahn going westward. If you want to rent bikes, at the corner with Greifenhagener Straße (one minute walk when leaving the apartment on the left), you can find some for a decent price; just ask in the café Gina M. Really, you couldn't find a place strategically better positioned in Berlin!
properties.access: The bedroom is fully furnished, with loads of wardrobe space, and a big 140cm bed ideal for 1 or 2 people + a child (who can use the armchair that pulls out into a bed) The kitchen is also at your disposal. Pots, pans, etc. are easy to find. Just make yourself at home :) You have  space in the fridge and in the cupboards to store your stuff. You can also use the oven and microwave. We also have a washing machine + dryer which can be used as well. Towels and bedsheets are included.
properties.interaction: We will welcome you and hand-over the keys; in case we will be traveling, the cleaning lady will do the same. If you have any questions,we are always available via telephone or email, and we get back to you in a matter of minutes!
properties.house_rules: You will be provided with a copy of the house keys, so you can come and go when you please. Out of respect for others guests we don't allow smoking in the apartment (it's super convenient to smoke in the yard or in the front of the house). Please note that there is a smoke detector in each room of the apartment. Small size pets are allowed, so please leave your Saint Bernard at home ;)
properties.host_about:
We are a friendly couple who would be glad to rent our 90 sqm flat (about 960 sqft) to people traveling to Berlin :)
We are working for an internet startup and we would be more then happy to advise you about the best activities in the city and help you have a great time in one of the most vibrant capital cities in Europe.

properties.name: Luxury Artist Loft
properties.summary: Discover. Relax. Work.
properties.space: Welcome to my very cool, calm and tranquil loft, located in one of the most happening destinations in central Berlin.  My second Berlin home I love living in this amazing former industrial space. The conversion blends manmade materials with the natural warmth of steel beams, brickwork and floors. I wanted to retain the sense of open space and design a home which had flexibility and practicality – excellent storage, privacy if needed, dining, relaxing and work spaces. The flat offers a spacious living room with a fully equipped kitchen, two separate bedrooms, two bathrooms (one with shower, one with bath tub) and a large heated winter garden on a constructed area of 130 square meters (1.780 sq ft). The apartment has really thick ceilings and floors that provide sound insulation from the neighbors, making it absolute quiet all day and night. - 55' brand new Samsung HDTV with hundreds of national and international channels - Sonos sound system! Just download the app and you will have acce

properties.neighborhood_overview: Bordering the Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte neighborhoods minutes from Alexanderplatz and Museum Island , this loft-style building is centrally located to just about everything and offers tons of space and privacy.  Blocks away from several cinemas, super markets (opening hours from 7 a.m. to midnight) drug stores, countless great bars and restaurants, galleries etc.
properties.transit: Tram to Alexanderplatz right in front of the building. Subway lines and S-Bahn in walking distance, several citibike stations around. Walk, bike, bus, train, subway, uber, rental car - you name it! You can walk to Berlin Mitte in 10-15 minutes! That's the benefit of being right in the middle of central Berlin.
properties.access: + High-speed Wireless Internet (50 MBit/s) + Brand new 55' Samsung HDTV + Hundreds of national and international channels + Pay TV: Sky Welt HD + Sky Bundesliga HD and Sport HD (Champions League, Premier League, Primera Division!) + Fully equipped Kitchen + Italian Coffee Machine for perfect Cappuccino + Washing machine, dryer
properties.interaction: I am local and available for requests and to make your stay as pleasant as possible. Please let me know if you have any questions!

properties.name: Living in the most beautiful street of Berlin
properties.summary: Welcome to one of the most beautiful streets in Berlin: Oderberger Strasse. You will live next to just restored Oderberger Stadtbad. Your private room in my historic building is about 25 sq m. It will give a lots of privacy as you have your own bathroom with a shower. The bed is very big and comfortable like in a hotel. Everything from restaurants, bars, flea markets, food markets, public transport is in walking distance. There is free Wlan and cable TV. You can use my kitchen when necessary.

properties.name: Beautiful room, huge flat, top location (P-Berg)
properties.summary: Beautiful room (22sqm) on first floor (Beletage) in a famous Berlin 'Altbau' (end of 19th century). Heritage building and apartment (180sqm) with high ceilings and elegant elements. Phenomenal location in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg on Kastanienallee. Close to Prater Garten, Kulturbrauerei, Mauerpark, Schönhauser Allee, Prenzlauer Allee, many restaurants, bars, clubs. properties.transit: Free parking space is available just inside the yard. I will gladly answer all your questions around sightseeing, culture and give you tips for restaurants, cafes, bars, clubs. PS: Wir sprechen auch Deutsch ;-)

properties.name: Tolles Studio mit Loft (Nonsmoking)
properties.summary: Liebevoll neu gestaltetes, gemütliches Studio inmitten von Kreuzberg. Erdgeschoss, mit Wohnzimmer,kleiner offener Küche und Bad. Im  hinteren Teil führt eine Treppe auf das offene Loft,ein "Extrabereich" zum Schlafen. Orientalische Lampen und Fliesen
properties.space: Ihr wohnt in einem wunderschönen, gemütlichen, frisch renovierten Studio, früher war mal ein Laden hier drin. Kieferndielen, hohe Fenster, ganz hohe Decken und orientalische Fliesen und Lampen machen das Studio besonders. Auch Uromas Schrank von 1804 gehört dazu! Durch das Loft mit den Betten entsteht sozusagen ein eigener Schlafbereich. Darunter ist die komplett neu eingerichtete kleine Küche mit Elektroherd und Ofen. Das kleine Bad mit Dusche, Waschbecken und handgemachten Fliesen ist auch komplett neu. Bitte beachten - zu den Betten muss man eine steile Treppe hochsteigen!! Auf der Empore ist  die Deckenhöhe nur 1,60 m.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg ist der lebendigste, kreativste, vielfältigste Bezirk in Berlin. In Gehweite sind unzählige gemütlicher Restaurants, Bars, Dönerbuden, Läden und Märkte, der Görlitzer Park, der Landwehrkanal mit dem Paul-Lincke-Ufer und der Türkenmarkt am Maybachufer.
properties.transit: Der U-Bahnhof Görlitzer Bahnhof ist nur ein paar Minuten zu Fuß entfernt, die Haltestelle "Spreewaldplatz" des M29-Busses sogar nur einen Block weiter.
properties.access: Das Studio steht unseren Gästen komplett zur Verfügung!
properties.house_rules: Im Studio wird nicht geraucht. Kein Drogenkonsum geduldet! Und Leute, bitte sagt, wenn Euch etwas kaputt geht. (Ich spreche aus Erfahrung...) Das Internet muss korrekt genutzt werden. Illegales downloading zum Beispiel ist nicht gestattet. Es gilt die Einhaltung geltenden Rechts.

properties.summary: This bright room is located in the popular Winzkiez right in the trendy Prenzlauer Berg in a quiet but central location. It is one of four rooms plus kitchen with stucco and wood plank floor in a lovingly renovated old building.
properties.space: The room is furnished with a large bed (160 x 200 cm), a sofa bed (120 x 200), a wardrobe, some chairs, TV and a working place. Free Wi-Fi is available. Along with the room you are provided with a private bathroom with shower, toilet and washbasin.

properties.host_about:
Ich lebe und arbeite in Berlin Mitte und möchte mein Schlafzimmer gelegentlich zur Verfügung stellen, an diejenigen, die eine günstige kurzweilige Bleibe suchen.

Bitte nur unter der Woche buchen.

Ich selber reise gerne und interessiere mich für fremde Kulturen.

Am liebsten rede ich auf deutsch oder englisch.

properties.name: Quiet room in a house, close to FU and metro
properties.summary: The room is located in the south-west of Berlin (between Free University and city centre), in a single-family-house with a nice garden in a residential area (many parks). You´re close to the centre with 3 metro lines and a dozen of bus lines within 10 min of walking. FU is near with the university bus (3min) or the U3 metro (5min). Feel free to use the kitchen, enjoy a sunny day on the terrace, play the piano, tabletennis in the garden or take our guest bike for a trip to Berlins lakes.

properties.host_about: I am a student from Berlin and sometimes traveling the world. We started to host people in summer 2016 and had a great time.

properties.name: Cozy Apartment with sun terrace
properties.summary: Eine kleine, freundliche und helle Wohnung mit besonders großem Bad und großer Terrasse mit schöner Aussicht!
properties.space: In a historical house in a nice local area you find a bright, small and individual Appartment. The nicely furnished living- and bedroom has a large double bed (orthopedic mattress), a small lounging area to sit down, a wardrobe and a TV set with DVD and VCR. The spacious bathroom comes with shower and hairdryer. The kitchen with small dining table has everything to prepare a meal (including microwave, toaster, coffee machine and water boiler). Coffee and tea is provided for you to make. An warm days you can have breakfast on the large terrace or enjoy the sun on the deckchair. Free WiFi internet. In the same building and in the direct neighborhood you find numerous stores for your daily needs and some restaurants. The S-Bahn station is just a minute away (direct connection to Mitte). Parking on the street is free of charge. We offer airport pick up on request. We are looking forward to welcome you. I will be available for any question you have during your stay.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Besonders gefällt mir hier eine fast dörfliche Athmosphäre und dennoch ist man mitten in der Großstadt!! Alle Läden und Lokale des täglichen Bedarfs sind im Haus oder der unmittelbaren Umgebung.
properties.notes: Da das Apartment ein Teil unserer Wohnung ist haben wir bereits eine sogenannte Negativbescheinigung vom zuständigen Bezirksamt bekommen und können offiziell so wie bisher weitervermieten! Sehenswert sind hier die eher unbekannten Lilienthalvillen, Einfamilienburgen mit Zugbrücke vor der Haustür! Nach zeitlicher Verfügbarkeit zeige ich sie Euch gerne!
properties.transit: Die S Bahn Linie 1 ist direkt gegenüber ( Oranienburg- Frohnau- Friedrichstrasse- Brandenburger Tor- Steglitz- Zehlendorf- Wannsee- Potsdam und zurück!), ausserdem Busse und ein Taxistand. Vom Flughafen Tegel nehmen Sie den TXL Bus bis Brandenburger Tor und von dort die S1 Richtung Wannsee bis Lichterfelde West. Von Schönefeld aus fahren Sie mit der S Bahn bis Schöneberg und dann wieder S1 bis Lichterfelde West. Vom Hauptbahnhof fahren Sie S Bahn Richtung Osten bis Friedrichstrasse und dann wieder die S1 bis Lichterfelde West.
properties.access: Es gibt W Lan Internet für Ihren Laptop, Bücher, Karten und Filme zu Berlin und Umgebung.....
properties.interaction: Da wir gleich nebenan wohnen können wir Ihnen bei allen Fragen behilflich sein und Tipps zu Berlin und Umgebung geben! Wir bitten Sie herzlich Ihre Ankunfts- und Abreisezeiten rechtzeitig mit uns zu besprechen und unsere Hinweise zur Anreise zu beachten!
properties.house_rules: Bitte keine Haustiere! Wir bitten ausserdem um Ruhe im Hausflur und Rücksichtnahme auf die Mitbewohner im Haus. Freundlich wäre es auch, wenn Sie den hellen Teppichboden im Zimmer nicht mit nassen Schuhen von der Strasse oder von der Terrasse aus betreten würden.
properties.host_about:
Ich freue mich darauf Sie in meiner Ferienwohnung willkommen zu heißen. Bei Fragen stehen ich Ihnen gerne zur Verfügung.
Wir können Ihnen In unserer näheren Umgebung Orte zeigen, die sie in keinem Reiseführer finden, z.B. die Familienburgen der Brüder Lilienthal mit Zugbrücke vor der Haustür oder Orte in denen sich die Widerstandsbewegung gegen Hitler getroffen hat.
Wir reisen selber gerne und versuchen immer auch die Orte/Dinge/Menschen zu entdecken, die nicht in Reiseführern zu finden sind.

properties.summary: The apartment is very quiet, but good connection to all Berlin areas. Also there is a shopping and restaurant center nearby.
properties.space: It is very bright and has a huge terrace. Our guests judged it "very cozy".

properties.neighborhood_overview: Das Haus liegt im Grünen, in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße, in der problemlos und kostenfrei geparkt werden kann. Our apartment is located in a green area in a quiet street, whre you have a lot of parking facilities.
properties.notes: Den angegebenen Grundpreis pro Nacht bezahlt 1 Gast für 1 Zimmer, 1 zusätzlicher Gast 15 €.  Bei Buchung von 2 Zimmern berechnen wir einen Zimmerzuschlag von 10 €. Bitte bei Buchungsanfrage die gewünschte Zimmeranzahl benennen. The mentioned basic price per night will be charged for renting 1 room (1  guest). An additional guest increases the price about 15 € per night. Booking the 2 rooms there will be an extra room charge of 10 €. Please announce how many rooms you want to book in the request process.
properties.transit: Metro, bus (even all night running) and city train nearby
properties.interaction: You may get support every time you need.
properties.house_rules: Bitte Abfälle, Essensreste und leere Flaschen selbst entsorgen. Please remove trash, food and empty bottles by yourself.
properties.host_about:
wir kommen aus Berlin, sind kunst- und kulturinteressiert, sportlich aktiv (Tennis), reisen viel und sind neugierig auf interessante, weltoffene Leute. Kommunizieren und lachen gerne.
Englisch-Kenntnisse auf Alltags- und Smalltalk-Level, Spanisch-Kenntnisse auf Speisekarten-Leseniveau, zum Überleben ausreichend.

properties.summary: Sunny, very spacious (110 m2) and convenient apartment in Neukölln. A very homey house, with all amenities & more. It's 2 min to public transport and shopping facilities as well as super cool restaurants, bars and parks. Has a cozy balcony as well!.
properties.space: It's a very warm apartment in all senses. It has a gambrel roof which gives a very cozy feeling. At the same time the windows on the ceiling bring lots of light and a beautiful view, also when it rains. It's a very spacious flat which makes your stay very comfortable.

properties.name: Central studio at Hackescher Markt
properties.summary: Die Wohnung liegt mitten in der Mitte von Berlin mit Blick auf den Fernsehturm. Alles ist zu Fuß erreichbar und bequem. Trotzdem ist es erstaunlich ruhig.
properties.space: Small studio between Hackescher Markt and Alexanderplatz. well situated with view to the TV-tower, just 400 m way. The studio has 32 sqm, for 2 persons, a very practical pantry kitchen with everything you need to prepare a meal and a good espresso or tea. King size bed, bathroom - no window -, wifi-internet, tv, stereo radio,  The apartment is on the 8th floor of a high building directly at the S-Bahn station, but still quiet looking at a small park. A sunny room with a ventilator and dark curtains for calm nights. Eating table with 2 chairs, samll table with 2 easy-chairs, wardrobe. The house is situated in a very urban neighbourhood with supermarkets, organic shops, bakeries, laundries, cinemas, theatre. only some steps walking and you are at Alexanderplatz, museum island, Humboldt university, the old jewish quarter - all ideal especially for culturally interested people. All public transport is nearby, even the night bus. It is the very center of an interesting city.

properties.house_rules: Ruhe nach 22 Uhr, keine Partys. Nichtraucher. Normales Familienhaus. Nichts aus dem Fenster werfen. Please, be quiet after 10 pm since it is a normal building where families live, no parties, no smoking, do not throw anything out of the window.
properties.host_about: Hello, I am Bärbel Veronika from Berlin. I will be happy to welcome you in my cosy apartment in the very center of the city.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Berlin's "Scheunenviertel" is a neighbourhood in Berlin east city centre with a long and diverse history. Today, the area is one of the most vibrant and popular in Berlin with plenty of unique boutique shopping, cool restaurants and bars. Connecting with the jewish quarters and the gallery district to the west, Prenzlauer Berg to the north and Hackesher Markt to the south, the location is perfect to get around by foot.
properties.transit: For some further urban exploring the location is perfect between the 2 subway stations Rosenthaler Platz and Rosa-Luxembourg-Platz. There are also several S and and tram lines, all reachable within just a few minutes walk which guarantees to take you wherever you wan't in the city in the most convenient and quick way.

properties.name: Kreuzberg artist house
properties.summary: Beautiful top Kreuzberg address 19hundred vintage artist apartment. With a balcony. Great bars and restaurants downstairs. Fully equiped with kitchen, 2 sleeping rooms. Enjoy Berlin at it' s best.
properties.space: It' s a typical vintage Berlin appartment with a lot of space. A very cosy friends and family place on a beautiful location of Berlin.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The suburb of Prenzlauer Berg offers guests a safe and convenient location to experience the real Berlin.  Lightly damaged during the war, most of the area has been restored to its former glory with cobbled tree lined streets and small intimate shops.  The apartment, located on Dunckerstrasse, has excellent public transport options with the Sbahn, Ubahn and tram stop within walking distance.  The famous Saturday Markets at Kolwitzplatz are a 10 minute walk and Mauer Park Flea markets on Sunday and the East German wall Museum are a 25 minute walk or a short public transport trip away.  Several supermarkets and a range of eateries/cafes are located close by so no need to travel to find good food.
properties.notes: You can park your car directly in the street for 1 € per hour (free on Sundays and public holidays). Free parking is available 5 minutes north of the apartment. We can show you how to get there on check-in.
properties.transit: Sbahn station Prenzlauer Allee (8 min walk) Eberswalderstrasse Ubahn (8 minute walk) Tram on Schönhauser or Prenzlauer Allee (8 minute walk)
properties.access: The apartment includes free wifi access with dedicated modem, bedding and towels, a hair dryer, bath soap, dishwashing tabs and washing up liquid. The apartment has a convenient washing machine and dryer particularly suited for longer staying guests.  If you require a baby bed please contact us prior to confirm.
properties.interaction: We meet all our guests at the apartment address.  It´s important that you contact us prior to arrival to ensure a smooth check-in as we do not live at the property.  During check-in we will provide you with a city map and are more than happy to answer any questions you have including local supermarkets, great eateries, sightseeing and public transport.   Please note any check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.  Check-ins after midnight are not possible.
properties.house_rules: Check-ins after midnight are not possible. Check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.   No smoking inside the apartment. Quiet from 10pm each night. Please send us your arrival details (by air, car or train) as soon as you have them in order to ensure a smooth check-in. Once you arrive in Berlin please contact us to re-confirm a meeting time at the apartment 60 minutes prior to arrival. Absolutely no more guests permitted to stay than what have been booked for. Early check-ins possible before 3pm but please contact us first. Late check-outs after 10am may be possible but please contact us first.
properties.host_about:
English/Deutsch/Francais

Hi, we are a family operated apartment management business located in the Berlin suburb of Prenzlauer Berg.  We manage apartments on behalf of owners when they are not in town.  All of our apartments are located in central Berlin with easy access to public transport, supermarkets and local eateries.  We are always at close hand if you have any issues.  Our apartments are well maintained, secure, kept in clean order and we include all bedding, towels, shower soap and importantly hair dryers!  Free Wifi and a washing machine are standard in every apartment for your convenience.  Please feel free to check-out our past guest reviews, we endeavour to make your stay as comfortable as possible. If you have any questions at all please do not hesitate to contact us.  We look forward to your visit!
_______________________________________________________________
Hallo, wir sind ein Familienunternehmen mit Sitz im Prenzlauer Berg und spezialisieren uns auf die Betreuung von Wohnungen. Alle unsere Wohnungen befinden sich im Zentrum von Berlin mit guter Anbindung an den öffentlichen Verkehr, Supermärkte und Restaurants. Sollte es Probleme geben, sind wir immer in der Nähe. Alle Wohnungen sind gut instandgehalten und legen großen Wert auf Sauberkeit. Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Duschgel und ein Fön sind in jeder einzelnen Wohnung standardmäßig enthalten. Zudem stehen auch in jeder Wohnung kostenloses WLAN und eine eigene Waschmaschine zur Verfügung. In unseren Gästebewertungen könnt Ihr sehen, dass wir Euren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich machen wollen. Bei Fragen könnt Ihr uns jederzeit kontaktieren. Wir freuen uns auf Euren Besuch!
_______________________________________________________________
Salut! Nous sommes une entreprise familiale, spécialisée en louer des appartements de vacances dans le centre de Berlin. Tous nos appartements se trouvent dans le centre ville à proximité des transports en commun, des supermarchés et des restaurants. S`il y a des problèmes, nous sommes tout près. Nous entretenons tous les appartements et nous faisons attention, qu`ils sont bien nettoyés. Des housses, des serviettes, du gel douche et bien sur un sèche-cheveux sont inclus dans chaque appartement. En plus, il y a un accès à internet gratuit et une lave-linge. Veuillez vous référer à nos excellents commentaires clients, car nous essayons de faire votre séjour le plus confortable. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez nous bien contacter. Nous nous réjouissions à votre séjour dans un de nos appartements!

properties.name: Room in Charming Flat
properties.summary: We offer a room in our flat in the center of Berlin near Tiergarten. It is in a well preserved, charming historical building, from where you can explore easily all parts of the exciting city. Enjoy your time in our cosy home! M & A
properties.space: Our flat is a Berlin apartment in a historical building from the early 20th C. There are two spatious rooms (bedroom and living room. You will stay in our living room) that are connected by double doors. A so called Berliner Zimmer.  The living room (with balcony) is provided with a dining table for 4 person, a chilly sofa, book shelves with lots of books and during your stay we will install a comfortable bed for two person.  In the kitchen you will find everything you need for cooking and a dishwasher. But don´t miss out the great international restaurants all over Berlin ;-) In the bathroom is a bath tub, a large mirror to put your make up on for party.  There is also a washing machine you can use.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Moabit is a former working class quarter of Berlin, where people of all nationalities live. It is an authentic part of Berlin. Here you have the Tiergarten, the Spree river, the Siegessäule, Regierungsviertel as well as the Hansa Viertel for architecture and design lovers. And if you are tired of sightseeing and party you will find everything nearby to have a nice stay at our home: Supermarkets, drug store, bakery or  small nice cafes or restaurants.
properties.transit: Public transport (U-Bahn, Bus) is a stonethrow away, and the airport and railway station are c. 10 minutes by bus. Parking will be no problem!
properties.access: In our flat, you have wifi.  We have also a projector for home cinema if you like to watch a movie, but bring your notebook :-)
properties.interaction: During your stay we will stay also in our flat. In any case you have the room for your own! So if you have any questions during your stay you can just ask us.
properties.house_rules: Please do not smoke inside. Just on the balkony. No animals. Please keep the place tidy. Please tidy up before you leave. Do not invite other people to our flat.  No big party, it is a quite neighbourhood. Buy your own food.

Some more Infos about the district: "Wedding has so far not experienced the boom and gentrification of the 1990s in Berlin. Unlike many other 19th-century working class districts like Prenzlauer Berg, the original character of Wedding has been mostly preserved. properties.name: micro design studio overlooking Berlin
properties.summary: This micro loft is located in a recently renovated roof located in the trendy neighbourhood of Neukölln. High ceilings, slate floors and visible 100year old wood structure give the impression of an urban loft. During re-construction a lot of attention has been spend on details and only ecological materials have been used.  The metro (U8) and the Ring-S-Bahn are right in front of the house so you can reach Alenxanderplatz in 15min. All windows are sound proof (triple glazing).
properties.space: The micro loft consists of one large private room with kitchenette and a shared corridor and bathroom. The bath is shared with a smaller room that is also rented on airbnb. It is also possible to rent both rooms and have a private bath. There are three large roof windows with a nice view to two church towers and the Berlin TV tower. Additionally there is a window in the ceiling so the room can be easily cross ventilated.  The kitchenette is fully equipped with induction stove, oven and nespresso coffee maker. Please note that a fridge is currently not available but will be added soon.  The bed is sized 80x200cm and can be extended to 160x200cm so two people can sleep comfortably. In addition an inflatable guest bed can be added so a maximum of four people can be hosted in the room. (If you want to use the room with more then two people please send a message before booking to check availability of guest bed).   There is a table that can host four people or can be used for working or stu

properties.neighborhood_overview: You will be located in the heart of Berlin´s most trendy district of Neukölln.  In walking distance you can find shops for your daily convenience, trendy bars, amazing restaurants, newly opened galleries (Kindl Brauerei) and also one of the largest parks in Berlin. This park is the former city airport of Berlin called Tempelhof. It was the first civic airport in the world and now a 330ha large oasis. The former runways are perfect for joking in the morning, skating or cycling. Two large supermarkets are just on the opposite site of the road. Within 5min walking distance you find everything from bakery, 4th generation coffee shop, Asia market and burger shops. Many off license shops in the area are open 24h.
properties.notes: Please note that the flat is newly constructed so some things might be still missing. So I am always happy for your comments on how to improve. All materials used are natural so while you do not need to worry about any toxic evaporations the clay walls are more sensitive then using artificial materials. So please pay a little bit of attention during your stay. Also note that smoking is not allowed inside any of the rooms.
properties.access: You have your private room and access to a shared bathroom. From the common hallway there is also access to a washing machine which is available for a small fee. It is also possible to rent this room together with an additional sleeping room so the bathroom is for private usage only.
properties.interaction: I am living in a flat next door that is accessible from the shared corridor. If you have any questions regarding your stay or you need something you can reach me quickly. If you want to book the smaller room or if you do not need the kitchenette please check the room next door as well: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/15930249 You can also book both rooms together (please contact me for availability) so you would have an entire space for yourself !

Es hallt sehr - bitte macht nach dem Kochen die Küche so sauber wie  sie vorher war - bitte öffnet die  Fenster nach dem Duschen und ab und zu in eurem Zimmer - falls ihr heizt, bitte schaltet die Heizung aus oder auf  2 wenn ihr  länger aus  dem Haus geht - bitte schliesst die Tür zu wenn ihr geht - bitte  immer Schuhe draussen ausziehen  -für Männer: bitte setzt euch auf der Toilette
properties.host_about:
Hello! I am Franzi. I just went 30, but my minds stays 17 :D

I live and work in Berlin...but sometimes I take my backpack and leave for weeks and month, that´s why I rent my own room from time to time.

I got 2 rooms in my apartment, so I rent the second one to guests from all over the world, cause its much more fun to meet u guys and have a great time :)

Weekdays I am usually quite, I have to work from 8 till 6, I meet friends in the city...get shaped at the gym and need way to much sleep. On weekends I love to have late breakfast and visit cool bars with my friends and with my guests if they want to join us.


Ich bin 30 Jahre jung, genieß das Leben in dem ich für wichtiges im Leben Zeit nehme zB Freunde treffen, gutes Essen, reisen....und noch länger reisen als geplant ;) Ich bin trotzdem gut organisiert und versuche ein guter Gastgeber zu sein. Ich arbeite an einem Bundesministerium. Meine Wohnung wurde im Dezember 2016 renoviert und Altbau. Der hat es mir sehr angetan und ich fühl mich hier wohl...Ihr villt auch? ;)

properties.neighborhood_overview: In direkter Nähe ist ein Spätkauf, ein Imbiss (Döner) sowie ein Supermarkt. In the immediate vicinity is a convenience store, a snack ( kebab ) and a supermarket .
properties.transit: Die Anbindung an den öffentlichen Nahverkehr ist ausgezeichnet. Bus und Straßenbahn sind fußläufig zu erreichen. Die Tram12 ist 2min entfernt und fährt direkt zum kultigen U-Bahnhof Eberswalder Straße. Die M13, ebenfalls 2min weg, bringt dich zum S-Bahnhof Warschauer Strasse. Eine der beliebtesten Partylokations. In 8min Entfernung hast du direkte Fahrt mit der M2 zum Alexanderplatz. The connection to public transport is excellent. Bus and tram at walking distance. The Tram12 is removed 2min and goes directly to the iconic Eberswalder Straße. The M13, also 2min away, transport you to the Warschauer Strasse S-Bahn station. One of the most popular partylokations. In 8min distance you have direct ride on the M2 to Alexanderplatz .
properties.access: Die Küche verfügt über alle nötigen Haushaltsgeräte. Das Tageslichtdurchflutete Bad verfügt über eine Dusche und eine Wanne. Fön und Waschmaschine dürfen ebenfalls benutzt werden. The kitchen has all the necessary household appliances. The daylight-flooded bathroom has a shower and a tub. Hair dryer and washing machine can also be used.
properties.house_rules: Bitte zieht die Straßenschuhe aus. Das Rauchen ist nicht gestattet, darüber hinaus gibt es keine Hausregeln. Gutes Benehmen ist natürlich Grundvoraussetzung. Please remove your shoes upon entering. Smoking is not permitted, in addition, there are no house rules. Grace is of course prerequisite.

properties.name: Cozy Room in Kreuzberg
properties.summary: Great view & in the middle of everything.
properties.space: I would love to welcome you in my second room which is kind of a mix between a living room and a guest room. My apartment is very sunny since it is located on the 4th floor. You are welcome to use my kitchen and bathroom as well. If you look out of the windows you'll have a great view over Kreuzberg and especially Görlitzer Park. The street i live in isn't the most quiet (at least not on weekends, we are in the middle of Kreuzberg) so please keep that in mind in case you want to travel with kids or if you are a full on quiet loving person. I have room for 2 (max. 3) guests on 2 single beds and a sleeping couch.
properties.description: I would love to welcome you in my second room which is kind of a mix between a living room and a guest room. My apartment is very sunny since it is located on the 4th floor. You are welcome to use my kitchen and bathroom as well. If you look out of the windows you'll have a great view over Kreuzberg and especially Görlitzer Park. The street i live in isn't the most quiet (at least not on weekends, we are in the middle of Kreuzberg) so please keep that in mind in case you want to travel with kids or if you are a full on quiet loving person. I have room for 2 (max. 3) guests on 2 single beds and a sleeping couch. We do have a court in the back where you could lock your bikes. I might be or not be home during you stay at my place. Either way you can always ask me in person or via text if you got any questions (where to eat, what to see, where to go,...) – I'll be more than happy to help you out. Kreuzberg is my favorite part of Berlin – very vivid and a lot going on without forgetting abo
properties.neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg is my favorite part of Berlin – very vivid and a lot going on without forgetting about the "old" Berlin. The neighborhood i live in is very multicultural, friendly and open minded. I live right at Görlitzer Park which is a very popular place to lay in the sun, BBQ or simply chill outside with friends and listen to music.  You can reach bars, restaurants and clubs like Watergate, Chalet, Berghain or Club der Visionäre within minutes of walking or decide to just lay low at the park right in front of my place.
properties.notes: I provide sheets and towels. Small pets are allowed, just know that i live on the 4th floor and please ask before you bring them!
properties.transit: - a 3 minute walk to public transportation (U Schlesisches Tor)  - a bike rental just around the corner  - pretty much everything you need within walking distance  - both airports approximately 45 minutes away (public transportation – it takes only 35 minutes by taxi)
properties.access: We do have a court in the back where you could lock your bikes.
properties.interaction: I might be or not be home during you stay at my place. Either way you can always ask me in person or via text if you got any questions (where to eat, what to see, where to go,...) – I'll be more than happy to help you out.
properties.house_rules: - Smoking in the kitchen only.  - Please ask before you bring guests.  - There is free WIFI, please don't use it to download weird shit (Germany gets angry).  - Please be nice to my neighbors (noize-wise).
properties.host_about: Berlin bound & happy to welcome you in the heart of Kreuzberg!

properties.name: KINOMUSEUM
properties.summary: Exceptional guestroom in the back of a Berlin Storefront from the turn of the century with Kinomuseum in the frontroom. We offer one single and one double room, regulary Salon Evenings and Film Screenings. Truly unique in Berlin! No kitchen!
properties.space: NO PLACE FOR PARTYANIMALS AND PUBCRAWLER !

properties.house_rules: Three Golden Rules 1. This place is unique, handle it with care and respect. 2. You are not alone, be quiet when you come back late or get up early. 3. Our good old friend Immanuel Kant and his categorical imperative. Drei Goldene Regeln 1. Dieser Ort ist einzigartig, behandle ihn mit dem nötigen Respekt. 2. Du bist nicht alleine! Wenn Du spät zurück kommst oder früh aufstehst, versuche leise zu sein. 3. Unser alter Freund Immanuel Kant und sein Kategorischer Imperativ.
properties.host_about:
Filmvorführer, Entertainer, Salonkommunist
(Cinema Operator, Entertainer, Drawing-Room Communist).

properties.name: Sunny Balcony Room with Park View
properties.summary: Sun-drenched south-facing room with a spacious balcony overlooking the park - totally unique in Berlin. Located on a quiet and green side street, it's a 3-minute walk away from Mehringdamm and the Bergmannkiez, Kreuzberg's bustling multicultural centre. Viktoriapark and its waterfall, trendy bars, cafés and second hand shops are all in walking distance, including iconic venues like Curry36, Mustafa's Gemüsedöner and Vanille & Marille.  We welcome couples, solo adventurers and furry friends.
properties.space: Spacious sun-bathed room with approximately 20 sq.meters and a big south-facing balcony overlooking the Viktoriapark and the Kreuzberg itself (literally the Hill of the Cross). The bed is a queen size and can comfortably accommodate 2 people. The room is our own bedroom and we move to our comfortable sofa in the living room for the duration of your stay. That means you'll be sure to find a space that is very well taken care of. We have tons of ideas that we still want to make happen in this apartment - ways to make it even more beautiful, stylish, comfortable and cozy. Renting out will provide us with the extra income we need to turn all these projects  into reality. This also means that, for now, our place is not yet fully decorated. However, you'll find all the necessary comforts for a pleasurable stay. The home we are creating draws inspiration from and is influenced by minimalist ideals and environmentally sustainable practices. We are happy to share it with like-minded people or i

Located on a quiet and green side street, it's a 3-minute walk away from Mehringdamm and the Bergmannkiez, Kreuzberg's bustling multicultural centre. Viktoriapark and its waterfall, trendy bars, cafés and second hand shops are all in walking distance, including iconic venues like Curry36, Mustafa's Gemüsedöner and Vanille & Marille.  We welcome couples, solo adventurers and furry friends. Spacious sun-bathed room with approximately 20 sq.meters and a big south-facing balcony overlooking the Viktoriapark and the Kreuzberg itself (literally the Hill of the Cross). The bed is a queen size and can comfortably accommodate 2 people. The room is our own bedroom and we move to our comfortable sofa in the living room for the duration of your stay. That means you'll be sure to find a space that is very well taken care of. We have tons of ideas that we still want to make happen in this apartmen
properties.neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg is arguably the most exciting neighbourhood in Berlin. All the hipster trends tend to start here. It's the home to a bustling multicultural and young community that work at start-ups and have cocktails at understated bars in the evening. It's a dynamic and lively place, where well-educated people that value concepts like fair trading and organic shopping like to hang out or live in. Kreuzberg is quintessentially Berliner in joining the bourgeois charm of the West with the socially-conscious ideologies of the East. It's a wonderful place to live in. We'll be happy to share it with you.
properties.notes: Across the street there is a school. In the mid-morning and at lunchtime you will hear the riot of kids in the playground if you have the windows open. The sound isolation is very good, so if it bothers you, you can just close them and you'll be in absolute quiet.
properties.transit: Our place is comfortably served by public transportation. Mehringdamm underground station (U6 and U7) is a 5-minute walk away. Yorckstraße station is 7 minutes away on foot and offers direct connection to the S-bahn system (urban trains) with S1, S2 and S25. We are also served by buses 140 and M19. From Schönefeld Airport: 50min (S45 > U7) From Tegel Airport: 40min (buses 109 or X9 > U7) From Central Station (Hauptbahnhof): 20min (S7 or S75 > U6) From Bus Terminal (ZOB): 30min (U2 > M19)
properties.access: You will have unrestricted access to the bathroom and kitchen.
properties.interaction: We will be happy to share our knowledge of Berlin and give you tips and advice and also to spend time together in the evenings and even plan shared meals, if you so wish. We will also just give you space to relax in this lovely place, if that is what you prefer.
properties.host_about:
Hello, we are Hugo and Markus, your hosts. We are two  students and avid parmeggiano lovers. Seriously. When we are not busy with a DIY project for our new home, you will find us drinking coffee or petting dogs and cats. 

We recently moved into a beautiful Kreuzberg apartment and we are absolutely in love with it. Its sunny atmosphere and breathtaking view make everyday life a wonderful experience. So we decided to make it available to people from all over the world.

properties.name: Beautiful, central Apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
properties.summary: I offer my really beautiful, bright flat in Berlin with balcony. It's located very central between Prenzlauer Berg and Friedrichshain: - 3min to the "Partytram" M10 (brings you to the nightlife spots) - 15min Alexanderplatz  - 30min to Centralstation - 45min to Airport Schönefeld You will have everything nearby to experience a wonderful time in Berlin :) The flat has two normal beds and two really big air beds.

properties.house_rules: Dear Guest,  I feel very attached to this place so I would expect guests to appreciate, respect and take care of it, as much as I do.  I really like my neighbors and wish to keep the good wipes in the house. So please be nice to everyone and don't be too noisy. In short form rules that I would request to be considered: - Don't annoy the neighbors - Please no shoes in the flat - Please keep the flat tidy and clean and be sensible with spending water and electricity - When leaving the apartment, please turn off the heating and lock the door and throw the key in the letter box Thanks a lot :)
properties.host_about:
Hello Airbnb community my name is Malte, and I live in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg. I am originally from the north of germany but spent parts of my life in Göteborg, Stuttgart, Braunschweig and Mallorca.
I love Berlin and love to work with travellers from around the world. I always try my best to make everyone feel comfortable at my apartment in Berlin and help where I can. 
Hope to see you soon.

properties.name: QUIET COZY DESIGN CINEMA FLAT IN WINSKIEZ
properties.summary: Quiet stylish apartment for cinema and photography  lovers in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, few minutes away from Alexanderplatz and Mitte.
properties.space: The newly renovated flat has Oak parquet throughout the place. There is a spacious white bedroom with design furniture and a luscious velvet chair, a bathroom with shower and a washer-dryer machine, a large living room featuring a Danish Design Bookcase, collectors photography books, a flat Tv, Blue Ray cinema system and also a Movie Projector! So you can enjoy watching films in case one evening you decide to take a break from the Berlin nightlife. DVDs are provided too! The stainless steel kitchen is fully equipped (Dishwasher, Nespresso machine, boiler,mixer, toaster, oven, etc). and it has every tool to help you prepare a great dinner. I bought my flat 6 years ago: I am often away for work, and it is then free.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The area is the famous Winskiez, in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg and very close to Alexanderplatz, as you can walk there in 15 minutes. The closest metro stations are Alexanderplatz and Greifswalder Strasse. The flat is located in Immanuelkirchstrasse, a very nice street full of cafes in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, few steps away from Kollwitzplatz and it's lovely market and design shops. Volkspark Friedrichshain, the oldest park of Berlin, is very close too, and it is perfect if you wanna go running or relaxing in a beautiful green environment. The building is very quiet, but you can find many restaurants in the street (Indian, Fusion, Vietnamese, Italian), very nice wine bars, a supermarket open until midnight and a Bio Market, everything just around the corner. The tram M2 and M4 are at both the beginning and the end of the street, as to reach Alexanderplatz in only 3 stops or the famous Torstrasse and the Soho House in less than 10 minutes walk.
properties.notes: I'm a collector of rare books, vintage items, and design furniture: I will be very happy to share with you tips and the things I like the most.
properties.transit: Directions to my place: • M2 Knaackstrasse (2 min. walk) • M4 Hufelandstrasse (2 min. walk) • S41 /S42 / S8 / S9 / S89 Greifswalder Strasse(10min walk) • S-Bahn S5, S7, S75 Alexanderplatz (15 min. walk) •  U2 / U8 Alexanderplatz (15 min. walk) • Taxi from Tegel  (30 min, about 25 EUR) • Taxi from Schonefeld (45 min about 40 EUR)
properties.access: WIFI, sheets and towels are provided, as well as a professional hairdryer and shampoos and anything you'll need to make your staying in Berlin unforgettable.
properties.interaction: Unfortunately I won't be there to welcome you, as I rent out my place only when I'm away. My friend will be there to take care of you and handle you the keys, and I have prepared an explanatory pdf of the house so you know where everything is and how to use it!
properties.house_rules: • Check-in time is after 2PM. • Check-out time is before 12PM (Noon) There are few little rules: - Being a very quiet building, it is important to keep the noise down in the evening (10pm-8am), and leave the flat as it was given to you!  - The flat is very warm itself, so be responsible with the heating and remember to switch it off when you go out and lower it at night. - Please don't download anything illegal on the internet, as the fines in Germany are very high and we can track the time it was done and therefore track who was renting the flat! - No shoes!
properties.host_about:
Berlin, Baby!

I was born in Italy, I grew up in different places, I studied cinema which is still my biggest passion, I travel a lot and I work with my best friends at the handbag brand TL-180.

properties.name: Welcome to Berlin
properties.summary: Ihr seid in Berlin und benötigt eine Unterkunft? Dann seid ihr hier richtig.
properties.space: Wir leben in Mitten von Berlin Friedrichshain in einer tollen, großen Wohnung.  We are living in a big and cosy apartment in the middle of Berlin Friedrichshain.
properties.description: Ihr seid in Berlin und benötigt eine Unterkunft? Dann seid ihr hier richtig. Wir leben in Mitten von Berlin Friedrichshain in einer tollen, großen Wohnung.  We are living in a big and cosy apartment in the middle of Berlin Friedrichshain. Berlin Friedrichshain is one of the main tourist areas in Berlin. Directly in front of the apartment you will find a lot of bars, cafés, restaurants ... Despite that, being situated in the rear building, the apartment is quiet. Supermarkets, bakeries and so on are as well right aound the corner. The next SBahn as well as UBahn station is only 5 minutes away. Moreover, in the street you have a Tram station. By SBahn it just takes 10 minutes to the City center Alexanderplatz.

properties.name: Chillout-WG-2015
properties.summary: Hey, wir sind eine Dreier-WG ( Anfang 30 und 40 Jahre alt) und vermieten unser 4. Zimmer an Gäste.  We are three roommates and looking for temporary guests for our 4th room. Looking forward to hear from you :-) Uschi, Thomas und Dennis
properties.space: Unsere Vier Zimmer Wohnung liegt im Erdgeschoß und hat eine kleine Terrasse zum Innenhof mit etwas Grünfläche. In der Mitte befindet sich eine geräumige Wohnküche mit einem zum Esstisch umfunktionierten Billardtisch.  Dein Zimmer befindet sich zur Strassenseite hin und hat einen fest installierten elektr. Rolladen. Das Haus ist recht modern und gut gegen Lärm isoliert. Wir haben zwei Bäder, eines mit Dusche und das andere mit einer Badewanne. Beide stehen zur Nutzung zur Verfügung. Außerdem stehen eine Spül- und Waschmaschine sowie ein Wäschetrockner zur Verfügung. Bettlaken und Bettwäsche sind vorhanden. Handtücher können wir ebenfalls auf Wunsch zur Verfügung stellen.

properties.notes: Wir sind keine Party-WG! Unsere Gäste werden gebeten außerhalb zu feiern. Gegen "Rausch ausschlafen" spricht natürlich nichts ;-)
properties.transit: Bei uns vorm Haus fährt die M21. Zu Fuß ist in der Umgebung Anschluß zur M10 (Bersariner Platz) und U5 (Samariterplatz oder Frankfurter Tor). Sehr praktisch ist auch der Ringbahnanschluss S41/42 Storkower Strasse. Vor dort aus kommt mal schnell in viele Stadtteile. Außerdem fährt dort noch die S8/S9.
properties.access: Unsere Gäste sind herzlich eingeladen neben ihrem Zimmer auch unsere Küche und Bäder sowie die Terasse zu nutzen.
properties.interaction: Hier sind wir nicht festgelegt und halten das völlig spontan. Wenn es Zeit und Situation erlauben, steht einer gemeinsamen Unternehmung nichts im Wege. Genauso gibt es Phasen, in denen jeder mit seinen eigenen Verpflichtungen zu Gange ist. Zeit für Gespräche und mal Auskünfte ist natürlich grundsätzlich gegeben.
properties.house_rules: Hier haben wir sehr klare Vorstellungen: - kein Rauchen in der Wohnung - auf der Terasse ist ok - keine weiteren Gäste, insbesondere nachts - Wir nehmen immer nur eine Person auf - Selbsterklärend sind die Privaträume der Bewohner tabu - Die Küche ist nach Nutzung wieder aufzuräumen/sauber zu machen - keine Drogen

properties.name: Cosy room with balcony in Kreuzberg
properties.summary: Feel home in Berlin.  My available room is situated in the most versatile district of Berlin: Kreuzberg. There are countless bars, restaurants and the best clubs of the city. From here you can explore the real Berlin, far away from the mainstream-tourist-areas. Due to the good connection, you can quickly reach every part of the city.
properties.space: In my apartment you can use the bathroom and the kitchen. The bathroom has a rain shower. WLAN is free. For a good start in the morning we have a super coffee machine, which serves you fresh brewed coffee.
