The apartment is fully furnished and it hosts a maximum of two people (one bed). You can enjoy the entire apartment for yourself, including big li
properties.neighborhood_overview: I don't want to live anywhere else. The neighborhood is a wonderful mix of residential everyday life and latest Berlin style, attracting artists, tourists and international ex-pats to make this area so special. Just ten minutes from Berlin main station, next to metro-station Senefelder Platz (2 min) and in walking distance to Alexanderplatz or Hacke'scher Markt you can easily discover the touristic Berlin or just stay in the hip neighborhood of Prenzlauer Berg, spending all day in Cafes near Kollwitzplatz, shop the small fashion labels at Kastanienallee or discover the new club scene at Torstrasse or Kulturbrauerei.
properties.transit: Airport Berlin Tegel (TXL): 25 min by taxi (23 EUR) Berlin HBF: 10 min by taxi (7 EUR) Metro-station Senefelder Platz (U2): 2 min walking Tram stop Zionskirchplatz: 4 min walking All within walking distance: Kollwitzplatz, Kastanienallee, Hackescher Markt, Rosenthaler Platz, Eberswalder Str., Torstrasse, supermarkets, and of course some of the best restaurants, clubs, cafes, and bars of Berlin.
properties.access: You can enjoy the entire apartment for yourself, including big living room, the amazing balcony, designer kitchen, designer bathroom with rainshower and bathtub, and a master bedroom. High-speed internet and washing machine are available. As a special service, I provide a lot of amenities travelers need such as free local mobile phone, portable Wifi-device, a bike and latest Berlin travel guides in various languages.
properties.interaction: You can contact me any time or ask my neighbors and my cleaning lady if you have any questions.
properties.house_rules: Smoking is not permitted in the flat. Sorry, strictly no parties, additional guests or gatherings allowed. The fireplace in the apartment can only be used by long-term guests (more than 3 weeks) after coordination with me.
properties.host_about: I feel home anywhere in the world. I work for an international organization and travel to many exciting places all over the world every year. I love traveling and so often it simply felt like coming home thanks to incredible hosts I met in so many different countries. There is nothing better than feeling comfortable while traveling which why I will try everything making you feel home when you come to my beautiful apartment in the heart of Berlin-Prenzlauer Berg.

properties.name: Apartment im Prenzlauer Berg II
properties.summary: This beautiful small apartment (31 m2) is located in the most popular district of Berlin Prenzlauer Berg. It is located on the ground floor of a typical Berlin old building and is quiet despite its central location.
properties.space: In unmittelbarer Nähe befinden sich die gleichermaßen beliebten wie berühmten Plätze Kollwitzplatz und Helmholzplatz. Direkt vor der Haustür und im Kiez finden Sie Shops, Restaurants und Bars für jeden Geschmack. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten für Lebensmittel gibt es rund um die Uhr, also 24 Stunden. Ebenfalls in der Nähe ist der beliebte Mauerpark. Einen Besuch dort sollten Sie nicht versäumen. Alexanderplatz und Hackescher Markt sind in wenigen Minuten erreichbar. U- & S-Bahn, Straßenbahn sowie Supermarkt sind in nur zwei Minuten erreicht. Der nächste Fernbahnhof ist übrigens nur eine S-Bahn-Station entfernt.
properties.description: This beautiful small apartment (31 m2) is located in the most popular district of Berlin Prenzlauer Berg. It is located on the ground floor of a typical Berlin old building and is quiet despite its central location. The next supermarket is 2 minutes away. You can find a lot of shops and restaurants close to the apartment. Only 25 min to the airport Tegel by public traffic!  The next S-Bahn/ U-Bahn Station (Metro) and Tram is only 2 min away. Please also note that from January 1, 2014, you will have to pay the city tax in the amount of 5%.

properties.name: New Year in style: 400m2 Luxurious Loft in Mitte
properties.summary: The perfect location for seeing in the new year 2018 in Berlin. Watch the fireworks from the room terrace or walk to the big party at the Brandenburg Gate.  My apartment is very central and extends over 3 floors and a whopping 400m2. There are 2 ca.25m2 guest rooms with their own bathrooms and private entrances. Room 1 has a 2mx2.20m waterbed. Room 2 has a very comfy and new standard mattress. Both have large LCD TVs.  Wifi is available everywhere. PS.Deutsch kann ich auch !
properties.space: I think the photos say it all. Room 1 is on it's own floor and has it's own bathroom next to the room. Room 2 is a floor above. Each room has it's own entrance so if you're enjoying the Berlin nightlife you can come home undisturbed. On the same floor as room 2 is the main room (160sqm)(kitchen/living room etc) and above that the huge rooftop terrace.

properties.transit: We are surrounded by public transport. A bus stop within metres of the door. S-Bahn Bellevue at the end of the road, U Turmstr. and trams (M5,M8,M10)  2 blocks further. Free street parking is available and normally it is easy to find a space very close to my house.

properties.interaction: I work from home so I'm available to give you tips on Berlin or just for a chat !

properties.name: bright&cosy room in Neukölln/Kreuzberg
properties.summary: The apartment is well connected to public transport and situated directly by the river. When you look outside the window there is nothing but trees. Its calm and quiet. Yet the street is parallel to the Weserstraße, which is well known for its active nightlife, bars, cafés, shops and restaurants. You are in Neukölln on the border to Kreuzberg right by the canal. There is a lot to explore!

properties.host_about:
I love to travel and prefer staying in private places. So I hope you feel comfortable and welcome and find what you need in order to enjoy your time in Berlin. 
I am a very easy going and friendly person. In my free time I sing, dance, cook, practice Yoga, hang out with my friends, read... travel! 
For work I run a project that I have founded with some friends a year ago. It is related to the basic income movement and supports unemployed people. What would you do if your income was taken care of?

properties.neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg is one of the most trendy cultured areas in town. It's full of bars, cafes and restaurants. Something for everyone. It's a very safe area to sit and watch the world go by. Kreuzberg ist einer der angesagtesten kultivierten Flächen in der Stadt. Es ist voll von Bars, Cafes und Restaurants. Für jeden etwas dabei. Es ist eine sehr sichere Gegend zu sitzen und die Welt vorbeiziehen sehen.
properties.notes: FREE PARKING ON THE STREET FOR YOUR CARS AROUND THE APARTMENT. IT IS A CASE OF LOOKING FOR A SPACE YOURSELVES PARKING SPACES CANNOT BE RESERVED.
properties.transit: The underground station Mehringdamm is 6 minutes walk from the apartment. From here you can hop on the U6 to Checkpoint Charlie which is 2 stops. Within walking distance is the Brandenburger Tor, Friedrich Strasse  for shopping as well as the famous Mall of Berlin. All of Berlins major tourist attractions are within easy reach . The U-Bahn  S-Bahn system in Berlin is a very cheap, efficient and quick way of getting around this beautiful city. An adult ticket is €2.60. Areas AB €3.20 areas ABC if you're coming into town from Schonefeld airport. Der U-Bahnhof Mehringdamm ist 6 Minuten zu Fuß von der Wohnung. Von hier aus können Sie hop mit der U6 zum Checkpoint Charlie, 2 Haltestellen. Zu Fuß erreichbar ist das Brandenburger Tor , Friedrich Strasse zum Einkaufen sowie dem berühmten Einkaufszentrum Berlins. Alle von Berlins wichtigen touristischen Attraktionen sind leicht zu erreichen. Die U-Bahn, S-Bahn in Berlin ist sehr billig und sehr effiziente schnelle Art der Fortbewegung in dieser

properties.name: TempelCasa
properties.summary: The brand new TempleCasa is a 85 m2 (900 sqf) large, luxurious accommodation for the highest demands. Wonderful flat in listed building which was fully renovated in 2016. Perfectly suited for two people or family.
properties.space: The building is in the very heart of Kreuzberg. Shops, cafés, bars and restaurants are within walking distance. The beautiful canal “Landwehrkanal” is 2 minutes away, famous Admiral’s bridge 5 minutes. Public transport couldn’t be better: Bus line M41 (stop Tempelherrenstraße) takes you directly to the main station, subway U1, U6 ( stop Hallesches Tor) gets you to Mitte and Charlottenburg, U7 (stop Gneisenaustraße) to both airports. The flat is on a raised ground floor. It’s a cosy and quiet place that will make you feel at home immediately. The apartment is fully furnished and equiped.

properties.name: Beautiful Apartment in Berlin
properties.summary: Our beautiful holiday apartment with its own separate entrance on the ground floor of a private residence. The house has good parking availability and is conveniently located in the very green and very safe residential neighborhood of Steglitz, in  South-Westen Berlin.
properties.space: Our beautiful bright holiday apartment is located in the very safe green residential area / neighborhood of Steglitz. There is plenty of convenient parking within walking distance of "Freibad Insulaner" (a public swimming pool). The pool is open from June to August and has a lovely landscaped area with shade trees, lawns and enough space to enjoy the pool for a  very pleasant Summer experience. We also have a planetarium close by with a program that also includes music, literature and theater events. Our apartment is 50 m2 with one double bed and a separate entrance on the ground floor of a private residence. Our  kitchen is equipped with an electric stove, refrigerator and a dinning corner. The bathroom is tiled and has a shower.   We look forward to meeting you!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Berlin is the greenest city in Europa. We often see various birds like grosbeaks, redstarts, nuthatchs, woodpeckers, jays etc. in our garden. You can see squirrels hoping from branch to branch almost every day. Sometimes hedgehogs drop by in the evening. In the autumn we are often visited by foxes.
properties.notes: Upon advance request, we can provide a child's bed (70X150cm) for an extra fee of 15€. A set of clean towels and sheets is included in the price.  For directions from the airport, Tegel or Schönefeld, please email me after your reservation has been confirmed. - Please let us know when you are planing to arrive in order to provide you with the key. - No more than 2 adults and one child are allowed - This is quite residantial area, not suitable for parties - We welcome respectful guests, who can apriciate a clean, quite and comfortable environment. - Berlin has some of the most delicious tap water in Europa (drinkable) - Please don’t wear street shoes in the apartment. Slippers are available near the door. - Heating: It would be appreciated if you could turn down the heating when you are out. - We have an indoor/outdoor cat on the property.
properties.transit: Both Berlin city centers are easily accessible by public transportation. The nearest public transportation station is just a short walk (5-10 minutes by foot). Potsdamer Platz, Brandenburger Gate, Friedrichstraße (city center east) are a direct ride on the S-Bahn "S2" and "S25" (without transfer). Kurfürstendamm (city center west)  is only 20 minutes away by public transportation (bus and underground). Schloßstraße our local shopping destrict is only a 10 minute bus ride away.  Wannsee and Potsdam are also just a short distance away.
properties.access: There's plenty of parking space. Steglitz is quite residential area near a natural reserve. Our apartment is accessible by car without the need for any special access permits. A permit/emission stiker is required to enter the city center with a car.

properties.name: Prettiest Room in Friedrichshain's Best Location !
properties.summary: We are renting our beautiful 28m2 Room in the heart of Friedrichshain, close to everything.  The apartment is situated right by Warschauer Strasse S-Bahnof and U-Bahnhof, and both the tramway line M10 and M13, which links to most of the inner city. It's also 5 minutes walk to Schlesiches Tor.  You will find around the house, many restaurants, bars, nightclubs, Historic sites, shopping facilities, 24/7 open Kiosks. 5 min from Berghain, 10 min from Kater Blau, 15 min from Wilde Renate.
properties.space: The room you will be renting is part of a beautiful newly renovated apartment, with high-ceilings, wooden floors, lots of light, and quiet enough for being in the heart of Friedrichshain.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Imagine an art gallery turned inside out and you’ll begin to envision Friedrichshain. Single walls aren’t canvases for creative works, entire buildings are canvases. This zealously expressive east Berlin neighborhood forgoes social norms in favor of squatters’ rights and boisterous bars serving cheap brews. It doesn’t always go against the grain—cool bars, boutiques, and cafes fill Friedrichshain’s bustling main streets and its intimate cinemas and riverside green spaces invite visitors to get cozy.
properties.transit: You have trams and U-Bahn under the house. 10 min travel time to Alexanderplatz.

properties.host_about:
Hi Guys,

I am Nir.
I am 28 years old and I am living in Berlin, I really love to hang out with friends, drink beer or just stay at home and watch a good movie.
I would love to invite you to my humble apartment, if I will be in town I will be happy to show you around some cool places, bars, clubs and additionally to respect your privacy.

properties.name: Pearl of Neukölln
properties.summary: Minimalist arranged apartment that I renovated and decorated little by little in 2015/ 2016. It's my home and not an impersonal space that someone is renting out 365 days a year to make a business out of a flat that should belong to a resident of Berlin. You can enjoy my place in the heart of Neukölln for a price that reflects on a more and more dissolving value within the Airbnb-community: the Categorical Imperative of sharing.
properties.space: The heart of the flat is the kitchen with an old workbench and a high-end gas stove. The washing machine and the dishwasher are in an small adjacent room to the kitchen. The bedroom has a hard futon bed for two.

As well as the Berlin Wall, Oberbaum-Brücke, Simon-Dach-Str etc... You also will be very good connected with public transportation from Warschauer Strasse to any other part of Berlin like Kreuzberg, Neukölln, Prenzlauer Berg and other. properties.space: You live in a nice spacious room with double bed, TV and enough storage. In the bathroom there is a bath, which you are free to use. Each guest gets two towels. On a rainy day we´ll have two umbrellas ready for you. The apartment is located in the heart of Friedrichshain, one of the most lively neighborhoods of Berlin. It is close to trendy bars, cafes and restaurants. Some important sights, such as The Eastside Gallery and the Oberbaum Bridge can be reached in walking distance. Thanks to the great connection to the public transport you can explore Berlin in no time in any direction. Grocery stores and the popular Berliner “Spätis” are a minute away. On weekends there are two fleemarkets nearby.

properties.name: 70 sqm + access to the spa
properties.summary: High-qualitiy 2-room apartment on the 2nd floor of a spacious single-family-house. Walking-distance from the Berlin Wall Trail near the city-border as well as 25 minutes from the Berlin city center. Feel free to relax in the pool- and sauna as well! You are renting this apartment 100% in a legal way. It is not affected by the "Zweckentfremdungsverbot" of the city of Berlin which came into force in 2016.
properties.space: Spend the day as well as the night in the vibrant capital-city-life of Berlin. Relax on a bike-ride along the 50 km Berlin Wall Trail (bike-rental within walking-distance) or by taking a walk along the nearby horse ranches of the "Großlanger Grund". Spend some time in Berlin´s biggest shopping-center "Gropius-Passagen" (5 minutes by bus). Relax in the evening in your apartment or use the sauna and the swimming-pool of the house. The huge main room includes two modern corner couches (each can be changed into a double-bed), cable-TV, WLAN, dinner-table with 6 chairs and a kitchenette. properties.house_rules: Die Wohnung ist kinderfreundlich. Bei Bedarf können zwei Babybetten beigestellt werden. Die Anzahl der Gäste bezieht sich auf Erwachsene, Kinder und Kleinkinder ab 1 Jahr gleichermaßen. In der Wohnung darf nicht geraucht werden. Buchungen für Dritte nur nach vorheriger Rücksprache möglich. This is a family-friendly apartment. If needed we will prepare up to two extra baby beds for you. The number of guest refers to adults and children older than one year alike. No smoking in the apartment. Bookings for third parties possible only after clarification in advance.
properties.host_about:
Wir sind - kaum zu glauben aber wahr - am gleichen Tag im gleichen Jahr geboren und haben die selben Initialen. Dennoch sind wir sehr unterschiedlich: Myriam studiert an der Universität der Künste (UdK). Mathis organisiert beruflich soziale Arbeit und betreibt gleichzeitig eine Bildungseinrichtung. Myriam kocht am liebsten asiatisch, Mathis schätzt die bayerische Küche. Myriam sieht abends gerne Downton Abbey und Mathis die schaut die Champions League.
Gemeinsam haben wir drei Mädchen im Alter von 13, 11 und 9 Jahren, die von jedem etwas haben. Und wir alle lieben unser Haus, unsere vielen Freunde und das Leben in Berlin.

Wether you believe ist or not: we both were born on the same day in the same year. We even have the same initials. Still we are very different: Myriam studies at the University of Arts, Mathis professionally organizes social work and is running a language-school at the same time. Myriam loves to cook asian food, Mathis prefers the bavarian cuisine. In the evening Myriam will watch Dowton Abbey while Mathis is following the Champions League.
We both enjoy our three daughters aged 13, 11 and 9 who share a little bit of both of us. And we all love our house, our numerous friends and life in Berlin.

properties.name: Sonniges Zimmer mit Balkon
properties.summary: Euch erwartet ein super helles, schönes Zimmer mit Balkonzugang. Mit dem Bus direkt vor der Tür erreicht man in wenigen Minuten die S- und U-Bahn, um die Weltstadt Berlin zu erkunden. Ihr seid herzlich willkommen
properties.space: Bitte beachtet bei der Anfrage die Zusatzkosten für die zweite Person (second person: 10,00 €/night extra) Du solltes keine Tierhaarallergien haben. Es gibt hier 2 Löwenköpfchenkaninchen auf dem Balkon (nicht auf dem vom Gästezimmer) und manchmal einen super verschmusten Hund.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Die Wohung liegt direkt am Stadtrand mit schneller Verbindung zur Innenstadt. Richtung Süden gibt es den auf dem ehemaligen Grenzstreifen errichtet Landschaftsparkt Rudow. Richtung Norden startet man direkt vor meiner Haustür zu einer tollen Skaterstrecken am Wasser entlang.
properties.notes: Da ich hier selber wohne und zur arbeitenden Bevölkerung gehöre erwartet Euch ein aufgeräumtes durcheinander in meiner Wohnung. Es kann auch sein, dass Ihr mal ein Hundehaar entdeckt oder die Spülmaschine noch nicht ausgeräumt ist. Auch der Freund "Staub" fühlt sich bei mir leider hin und wieder wohl ;-) Euer Zimmer wird aber immer geputzt, mit frischer Bettwäsche und sauberen Handtüchern ausgestattet sein.

Ich bin eine Urberlinerin und meist sportlich unterwegs.
Bei mir werdet Ihr die Ruhe finden die Ihr braucht, um mit voller Energie die Weltstadt Berlin bei Tag oder in der Nacht zu entdecken. 

Ich freue mich auf ganz viele, tolle Gäste.


I'am 48 years old original Berlin woman. I make a lot of sport and have some musician friend.

properties.name: SchöneFerienwohnung nähe Messe/ZOB
properties.summary: Diese Souterrainwohnung im geschütztem Altbaugebäude liegt mitten im wunderschönen Berlin-Charlottenburg. Umgeben von Restauranten, Bäckern und in der nähe vom Messegelände-ZOB. Sowie auch in 2 Minuten entfernten Bus und Bahn Verbindungen.
properties.space: Die zwei Zimmer Wohnung teilt sich in ein Wohnschlaf- und ein Küchenessbereich, mit einem neu sanierten Duschbad auf. Der Wohnschlafbereich bietet ein elektrisch Verstellbares Boxspring Doppeltbett(160x200) und auch eine Couch mit Schlaffunktion an.Auf der Couch kann eine weitere Person nächtigen, oder zwei wenn Sie sich einig sind.  Eine gemütliche Schreibtischecke ist auch vorhanden. Der Küchenessbereich hat ein Esstisch für bis zu 5 Personen und eine komplette Küchenzeile. Ausgestattet mit einer Kaffeemaschine, ein Toaster und einen Wasserkocher. Ein Kühlschrank mit Froster, Mikrowelle und ein Backofen sowie vier Cerankochfelder. Eigener Garagenstellplatz auf vorheriger Nachfrage vorhanden!!!

properties.notes: Da die Wohnung sich in einer ruhigen Ecke von Berlin befindet, ist man nach einem vollen, stressigen Berlin gut aufgehoben.
properties.transit: Gut zu erreichen ist die U-Bahn Linie 2 Kaiserdamm (Ruhleben-Pankow). Verbindung der Ringbahn.

properties.interaction: Da ich 15 Minuten von der Wohnung mein Reich habe, bin ich natürlich für Notfälle erreichbar. Aber es gibt auch ein Ansprechpartner meistens vormittags im Haus zu erreichen.
properties.house_rules: home sweet home Nicht Raucher  Keine Partys

properties.name: Big room with balcony next to Tempelhof Field
properties.summary: Welcome to Schillerkiez! Be our guest in our spacious apartment right next to the main entrance to the famous Tempelhof field! The flat is located in the wonderful Schillerkiez, a vibrant and artsy area which still feels very local, with many great bars, cafés and restaurants around. Yet we are based on a rather quiet street with not a lot of traffic at all. You can cook and chill in our comfy and well equipped kitchen and enjoy our lovely bathtub! Your room has a big balcony and high ceilings!
properties.space: We just moved into this 4-room-flat recently and have invested (+still investing) quite a lot of energy in decorating it with care, love and an eye for details.  We are happy to offer our guestroom to travellers! It is furnished with a double bed (a mattress on a duckboard), a table with chairs and a closet. Of course we provide fresh towels and fresh linen too!!  If you are two people and prefer to sleep in separate beds we can put an extra single mattress on the floor too, then please let us know in advance! Children are most welcome.
properties.description: Welcome to Schillerkiez! Be our guest in our spacious apartment right next to the main entrance to the famous Tempelhof field! The flat is located in the wonderful Schillerkiez, a vibrant and artsy area which still feels very local, with many great bars, cafés and restaurants around. Of course we provide fresh towels and fresh linen too!!  If you are two people and prefer to sleep in separate beds we can put an extra single mattress on the floor too, then please let us k
properties.neighborhood_overview: Neukölln - and especially the Schillerkiez - is our favourite district in Berlin. And not just our's - it is getting more and more popular at the moment. You find cool new bars next to the kind of places that have been there for ages (long time before it became an somehow "in" part of town), Döner Kebabs next to organic Burgers, many nationalities peacefully living together.  One of the best things is that the apartment is basically next to the famous Tempelhofer Feld - an old airport which got turned into a crazy cool park where you can do all different kind of sports or just enjoy the grass and the nature and lie there or go for nice walks. If you are missing some trees just go to Volkspark Hasenheide, a 7-minute-walk from the flat and ideal for walks or relaxing if you need some rest from the vibrant city feeling.
properties.notes: We have a almost two year old daughter, she likes having people around and is generally really easy going. You don't have to behave differently than you would normally do at all!
properties.transit: You can find everything you are looking for in walking distance. If you still want to leave the area it's only a 8-minute-walk to the U-Bahn U8 Boddinstraße and you are in no time in e.g. Kreuzberg, Mitte or Prenzlauer Berg. To the Alexanderplatz its a 10 minute ride only! You also reach the Ringbahn- / circle-line-station Hermannstraße in only 2 stops with the U8 (which takes you to the airport Schönefeld for example).
properties.access: Apart from your spacious room, you have of course access to our kitchen with all its quality cooking facilities, a dishwasher, an espresso machine and a big table to sit on. There is also a bathroom with a washing machine, a dryer, a bathtub and fresh towels waiting for you :).  If you need things like an iron or a hairdryer or who knows what, just ask us. Of course there is also free WiFi in the flat. Enjoy sunny days on the rather big balcony which is attached to your room! Just feel at home!!
properties.interaction: If you have any questions or if you need something don't hesitate to ask us anytime!
properties.host_about:
We are a happy couple with a 2-year-old daughter in our very late twenties, both freelancing in the arts, living in our all-time-favourite city Berlin (even in the -what we consider- best part of it :D!). We are grown up enough to enjoy meaningful conversations and childish enough not to take life too seriously. We love traveling with our beloved camper, meeting new people, cooking, eating, listening to music, theatre, films, life in general :)!!! We are happy to being able to rent out one of the rooms in our 4-room flat to travellers from all around the world! Welcome!!!

Wir sind ein Paar um die 30 mit einer kleinen Tochter, die fast zwei ist. Am liebsten reisen wir mit unserem geliebten Camper durch Europa, allgemein freuen wir uns immer darüber, neue Menschen kennenzulernen. Selber würden wir uns als unkompliziert und spontan beschreiben. Beruflich sind wir im Theater-, Film- und Literaturbetrieb tätig. Der Schillerkiez ist die uns liebste Ecke Berlins und wir fühlen uns hier sehr heimisch. Wir freuen uns darüber, Besucher aus aller Welt bei uns zu beherbergen!

Dear & Lovely Travelers 

Hello

Welcome to Berlin World, Unique place on the Planet Earth... 

Where you can find your dreams & can make new dreams ... New friends, new lovers, new life start & much more ... Just come to Berlin....

We are Johannes & Leonardo
27 & 32 years old!

We happily welcome you to our apartments!

Info
All Inclusive and Flexible Check In & Check Out options for all, at any time of night and day time. Customer Care Service 24h ON in different languages!

We are Your personnel shopper and tour guide in. We have a lovely apartments to rent, all inclusive in the heart of the historical center of the city. 

About  our apartments.
- it's a lovely and clean apartments for a good price in the  city centre.
 - The building is well-kept, and modern with 2 big and fast elevators. 
- We  has 4 sleeping solutions. One double king size Bed and one double big size sofa bed plus one single sofa-bed for guests of the guests  
- The apartment is modern Open space style  has  one big living room  with connected with sleeping aria and living space with kitchen.
- The apartment has new windows and is well isolated from the noise outside. -There  is one nice little balcony where you can have nice breakfast or a romantic dinner or just smock something :) 

All inclusive options for all
- Included: clean towels, clean sheets, Shampoo and all for bathroom, Music Player, 
- Brekfast and Wifi are included.

- The neighborhood is very  convenient: - it is situated right near the underground (U-bahn) station  Wittenberg platz which is near the largest department store in Europe, shopping  center KaDeWe, and close to all other shops! What makes our place unique are the  optional nice little extra's: - We can speak Italian, English and Russian  fluently, and a little French, Spanish - We can drink a cup of tea (large collection)  together if you want. - We'd love to be your 'tourist guide' and show the inns  and outs of Berlin. For All With Love 

Johannes  &  Leonardo

properties.name: Calm and bright room AAA location
properties.summary: Beautiful  room on first floor (Beletage) in a famous Berlin 'Altbau' (end of 19th century). Heritage building and apartment with lot of graceful and elegant elements. This is a 300 m2 apartment was complete refurbished in 2012/2013 to luxurious standard: restored stucco, high ceiling, imposing chandaliers and many impressive historical details. The room is located to the quite back yard.
properties.space: Our beautiful apartment and building is located in the famous street where Christopher Isherwood lived from 1929 til 1933. The musical 'Cabaret' based on two of his famous novels about Berlin. The apartment is 300 m2 with 7 rooms and 3 bathrooms, located right in the centre of Berlin's city west. The Nollendorfplatz in Berlin Schöneberg is near. There you have easy access to 4 subway lines that take you to all sights in 10 minutes. We offer 4 separate rooms for rent. Here you have a calm and bright room (21 sqm) with access to a luxurious bathroom.  The bed is 1.60 x 2.00 m. Please check out our other rooms if you travel with friends or familiy. In total we have place for 10 guests ( 5 rooms - each with a double bed). We are living in the back side of the apartment that's why we are looking for somebody who prefers living in a 'friend's place' over an anonymous holiday apartment.

The peaceful neighborhood  is 3 minutes from the underground station at KaDeWe, Europe's largest department store. Restaurants, bars and cool shops abound, making it the perfect spot to shop or to indulge in  Berlin's vibrant nightlife. The well-appointed flat offers an oases of tranquility; hang out and cook dinner and enjoy or lounge in front of the fireplace with a glass of delicious wine

It is minutes away from Berlin's grand shopping boulevard, the Kurfuerstendamm, with Europe's largest dept store, KaDeWe and its legendary food halls, just around the corner.
properties.notes: The apartment is located in the heart of Berlin City West with excellent shopping and culinary possibilities. Its proximity to public transportation affords you quick access to Berlin's rich cultural offerings such as Museum Island, art galleries, bars, clubs and shopping.
properties.transit: 3 minutes from the underground station of Wittenbergplatz, a transportation hub for all points in Berlin.

properties.interaction: As a host, I am always there to offer assistance and suggestions. My girlfriend is also a travel planner and can help you experience the Berlin you would like to see
properties.host_about:
Hello,
you look at our official legalized and registered apartment in the heart of Berlin West. We love to host guests from all over the world, who enjoy staying in a spacious, cosy, private location. 
We also help by giving tips where to find the great places in Berlin, no matter if it is dining, theater, museums, art shows ....etc.
Come and check out all the reviews and be our guest.
 
Best Regards 
Christoph and Virginia

properties.name: Design Gem in Schöneberg. 2 Beds/2 Baths/Balcony
properties.summary: This brand new, spacious (100 sqm), luxurious and stylish apartment in an excellently kept listed building is ideal for 3-4 guests, e.g. a family with 1-2  kids or just for two who appreciate a separate study. Both bedrooms face the quiet backyard. The neighbourhood is lively with lots of bars, coffee shops and restaurants of all kinds. With the next underground station close-by you get it all: a perfect home to relax and an ideal starting point to explore the rest of this exciting city.

properties.name: Central located quiet place in the City
properties.summary: Hello and welcome in Berlin! I offer a quiet, cozy room located just off the beautiful Viktoria-Luise-Platz. With its full amenities you can enjoy your stay and explore Berlin.
properties.space: The room is quiet and looks south out into a green back yard where many rabbits bustle. It is equipped for up to two people and has everything you need for a visit in Berlin. The modern kitchen and clean bathroom are available at all times. The apartment (a third floor walk-up) is centrally located just off the most beautiful place in Schöneberg: the "Viktoria-Luise -Platz" . In the summer you can watch the buzz around the big fountain with an ice cream in hand or visit one of the many cafes or restaurants. Because the roads are partially closed to cars, it is very quiet and welcoming. Only 300m away is the Winterfeldt Square with its numerous restaurants and its famous food market, which is always worth a visit. The "Bar jeder Vernunft" invites you to enjoy good food and often outsolded theater performances. The Motz- and Fugger streets are home to many gay clubs and cafes and the Kurfürstendamm (Kuhdamm) with its hundreds of shops is within walking distance. Bakers and supermarkets a

It is equipped for up to two people and has everything you need for a visit in Berlin. The modern kitchen and clean bathroom are available at all times. Only 300m away is the Winterfeldt Square with its numerous restaurants and its famous food market, which is always worth a visit. The "Bar jeder Vernunft" invites you to enjoy good food and often outsolded theater performances. Th
properties.neighborhood_overview: Schöneberg stretches in the north to the Kurfürstendamm, where one can go shopping and visit the zoo. In the east it is joined to a new long-drawn-out park that connects it with Kreuzberg, not far from the former Tempelhof airport, whose free runways are now used for many sports. To the west it borders the residential district of Wilmersdorf. At its heart is the large Schöneberger Rathaus where Kennedy gave his famous speech.
properties.notes: Airport: From Airport Tegel it takes about 14 min.by taxi to get to the apartment and costs about € 26. By public transportation it takes about 25 minutes. Take the Bus "X9" to the train station "Zoo" and then the bus "M46" (direction "Südkreuz") until bus-station "Motzstr." From there it`s perhaps 200m. From Airport Schönefeld is about 35-40 min by public transport. Please take the Bus until underground-station "Rudow". The "U7" until "Bayrischer Platz" and then one station with the unterground "U4" to "Viktoria-Luise-Platz".  You can also take the "S-Bahn" until "Innsbrucker-Platz" and from there the "U4". But sometimes the S-Bahn is not driving. So I would take the tube.  A taxi is of course faster but much more expensive. I guess €35. Notice Board: In the room many flyers and information brochures are available on various aspects of the city. Many have been left behind by your predecessors. It would be nice if you added the collection and left your tourist brochures here if you do
properties.transit: The U4 station "Viktoria-Luise-Platz" is 100m away and connects various subway lines and to the S-Bahn ring around the city center of Berlin. Nollendorfplatz is only one station (or 7-minute walk) away. The largest Berlin U-Bahn station, which connects four lines brings you eg the U2 to Potsdamer Platz, the Brandenburg Gate and the Museum Island. Or is it the U1 directly to Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain with their lively night life? For shopping enthusiasts, the KaDeWe and the Kurfürstendamm at Wittenberg Platz are also only 10 minutes far. Or you just take the Metrobus M46, which runs every 10 min. driving off from the side street (Martin-Luther-Str.) to the Zoologischer Garten (Zoo) and the Southern Cross (Südkreuz). Since many guests wish to explore Berlin by bicycle (Berlin has a very good network of cycle paths) There is a bike rental shop in a side street nearby.
properties.access: In addition to fast Wi-Fi, the room has a television and a radio (+ extra radio with adapter for i-phones). Fresh linen and as many towels as are needed are of course available. The apartment has central heating. In the clean bathroom a hairdryer is available, and, if a guest wants to bathe, there are also various bath products that you are welcome to use.  The kitchen is fully equipped, with tea making facilities, a microwave, a toaster, an electric cooker with ceramic hob, a refrigerator, a dishwasher, a coffee maker, cooking utensils, and much more. Feel free to use whatever you need. Basic condiments and spices for cooking are of course also available. Everything necessary for baking is also there since I like to bake. A washing machine is also available; please ask me for assistance if you wish to use it. There is also a launderette in a neighboring street close by.
properties.interaction: Many guests I see either rarely or not at all during their stay, since I myself often travel or the guests have a different time rhythm from my own. Otherwise, I am of course glad to provide tips on the best places in Berlin whenever wanted, depending on what the guest is interested in. Sometimes I can also offer a small city tour, but only when desired. It is important to me that the guest is left alone and only given information when it is wanted.
properties.house_rules: A house rules there though and this is hanging out by the landlord in the stairwell, but in all previous guests this really was not necessary. My neighbors in the house are all very nice and that is why there has never been any problems so far also. I find it very pleasant to set up any rules, but to trust the guest. He should feel free and at home!
properties.host_about:
Hello,
i´m Simon 35 and you are welcome to stay here while you are in Berlin. When you want to know places for shopping, museums or just relaxing  -->Just let me know!

properties.name: Cozy room with double bed in artist flat share
properties.summary: Cozy room with double bed facing back yard in old style Berlin flat in Kreuzberg. Perfect location to discover Berlin! The three of us in the house are all working in contemporary performing arts (dance, choreography, circus, music.. )
properties.description: Cozy room with double bed facing back yard in old style Berlin flat in Kreuzberg. Perfect location to discover Berlin! The three of us in the house are all working in contemporary performing arts (dance, choreography, circus, music.. ) Bedroom, kitchen with dining table, bathroom We are a sociable flatshare with wide interests. We are also responsible professionals in the arts (from Finnland, France and Germany) who love to meet people and invite friends to the house -- but also enjoy calmness from time to time. #LGBTQIA+ #POC #inclusive In the heart of Kreuzberg, very typical Berlin neighbourhood with restsurants, bars, clubs around and alternative living culture. The house is situated directly on a square with a big church, playground and trees. The flat is in the back house, so very quiet at night. A  huge park for walks, picnicks, running.. is right across the street. An old fashioned Market Hall is 2 mins away with groceries on Fridays and Saturdays. Two supermarkets in less than
properties.neighborhood_overview: In the heart of Kreuzberg, very typical Berlin neighbourhood with restsurants, bars, clubs around and alternative living culture. The house is situated directly on a square with a big church, playground and trees. The flat is in the back house, so very quiet at night. A  huge park for walks, picnicks, running.. is right across the street. An old fashioned Market Hall is 2 mins away with groceries on Fridays and Saturdays. Two supermarkets in less than 5 min walking distance open until 21h / 22h and a late night store is right in front of the house. A large organic supermarket is an 8 min walk away.
properties.transit: The metro U1 (Görlitzer Park) is just a 5 min walk from the house.

properties.name: Quiet bedroom near central station
properties.summary: Our historic apartment is central & a very good place to reload your energy from the big city. You will have your own big room, where you can sleep tight and hang around. Up to 3 Persons can live there. All other rooms i'll friendly share with you.
properties.description: Our historic apartment is central & a very good place to reload your energy from the big city. You will have your own big room, where you can sleep tight and hang around. Up to 3 Persons can live there. All other rooms i'll friendly share with you.
properties.host_about: I m a music and sportsteacher. I do a lot of acappella singing and i conduct a little ensemble. Besides music i enjoy all that culture here in Berlin and cross the city by bike. For me it's really worth to live in that town. I'm looking forward to host you here.

properties.name: Big, airy room with stucco Mitte, incl. breakfast
properties.summary: Wer in einer liebevoll dekorierten Umgebung in einer hellen Altbauwohnung (Gebäude wurde 1902 erbaut, Deckenhöhe 3,20 m) mit Stuck übernachten will, ist hier in Berlin Moabit (westliche Mitte) richtig. Zentral gelegen, chic und schön. Der Preis versteht sich inkl. City Tax sowie eines leckeren Frühstücks, das nach Euren Wünschen bereitgestellt wird.
properties.space: Ankommen und sich zu Hause fühlen in meiner wundervollen, hellen, eleganten Altbauwohnung (Deckenhöhe 3,10m) mit Stuck in Berlin Mitte (Moabit). Die Wohnung ist individuell und liebevoll eingerichtet und Ihr nächtigt in einem großen Zimmer mit komfortablem Doppelbett (1,50x2m; Matratze mittelhart).  Wasser und Obst bei Anreise sind Standard, ebenso Frühstück. Ab sofort kann ich es aus zeitlichen Gründen nur noch vereinzelt servieren, d.h. Ihr bedient Euch bitte einfach selbst. Die City-Tax (5% des Übernachtungspreises für Privatreisende) ist im Preis ebenfalls enthalten, so dass keine extra Kosten dafür anfallen. Außerdem gibt eine voll ausgestattete Küche, Waschmaschine, Wlan und Wannenbad. Zwei Fahrräder (beides Damenräder) können zum Preis von jeweils 10,-/Tag gemietet werden.  Das Zimmer ist für 2 Personen geeignet, daher möchte ich auch nicht mehr als 2 Personen zeitgleich beherbergen.   Ansonsten bin ich tagsüber meist außer Haus und sonst so sichtbar bzw. unsichtbar wie gewünsch

Zentral gelegen, chic und schön. Der Preis versteht sich inkl. City Tax sowie eines leckeren Frühstücks, das nach Euren Wünschen bereitgestellt wird. properties.neighborhood_overview: Moabit ist ein multikulturelles Viertel. Die Wohnung ist ruhig gelegen in einem verkehrsberuhigtem Bereich. Gute Anbindung an die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel (4-5 Gehminuten).
properties.notes: Wäsche waschen ist ab 3 Nächten kostenfrei möglich. Öl, Gewürze, Wasser, Tee und Kaffee sind gratis.
properties.transit: Kostenlose Parkplätze sind vor dem Haus in ausreichender Zahl vorhanden. Wenn man spätabends anreist, kann die Suche etwas Zeit in Anspruch nehmen.
properties.access: Der Zugang erfolgt durch mich oder durch eine liebe Freundin, die im Haus wohnt. Ich werde versuchen den Check in nach Euren Anreisezeiten zu ermöglichen, wann immer es geht. Bitte schreibt mich einfach an.
properties.interaction: Ich bin in der Regel selbst auch vor Ort in der Wohnung und so sichtbar und ansprechbar (bzw. unsichtbar) wie gewünscht. Ich stehe mit Ausgehtipps und Hilfestellungen rund um den perfekten Berlinbesuch jederzeit zur Verfügung. Ansonsten - einfach Tür zu. Wenn es sich ergibt, unternehme ich auch gerne etwas mit Gästen. Das ist aber kein Zwang und zeitlich auch nicht immer möglich.
properties.house_rules: Diese Wohnung ist sehr individuell und liebevoll dekoriert und mein Zuhause. Bitte verlaßt sie so wie Ihr sie vorgefunden hat. Ansonsten: Bitte Absatzschuhe in der Wohnung ausziehen (wegen der Holzböden; warme Socken vor Ort, flache Schuhe sind kein Problem), Fenster beim Verlassen der Wohnung und bei Sturmwarnung bitte immer schließen, bitte nach 23:00 Uhr nicht mehr duschen oder Wäsche waschen (das stört die Nachbarn), keine Fremden oder Parties. No smoking. Bitte keine Gäste, die jünger sind als 20 Jahre, und keine Anfragen für mehr als 2 Personen. Die Check-in- und Check-out-Zeit kann auf Wunsch variiert werden; schreibt mir / schreiben Sie mir einfach Euren/Ihren Wunsch in die Anfrage. Vielen Dank!
properties.host_about:
Phd student, open to all friendly and honest people :-)

I enjoy meeting people from all walks of life, using my English and Spanish (the latter is a bit rusty though). 

Make yourself comfortable and feel at home. I will do my best to make your stay as pleasant as possible and to experience the best of "my" Berlin according to your interests.

properties.name: cosy historic building (central)
properties.space: Dear Visiter, our cosy apartment is situated in the heart of Berlin - only 15min walk from the main station (or 5 min by 123 bus). When we are travelling up to 6 persons can rent our place. It is big enough with 100 sqm. If you are 1-4 persons you will live in our two large living rooms, where 2 persons could sleep on a mattress, 2 on the couch and 2 more could sleep on an airbed (optional). The livingrooms feature a grande piano, a projector (TV and Blue Ray Player), a balcony, a grand table for a grand dinner and for chill out a hammock. Of course we also have free wlan. If you travel with 5-6 people, we will open the sleeping room for you with another mattress for 2 Persons to sleep.  In the kitchen you have the opportunity to cook. A good soundsystem in kitchen and bathroom might enlighten your day. You can park your car in front of our house easily and it's free. It's really safe, because the police station is only 100m away from our house. We will be happy to host you and make yo

It's really safe, because the police station is only 100m away from our house. We will be happy to host you and make yo
properties.neighborhood_overview: Moabit is one of the most original berlin neighborhood. Here you can find well mixed atmosphere where Berliners come together. If you go for instance to Lehrter Straße (300m) you will find the Kulturfabrik or the Kapitel 21. This is where the young Moabiters go to drink a beer and hang out.  Also Moabit is famous for it's pretty old style houses like we have. Here next to our street, in the Stephan-Straße some famous German cinema movies were taken.  And also the main station is located in Moabit to have always fast access to the trains.
properties.notes: The day of your arrival we will give you the key and the description for everything. Normally it should be something between 3 p.m.- 8p.m. In some cases I will give all the information and the key to a friend of mine, who will arrange everything.
properties.transit: The Main Station is near by. Also the Airport Tegel is 20min away by Bus. Directly in front of our house you will find to Buslines. With a 10min walk you will reach the S-Bahn and U-Bahn.
properties.access: You will live in our apartment and can use 3 Rooms and also the bathroom and kitchen. There will be a 4th Room, that we can't rent out because of new Air Bnb regulations in Berlin. In this Description everything responses to the rooms we rent out.
properties.interaction: Usually when we will rent the apartment we are on holidays. If you need a fast response please contact us via text message. We also try once a day to connect with the Internet.
properties.house_rules: We hope that you will enjoy your stay in Berlin and our apartment. We love our apartment and like to share it with you. We expect that you will also treat our place respectful. Please do not celebrate loud, wild Partys! Please, keep your volume during the night acceptable for our neighbors. We would also appreciate if you would leave our apartment in a general order. Thank you.
properties.host_about: I m a music and sportsteacher. I do a lot of acappella singing and i conduct a little ensemble. Besides music i enjoy all that culture here in Berlin and cross the city by bike. For me it's really worth to live in that town. I'm looking forward to host you here.

properties.name: Super central great room with private loggia
properties.summary: My place is in the very center of Berlin, so close to tons of museums, to the big shopping street and conveniently served by several U-bahns and bus lines. Checkpoint Charlie is less than 5 minutes away. Three U-bahn stations are just 5~10 minutes walking distance, and four different U-bahn lines are served by them (U1, U2, U6, U8). The apartment is a nice place that I'm sharing with other people.
properties.space: The apartment is very cozy, it was renovated few years ago. In the bedroom there is a queen bed and a couple of couches, as well as a desk, a couple of drawers and several lights. The room also has a private loggia.
properties.description: My place is in the very center of Berlin, so close to tons of museums, to the big shopping street and conveniently served by several U-bahns and bus lines. Checkpoint Charlie is less than 5 minutes away. Three U-bahn stations are just 5~10 minutes walking distance, and four different U-bahn lines are served by them (U1, U2, U6, U8). The apartment is a nice place that I'm sharing with other people. The apartment is very cozy, it was renovated few years ago. In the bedroom there is a queen bed and a couple of couches, as well as a desk, a couple of drawers and several lights. The room also has a private loggia. The building has 2 elevators. It's a nice looking building, half is used for apartments, while the other half for offices which are closed during festivities. I'm usually away when the room is available, but I'll be always reachable via phone or Internet, and my roommates or a friend will always be available to help you. The apartment is on the border between Kreuzberg and Mitte.
properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is on the border between Kreuzberg and Mitte. It's very well served by public transports, and lots of services can be found anywhere in the area: restaurants, bars, pharmacies, supermarkets, shops of any kind... Close to the apartment there are lots of public areas (small parks and playgrounds), with nice fountains and rabbits and squirrels. The area is also very clean, safe and well kept.
properties.notes: No room inside the apartment (except the bathroom) has a key: you can't lock your room and I or other guests might be around. This anyways never caused any issues and I'm sure it never will.
properties.transit: The apartment is only five minutes from U6 Kochstrasse (Checkpoint Charlie), one of the main touristic points of Berlin. U1+U6 Hallesches Tor is also just 5 minutes away, while U8 Moritzplatz and U2 Spittelmarkt are 10 minutes away. Right next to the apartment there's also a bus stop. All these connections can get you anywhere in few minutes and no transfers.
properties.access: The building has 2 elevators. It's a nice looking building, half is used for apartments, while the other half for offices which are closed during festivities.
properties.interaction: I'm usually away when the room is available, but I'll be always reachable via phone or Internet, and my roommates or a friend will always be available to help you.
properties.house_rules: Please only use plastic or wooden utensils on non-stick pans Make sure to disable peer2peer programs (e.g. torrent, eMule etc): in Germany people actually get fined for it
properties.host_about:
Hey! I'm Paolo. I love monkeys, public transports, Internet, Berlin and tons of other random things. I'm from Tuscany, Italy,  but after living in a few countries, traveling many more, and meeting people from virtually everywhere I found my place in Berlin.
I'm travelling all the time and I'm happy to share my room while I'm away.

properties.name: Best city Location of Kreuzberg
properties.summary: You`ll have nice 15m² room with a computer workplace in the centre of Kreuzberg. Also a beautiful bathroom with rain shower and a fully equipped kitchen and induction hobs. The whole flat has a wooden floor where u can feel home.
properties.space: The nice room is about 15 square meters and has a natural wooden floor. This or the original Cinema seats are perfect for Relaxing after the Long Kreuzberg nights!Also you will love the stylish and fully equipped kitchen, in which you are welcome to put your culinary skills to the test. The bathroom also has plenty of space, which is equipped with a 2 Person shower and bathtub. You can feel comfortable with all the housemates and from a prime location having a great time in the most beautiful city. Please take note that you are not booking a place to stay just for yourself. We are a young dynamic WG in Berlin with lots of life energy. Our two cats are curious little creatures who will attempt to cuddle you if you like that. So if your looking for a Hotel then we ask of you to book a hotel because this place is something else.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg is well known for its unique and cosy atmosphere. Your new home is located in the well know and popular Bergmann Area, in the heart of Kreuzberg. Plenty of Shopping possibilities are accessible in just a few minutes. Also Clubs, bars and Restaurants are just on your doorstep. For Relaxing and chilling with friends, there are numerous parks just around the Corner. The prettiest being the Victoria Park, with a lovely waterfall.
properties.transit: The U7, U6 and U1 are within 5 minutes Walking distance, also many busses leave from just around the Corner so you are well connected with the rest of the City.
properties.interaction: For any questions and requests I am happy to help you out.
properties.house_rules: Dear guest,  to get the best possible experience for all of us during you stay at my lovely place,  it's important to read the description of my flat carefully.  Please take note that you are not booking a place to stay just for yourself. We are a young dynamic WG in Berlin with lots of life energy. Our two cats are curious little creatures who will attempt to cuddle you if you like that. So if your looking for a Hotel then we ask of you to book a hotel because this place is something else. Its also important that you close the windows before you go out of your new home, in order to keep the cats inside the flat. They are not supposed to go out of the house! Also i would like to encourage you to keep the kitchen and the bathroom clean and tidy. In order to maintain this and with respect to all ladies and my cultural background,  I friendly ask all gentleman to sit down on the toilet.  Last but not least,  i would like to ask you to swipe the shower window after you took a nice shower.
properties.host_about:
Hi ,
I´m communicative and open to almost anything ; ) i like to be outside and physically active . I look forward to nice guests in our living comunity

Hi, 
Bin kommunikativ und offen für fast alles ; ) Bin viel draußen unterwegs und sportlich aktiv. Ich freue mich auf nette Gäste in unserer WG.

properties.name: designed bedroom in 2 room apart
properties.summary: This furnished double bed room is ideal for 1 or 2 people who want to get a feeling of what it’s like to live in east Berlin Friedrichshain.
properties.space: The emerging and upcoming East of the new hip German capital with its many cultural institutions, legendary clubs, galleries, cafes, bars and historical sites are the source of creativity and inspiration for an international crowd of creative people. Enjoy a fully furnished bed room in 2 room apartment with fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Bright and quiet, yet very central. location: Very close to Alexanderplatz, just 3 subway stations to Berlins City Centre. 5 minute walk to Simon-Dach-Street and Boxhagener Platz (popular bar area with weekend fleamarket, the cultural center of Friedrichshain). The apartment is located in a remodeled historical building in a quiet street. apartment details: 68 square meter apartment includes: - 2 bed rooms ( one for u & one for me) - fully equipped kitchen - bathroom with tub and shower - double bed by system(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) m = twin) - washing machine, dishwasher, fridge & coffee maker - super fast DSL/WiFi and flatscreen TV, DVD-Player mor
properties.description: This furnished double bed room is ideal for 1 or 2 people who want to get a feeling of what it’s like to live in east Berlin Friedrichshain.
properties.transit: location: free parking in front of building, 3 minute walk to grocery store and subway station.Very close to Alexanderplatz, just 3 subway stations to Berlins City Centre.
properties.house_rules: Leave me as you find me :-) Please note that you have neighbors, and they are not on vacation. Please also be quieter after 22.00, it is the law. Please don't bring back friends or other guests to the apartment. This is not a party apartment. Please no Illegal filesharing, it highly pursued, and is quite expensive in Germany (5001 Euros!) If you use the internet, you are consenting that you take responsibility for the cost of your uploads. Now that all the rules are out of the way, enjoy yourself!
properties.host_about: Oh, hab noch gar kein Profil angegeben ? Werd ich asap nachholen. Ich mag es, durch die Stadt im Somme zu radeln. Den Wind und die vielen unterschiedlichen Gerüche und Geräusche um die Nase zu haben. Ich mag es, an den "places to be" zu sitzen und die Stimmung der Stadt auf mich wirken zu lassen. Oh, I'm still without a profile? I'll catch up asap.

properties.name: Bella Souterrain im Bergmannkiez
properties.space: Das Appartement liegt direkt im Bergmannkitz, 50m von der Bergmannstrasse entfernt. Kreuzberg ist ein Szeneviertel mit zahlreichen Kneipen, Bars und Restaurants. Nachtschwärmer kommen auf Ihre Kosten. von den 70er Jahren bis heute entwickelte sich eine einzigartige alternative Kultur. Kreuzberg hat viele Sehenswürdigkeiten und bietet Entspannung im Victoriapark, sowie an den grünen Ufern des Landwehrkanals oder im Görlitzer Park.  Das Haus ist ein sanierter Altbau und die Ferienwohnung liegt im Souterrain. Das Appartement ist sehr hochwertig und gemütlich vom Eigentümer eingerichtet.Das 3 Zimmer Appartement mit voll ausgestatteter Küche, 2 Schlafzimmern und Wohn-Essbereich liegt im Vorderhaus.Bei schönen Wetter kann man gemütlich bei einem Glas Wein oder Bier den Abend auf unser Holzbank vor der Tür genießen. Eins der Schlafzimmer ist mit einem HIMMELBETT ausgestattet, das andere Schlafzimmer hat ein Boxspringbett und ein großes Doppelbett. Das dritte Zimmer ist das Wohn-Esszimmer mit

properties.transit: U-Bahn, Bus, Taxi
properties.house_rules: Berlin ist super schön und unsere Gäste können viel Kultur erleben. es werden keine Partys gestattet.
properties.host_about: Hallo, wir Doerthe und Ercan, sind Mitte 40zig. Unsere Hobbys sind unsere zwei Kinder und unser Enkelkind, Reisen, Sport und alles was Spaß macht. Mit viel Liebe widmen wir uns unseren vier Ferienwohnungen in Berlin - Kreuzberg zu.

properties.name: Great location in heart of Prenzlauer Berg!
properties.summary: Our flat is in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg (see https://www.airbnb.com/locations/berlin/prenzlauer-berg) surrounded by shops, supermarkets, bars, restaurants and cafés. Less than 5 minutes walk to Schönhauser Allee S/U metro station, with a direct metro to the centre in less than 10 minutes, our flat provides the perfect base for you to discover Berlin. For more information, see "The Space" below.
properties.space: - Double bed - Blackout blinds (new) - Mini-fridge in room - Shower & bath - Hairdryer - Additional washroom - Wifi - Washing machine & tumble dryer - Dishwasher - Use of kitchen - Cereals provided for breakfast - Smoking permitted on the balcony - Standard check-in 6-11pm - Alternative check-in times sometimes possible (at no extra cost) depending on work and booking schedule The flat was finished in 2012 to a very high standard. Bedroom with double bed, blackout blinds, full length mirror, clothes rail and mini fridge. Bathroom with dual shower (normal and rain shower heads) and large bath (towels provided). Additional washroom with toilet and basin. Washing machine and tumble dryer in case you wish to wash clothes while staying with us. Kitchen including dishwasher, fridge/freezer, oven, hob, toaster, microwave, kettle, Nespresso coffee machine, utensils, plates, bowls, cutlery etc. can all be used, all that we ask is that you load them into the dishwasher after use. properties.interaction: We are both available for questions before or during your stay and are happy to give recommendations or tips.

properties.host_about:
We are Chris (left on photo) and Homero (right on photo), a British/Mexican couple in our early thirties who have been living in Berlin for several years. 

We're easy going, happy and positive people who love to interact, share stories and help others to discover this amazing city that captured our hearts and minds. 

After studying languages in the UK, I moved to Berlin to join a startup online games company. Homero's an aerospace engineer and has already lived in Canada, the UK & several cities in Germany.

Homero's an awesome cook and loves to prepare his Mexican masterpieces at home and I, well I generally stay away from the oven, my specialty is cleaning.. I'm a neat freak so we combine well together. 

We love to travel ourselves, see interesting places, meet people with a different outlook on life and experience different cultures. 

Wir sprechen auch Deutsch!
Hablamos español!
Je parle français!

We're looking forward to meeting you!

properties.name: Double Room in Prenzlauer Berg
properties.summary: Hello, I offer my  double room (15qm) in Prenzlaur Berg. In the room is a comfortable double bed, a working place, a wardrobe . In the room is access to WiFi. The kitchen is fully equipped. properties.neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is a popular district of Berlin with many cafés, restaurants, bars, shops, parks and etc. Next to the apartment is small park Humannplatz where you can chill or play table tennis. ( Bats and ball are in the bedroom). Shopping centre Schönhauser Alle Arcaden are only 10 minutes from apartment. In hot summer days you can go swimm to Weisensee. (18minutes with Tram M12). Every Sunday is big karaoke in Mauerpark. (25 minutes by walk from the apartment).
properties.transit: There are many options how you can travel: U-Bahn U2 - 4 stations to Alexanderplatz ( TV Tower )  S-Bahn S8, S9, S41, S42( directly to Schönefeld Airport or with 1 change 16 minutes from Brandenburg gate)  Tram M2, M12: 20minutes to Friedrichstraße Bus 156, N2
properties.access: Guests will have access to the whole apartment(except private bedroom). That´s mean guests will have acces to the bedroom, kitchen, bathroom and small lobby.
properties.interaction: Guests can contact me during all their staying.
properties.host_about: Hello, my name is Jan. I come from the Czech Republic but since 2015 I have lived in Berlin. I offer my room in two-room apartment in Prenzlauer Berg. I like travelling everywhere but my favorite destination is Spain .)

properties.name: Spacious modern room near centre of West Berlin
properties.summary: About 15 minutes walk from Messe Berlin + Funkturm + ZOB (Central Bus Station). Ideal for trade fair visitors. Quiet location (room facing garden), safe and clean neighbourhood next to Lake Lietzensee, yet central (Zoologischer Garten and Kudamm reachable in 10 minutes with public transport). Couch bed comfortable for both 1 and 2 persons. Privacy guaranteed (room has a lockable door).
properties.space: The accomodation is right on Berlin's Antique Street - Suarezstraße - famous for its antique and art shops. The lake just outside the flat is perfect for joggers and walks. Berlin's largest forrest is easily and quickly reachable by public transport and bike (15 min.), ideal for hikers and mountaibikers. For shopping enthusiasts, the Kudamm, known as the Champs-Élysées of Berlin, is only 20 Min. away on foot. Berlin's most famous Boulevar is full of fashion designer shops and car manufacturers' show rooms. KaDeWe, the second largest department store in Europe, is easily reachable via underground (Stop: U2 Wittembergplatz). The train ride takes about 6 minutes from Sophie Charlotte station. You will find absolutely everything you need in the shopping street Wilmensdorferstraße, only two blocks away. properties.neighborhood_overview: Der Lietzensee vor der Haustür ist ideal für Freizeitjogger und Spaziergänge. Der Grunewald, bei weitem die größte grüne Fläche in Berlin, ist nur zwei S-Bahn Stationen entfernt. Mit dem Fahrrad in 15 Min. erreichbar. Ideal für Wanderer und Mountainbikers. Für Shopping Fans: der Kudamm is nur 20 Min. zu fuß entfernt; KaDeWe (Wittembergplatz) 6 Min. Fahrt mit der U2; Antikemeile Suarezstr. vor der Haustür; Die Einkaufstraße Wilmensdorferstr. ist 2 Kreuzungen weiter.
properties.notes: Use of washing machine costs 5 Euros per wash.
properties.transit: Metro stations S-Bahn Charlottenburg, U2 Sophie-Charlotte und S-Bahn Messe Nord are about a 10 minute walk away. properties.name: 74 qm zwischen Potsdam und Berlin
properties.summary: Mit viel Liebe zum Detail haben wir diese Wohnung an der Berliner Stadtgrenze in direkter Nähe zu Potsdam für unsere Gäste eingerichtet. Die Küche hat einen einzigartigen Ausblick in den Garten und der Kamin sorgt für Gemütlichkeit an kalten Tagen. Die Wohnung verfügt über Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett (160x200), Wohnzimmer (mit Schlafcouch), Eßzimmer, Bad (mit barrierefreier Dusche) und Küche (mit Fußbodenheizung und Panoramfenster in den Garten). Die Wohnung verfügt über WLAN.
properties.space: Unsere Gästeunterkunft wurde 2015 komplett renoviert und ist mit modernen als auch antiken Möbeln und Accessoirs ausgestattet. Wir sind ein familienfreundliches Haus. Kinder sind herzlich willkommen. Im Garten befindet sich eine Rutsche, ein großes Trampolin und ein Basketballkorb. Gerne können die Spielgeräte eigenverantwortlich genutzt werden. Eltern haften selbstverständlich für ihre Kinder.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Unsere Gäste schätzen die ruhige Wohngegend von Wannsee sehr, die am südlichen Rand von Berlin umgeben von Wald und Wasser liegt. Mit seinem hohem Freizeitwert und einer sehr guten Anbindung in die Berliner und Potsdamer Innenstadt ist der Bezirk Berlin-Wannsee im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes eine Insel, umgeben von einer malerischen Seenkette. Es ist ein Ort zum kultivierten Wohnen und vielen Möglichkeiten, die Freizeit zu genießen oder historische Kulturstätte und Sehenswürdigkeiten zu besuchen. Ideal ist die unmittelbare Nachbarschaft zu Potsdam mit seinen vielen Schlössern und Gärten. Einige Sehenswürdigkeiten sind: das Haus der Wannseekonferenz, Max Liebermann- Villa, Schloss und Park Glienicke, Schloss und Park Babelsberg, Schloss Cecilienhof, Schloss Sanssouci.
properties.transit: Unser Haus befindet sich im Herzen von Berlin-Wannsee. Mit dem Bus 118 benötigt man ca. 10 Minuten zum S-Bahnhof Wannsee. Von dort kommt man bequem mit der S-Bahn under dem Regionalzug in die Berliner oder Potsdamer City (ca. 20 Minuten in die Potsdamer Innenstadt, ca. 20 Minuten in die City Berlin West, ca. 30 Minuten in die City Berlin Ost).  Mit dem Auto ist man in ca. 2 Minuten auf der B1 und in guten 5 Minuten auf der Autobahn A 115. Dank der günstigen Verkehrsanbindung kann man in das turbulente Berliner Innenstadtleben oder in die Kulturlandschaft von Potsdam in fast 30 Minuten eintauchen.
properties.access: Die Gästeunterkunft befindet sich im Erdgeschoss unseres Einfamilienhauses, in dem wir im Obergeschoss wohnen. Sie ist abschliessbar. Es besteht ein gemeinsamer Hauseingang mit Zugang zur Waschküche mit Waschmaschine im Keller des Hauses. Auf der Terrasse kann der Tag gemütlich mit einem Kaffee begonnen werden.
properties.interaction: Wir stehen bei Fragen oder für Ausflugstipps gerne zur Verfügung. Auch bei der Ankunft und Abfahrt versuchen wir, für Euch da zu sein.
properties.house_rules: Wir freuen uns über Gäste, die unseren Sinn für Sauberkeit und Achtsamkeit teilen. Denn die hochwertige Einrichtung, die wir liebevoll für unsere Gäste zusammen gestellt haben, soll noch viele Besucher erfreuen.
properties.host_about: Ich bin selbst sehr viel gereist. Dass sich alle wohl- und willkommenfühlen ist mir insbesondere im Umgang mit unseren Gästen sehr wichtig.

properties.name: Best Apartment in Berlin / 5mins to Alexanderplatz
properties.summary: Die Wohnung befindet sich am Strausberger Platz - der Alexanderplatz ist in 5min zu Fuss erreichbar, ebenso der Ostbahnhof sowie der Volkspark Friedrichshain. Es handelt sich um eine schöne große 3 Zimmer Wohnung in den Denkmalgeschützten Zuckerbauten (Stalinbauten). Die Lage ist perfekt. Die Küche, das Bad sowie ein Zimmer liegen zur Karl-Marx-Allee, die anderen beiden Zimmer sowie der Balkon liegen ruhig und sonnig nach hinten raus. Schaut Euch am besten die Fotos an  :-)

Hallo Zusammen,

ich arbeite für eine große deutsche Fluggesellschaft und bin daher viel unterwegs und relativ wenig in Berlin :-( 

Für die Zeit stelle ich gerne meine Wohnung für Berlin-Besucher zur Verfügung.

Solltest Du Fragen haben, schreibe mir gerne. 

Viel Spass in Berlin.

properties.name: cute cosy vintage roof  apartment
properties.summary: Here i have a small cosy apartment with two separate rooms, two big beds, a kitchen, a bathroom with tube, and a nice balcony, which is perfect for spending summer nights outside.. All decorated in cosy vintage style furniture!
properties.description: Here i have a small cosy apartment with two separate rooms, two big beds, a kitchen, a bathroom with tube, and a nice balcony, which is perfect for spending summer nights outside.. All decorated in cosy vintage style furniture! A lot of restaurants and bars are near in this area. walk down in the direction south and you will find the boxi. shops,thrift shops, bars restaurants,cinemas,whatever you need is to be found. saturdays you have the market where you can find nice food and flowers and other stuff, and sundays fro 12 o'clock you have the flea market at the boxi, and the RAW space. I love the vibes, interesting people, musicians,the food village, just perfect to hang out and discover the vibe of berlin. Next to my street you can find a shops necessary for you daily need. You have two Tube stations near you. and can walt over to the trendy area Kreuzberg, in 25 min. Its quite a nice walk to discover the city! I can highly recommend!

properties.name: Design and Garden piece in the midst of MITTE
properties.summary: A wonderful and quiet Maisonette Apartment in the very heart of Berlin Mitte, two floors, view on a inner courtyard garden and the television tower!!
properties.space: A fully new renovated and equipped apartment in the very heart of Berlin! Absolutely quiet since situated in the garden building of the house. Direct view on the television towel! Hello! I'm french, 37 years old and live in Berlin with my German husband, my little daughter, who is 6 years old, my son, 4 years old and my newborn Baby, 6 weeks old! I would be glad to welcome you soon in the midst of Berlin Mitte, one of the most wanted area of the German capital!

Stéphanie

properties.host_about: Hi everyone, I´m an artist  from Spain working as designer in a lighting and interior design studio in Berlin. I enjoy travelling and getting to know other people and cultures.  Meeting with friends, drawing, cinema, theater, going to exhibitions, are some of my favourite activities.

properties.name: 2 bed, 2 bath Zionskirchstr, Mitte
properties.summary: One of our most popular apartment locations right on the border of Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte.  Great shopping, eating and transport all within a short walk.
properties.space: This beautiful apartment is perfectly located between central Berlin-Mitte and trendy Prenzlauer Berg. Its' quiet residential street is just around the corner from the bustling Kastanienallee where you can find great eateries, interesting shopping and a tram directly to Alexanderplatz.  The apartment is split split level with the kitchen, living room, second bedroom and separate bathroom located on the upper level.  The master bedroom and ensuite is located under by means of a convenient staircase.  The apartment has been recently renovated with tasteful furniture and a hand painted kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped and offers a spacious table for great dining in.  The lounge area has a large sofa, great for relaxing on after a day out exploring.  We have also recently installed a new LCD TV (not shown).

properties.neighborhood_overview: The suburb of Prenzlauer Berg offers guests a safe and convenient location to experience the real Berlin.  Lightly damaged during the war, most of the area has been restored to its former glory with cobbled tree lined streets and small intimate shops.  The apartment, located on Zionskirchstrasse has excellent public transport options with the M1 and M12 tram just around the corner or the underground station (ubahn) at Bernauer Strasse.  The Saturday Markets at Kolwitzplatz are a short public transport trip away and the Mauer Park Flea Markets on Sundays and the East German Wall Museum only a 10 minute walk away.  A large supermarket and great eateries are all within walking distance.
properties.notes: Parken kann man überall im näheren Umkreis des Apartments für 1 € die Stunde (kostenfrei an Sonn- und Feiertagen). Die kostenfreie Parkzone befindet sich nur 5 Minuten entfernt im Bezirk Wedding. Gerne zeigen wir euch beim Check In auf einer Karte, wie Ihr dort hin kommt oder wo sich das nächste Parkhaus befindet.
properties.transit: M1 and M12 Tram a short walk on Kastanienallee. U bahn U 8 at Bernauer Strasse. 25 minute walk to the city centre of Alexanderplatz.
properties.access: The apartment includes free wifi access, bedding and towels, a hair dryer, bath soap and washing up liquid. The apartment has a convenient washing machine and drying stand particularly suited for longer staying guests.  If you require a baby bed please contact us prior to confirm.
properties.interaction: We meet all our guests at the apartment address.  It´s important that you contact us prior to arrival to ensure a smooth check-in as we do not live at the property.  During check-in we will provide you with a city map and are more than happy to answer any questions you have including local supermarkets, great eateries, sightseeing and public transport. Please note any check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.  Check-ins after midnight are not possible.
properties.house_rules: Check-ins after midnight are not possible. Check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.   No smoking inside the apartment. Quiet from 10pm each night. Please send us your arrival details (by air, car or train) as soon as you have them in order to ensure a smooth check-in. Once you arrive in Berlin please contact us to re-confirm a meeting time at the apartment 60 minutes prior to arrival. Absolutely no more guests permitted to stay than what have been booked for. Early check-ins possible before 3pm but please contact us first. Late check-outs after 10am may be possible but please contact us first.
properties.host_about:
English/Deutsch/Francais

Hi, we are a family operated apartment management business located in the Berlin suburb of Prenzlauer Berg.  We manage apartments on behalf of owners when they are not in town.  All of our apartments are located in central Berlin with easy access to public transport, supermarkets and local eateries.  We are always at close hand if you have any issues.  Our apartments are well maintained, secure, kept in clean order and we include all bedding, towels, shower soap and importantly hair dryers!  Free Wifi and a washing machine are standard in every apartment for your convenience.  Please feel free to check-out our past guest reviews, we endeavour to make your stay as comfortable as possible. If you have any questions at all please do not hesitate to contact us.  We look forward to your visit!
_______________________________________________________________
Hallo, wir sind ein Familienunternehmen mit Sitz im Prenzlauer Berg und spezialisieren uns auf die Betreuung von Wohnungen. Alle unsere Wohnungen befinden sich im Zentrum von Berlin mit guter Anbindung an den öffentlichen Verkehr, Supermärkte und Restaurants. Sollte es Probleme geben, sind wir immer in der Nähe. Alle Wohnungen sind gut instandgehalten und legen großen Wert auf Sauberkeit. Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Duschgel und ein Fön sind in jeder einzelnen Wohnung standardmäßig enthalten. Zudem stehen auch in jeder Wohnung kostenloses WLAN und eine eigene Waschmaschine zur Verfügung. In unseren Gästebewertungen könnt Ihr sehen, dass wir Euren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich machen wollen. Bei Fragen könnt Ihr uns jederzeit kontaktieren. Wir freuen uns auf Euren Besuch!
_______________________________________________________________
Salut! Nous sommes une entreprise familiale, spécialisée en louer des appartements de vacances dans le centre de Berlin. Tous nos appartements se trouvent dans le centre ville à proximité des transports en commun, des supermarchés et des restaurants. S`il y a des problèmes, nous sommes tout près. Nous entretenons tous les appartements et nous faisons attention, qu`ils sont bien nettoyés. Des housses, des serviettes, du gel douche et bien sur un sèche-cheveux sont inclus dans chaque appartement. En plus, il y a un accès à internet gratuit et une lave-linge. Veuillez vous référer à nos excellents commentaires clients, car nous essayons de faire votre séjour le plus confortable. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez nous bien contacter. Nous nous réjouissions à votre séjour dans un de nos appartements!
